review_title: too bright - but otherwise a great monitor
review_body: Very happy with this monitor except for one thing - it's too bright. I usually lower my monitor's brightness to about 30-40% as I like a dim screen. However with this monitor lowered to 0% it was still too bright. Decreasing the contrast helped get it to an acceptable level. However, the non-glossy screen is amazing. I HATE how Apple and all these other companies think a glossy screen is "sexy". It's not, it's just annoying. So thank you ASUS for this monitor. And the size for the price is an amazing deal.
Display is brilliant and is everything I ever needed from a monitor. However, the stand holds it back. It is just not robust enough to absorb even the tiniest of shocks.

review_title: Great monitor that won't break the bank
review_body: I had been using a pair of mismatched 1680x1050 monitors for a long time and one of them finally started to bite the bust. I purchased two of these as a replacement.

review_title: Excellent monitors, great picture quality and brightness
review_body: I purchased 2 of these monitors to set up next to each other, have been very happy so far.

review_title: Works well, but eventually the buttons die. Alignment grid is now stuck on
review_body: The monitor worked well for many months, but eventually the control buttons stopped working. I have no way to change the settings or turn the monitor off. Furthermore, the alignment grid now turns on whenever the monitor is disconnected from power, so I have to leave it in standby mode.

review_title: I needed a second monitor for my school work and this thing is perfect. It's not the greatest in resolution for gaming ...
review_body: What a bang for my buck purchase!  I needed a second monitor for my school work and this thing is perfect.  It's not the greatest in resolution for gaming (I don't use it for gaming), but for a second monitor that doesn't cost much... this thing is great.  I highly recommend this product for anyone seeking a monitor for minimal cost and great quality.  No need to overpay for something above and beyond, unless looking for gaming or graphics resolution quality.  For basic every day work, to throw spreadsheets from one monitor to the other or opening up different browser windows, this is the monitor for you!!!
Great product, easy to use plug and play with no external power supply needed.

review_title: I love it! As an online instructor I need to ...
review_body: I love it! As an online instructor I need to have multiple screens open. I didn't want a big bulky second monitor next to my large all-in one, cluttering up my desk. This is small and unobtrusive but big enough to expand my visual field, while it can be easily tucked away behind the main monitor when aesthetics are my priority.
Great value. Works well with my new Dell laptop. USB C connection saves the need for extra power source

This thing rocks! Boots right up with my laptop - no problem. Actually loaned it to a friend who has a mac. The DVD didn't have drivers but the manual pointed to a URL with the necessary drivers. Worked like a champ. If you derive any benefit at all from having more than one screen open at a time (who doesn't!) then this screen will cause a step function improvement in your productivity. Couldn't recommend it more.

review_title: I'm very happy with this monitor ...
review_body: This monitor is (almost) perfect for me.  I needed something that could be tall and narrow, so I could squeeze this second monitor on my desk.  I use this monitor to view reports, so the dimension are great.

review_title: Washed out,but good for convenience if you travel
review_body: The picture is washed out but I'm changing my review and adding two stars. In the right lighting this isn't as bad as originally thought. It is truly washed out but considering the price and how easy it is to travel with and that it did work fairly well after initial driver install, I'm happy so far.
Exactly what I was looking for would give picture quality 4 stars as it is not as clean as a regular monitor. Overall very happy with the purchase.

review_title: I actually really loved this monitor - very lightweight and portable - but ...
review_body: I actually really loved this monitor - very lightweight and portable - but after only 4 months of use the picture is completely not legible - I will have to throw it away and buy another monitor. If an extended warranty is offered, consider purchasing one.

review_title: Great value and price with exceptional picture and functionality.
review_body: Arrived quickly and in great protective packaging.  Installed the driver and got to work.  Love having this thing for when I go into the office or meetings.
Easy to install. Works great as a second monitor for my Lenovo Yoga. Size is great for portability.
A good item. Hard to adjust the selectable functions. Spent 15inutes on this. Manual of no help.

review_title: ... lots of birds and nature so this is a great screen. After two months it died and Amazon ...
review_body: I photograph a lots of birds and nature so this is a great screen.  After two months it died and Amazon replaced free of charge.
Great monitor for the price. Good picture sound. No hiccups.
Monitor works fine, not exceptional, but okay. Had big problem mounting it. Beware. It took quite awhile. Poor construction.

review_title: So far so good, last one we bought (not this brand) lasted ...
review_body: So far so good, last one we bought (not this brand) lasted 6 months!  Great service, working great so far!

I cannot say enough about this fantastic Monitor.  Outstanding picture and the frameless build makes it seem like a much larger monitor.  The picture is clear and crisp with no missing pixels at all.  Outstanding value!
Having 2 monitors to do work and school work on is amazing. The resolution is great and it has HDMI and other connection options available. Would definitely recommend.

review_title: Awesome monitor for the price and more
review_body: Awesome monitor for the price and more. Currently using one as a 2nd monitor, but will be getting 3 more to complete the home office setup. Definitely a value item that packs a huge performance punch.

review_title: Otherwise it's a quite good display for it's low price
review_body: For me the only disadvantage is "edge bleeding", which is very noticeable in dark scenes while playing games. Otherwise it's a quite good display for it's low price: good colors&contrast, very thin frame and it can be angled up/down a bit. Also, the menu is convenient so you don't have to struggle with it, as in some display models.
Better than I expected. I use it every day and text and graphics are clear. Would buy again, esp. if the price was lower.

I love this monitor with it's bright vibrant colors and nice contrast for blacker blacks. It was perfection out of the box with no dead pixels and was quite easy to set-up with it's easy menu. Frankly, it looks so good with it's default settings I may never make any adjustments. But the ability to change your picture, color, or contrast is there. Folks who do a lot of gaming are more likely to make adjustment but my use is strictly for home desktop use. If there was one thing I could change it would be to make the bezel and base a matte black instead of the high gloss finish it has which is beautiful but we all know how it shows every speck of dust in existence, lol. I would recommend this monitor to anyone. It is fabulous!

review_title: Good as expected, no big cons
review_body: Great monitor! It just arrived a couple hours ago and now that I've got it set up and looking good, I can review it.

review_title: Very happy with both of them and will soon be purchasing ...
review_body: Currently have two of these and a smaller 21" HP. Very happy with both of them and will soon be purchasing a 4th with a 4 monitor mount to complete my screen setup. When I only had the one, the stand was pretty wobbly when typing, which is pretty annoying, but as long as you're not slamming keys, you'll be fine. The screen is very nice to look at and handles anything I want to throw at it at any resolution with no issue.

review_title: Worth every penny....only 1 dead pixel but easy to over look!
review_body: After hearing and reading all of the horror stories about dead pixels I almost didnt buy this but there were a ton of good reviews as well so I decided to take the chance on this.

review_title: Very clear picture, no onboard sound
review_body: I was looking a pair of high quality monitors to double for use as computer monitors as well as TVs for cable and Xbox.  For those looking to just connect and go, this probably isn't what you're looking for as they don't have built in speakers.  For me though, these fit the bill with the HDMI input and DVI Inputs allowing all items connected to work flawlessly, however I ran RCA cables to the surround sound speakers for my computer.  Of course this means that I have to get up to change the volume or turn the monitors on or off, it is absolutely worth the trade off for the price and quality.  These are a decided improvement over my old Samsung HD TV that was having to work as my display for my computer, cable and Xbox.

Very happy with this monitor. It had everything I wanted, but the VESA mount was the most important. I use an arm mount (which is awesome) and this monitor is noticeably lighter than the previous monitor I had mounted. Most flat screens used to include VESA mounting holes, but now the cheaper monitors don't. For the price, this monitor is hard to beat.

Haven't had the monitor for long, but it works great out of the box. I have it hooked into a D-Link Boxee Box via HDMI and have computer speakers plugged directly into the back of the monitor. Instant media machine for my workshop! Picture seems very clear and responsive. I'm not challenging it's capabilities with games and what-not, but it's serving it's intended no-frills purpose admirably.  My only problem was the instruction guide/paper is next to useless, though translated into 20+ languages. Luckily, the menu system (and button navigation) is fairly straight-forward.

review_title: High value, high quality, exceptional display.
review_body: I bought two to do a dual screen setup about two years ago and these monitors are absolutely exceptional.  They offer either HDMI/DVI/VGA connection which makes them very diverse.  Color and brightness is quite good.  There is really no heat generation out of the panel.  I also really like the stand the panel sits on, it is nice and small, sleek, and unobtrusive.  In my case with a dual screen setup the bezel was an area of concern but it is small enough that it doesn't really interfere with multitasking (about 3/4" on the sides).

review_title: but they could have done a much better job of indicating the on board controls and perhaps ...
review_body: Recently picked this up to replace a Dell LCD monitor that served me well for a number of years. First thing that struck me was how light this unit is. That's a plus, Compared to my old Dell LCD it was night and day. The second is the stand. It is very poorly engineered and is frankly a detraction against what appears to be a otherwise decent product for the price. I havnt had a chance to really use it for gaming yet as I am having issues with my video card which will be replaced shortly, but for all other purposes it seems adequate enough. I watch shows via streaming and it looks solid, the only issue I really have aside from the stand is the light. I cannot seem to contrast it enough so it dosnt look washed out text wise(edited to add after I wrote this I fiddled with it more and it looks much better). I suscribe this however to running it on a generic vga mode. Once I effect my video card replacement I should be able to adjust it more to my liking. One other aspect is the on board controls. It is frankly impossible for me to really see the tiny icons on the monitor. I made my adjustments based on the instruction booklet and using trail and error. It isn't rocket science to do, but they could have done a much better job of indicating the on board controls and perhaps illuminating them. Overall at this point I give it a 4 out of 5.
Great monitor.  awesome price/value.

Loved the monitor, but the cable only worked a couple of times and then completely broke.  If I could find a replacement cable, I would rate this higher.  But it was only usable for a short period of time.  By the way, I did not move this monitor around - it stayed on my desk, so it wasn't like it was abused during transport.

I bought this as an extra monitor to help me with work. I often have multiple documents pulled up to draft things. It's a great size, it installed quickly and I love that I can put it away when I don't need it.
Quality of screen is great. But I could not get the correct driver to work with my PC. :(
Perfect peripheral for my laptap to give me dual monitor capabilities.

review_title: Great for the price but the screen broke!
review_body: I had a chance to use this monitor only a few times.  I was not expecting super high quality picture/brightness so I was fully happy with the product I got.  However, it is billed as a monitor for traveling and comes with a handy travel case.  I recently went on a trip and when I pulled the monitor out of my laptop back pack i saw that the screen had cracked.  I am very careful with my electronics and make sure that i don't over pack the bag or throw it around and the monitor still cracked.

review_title: I love it! If your using a laptop without a ...
review_body: I love it! If your using a laptop without a CD drive, you can Google the exact product name and you find a download of the same content on the CD.

Honestly this is a great monitor and was awesome to have when traveling.  However, an update to Windows 10 removed support for the display-link driver this monitor uses, and now will not connect.  I have attempted to update the drivers on my computer, but nothing fixes the problem. Just something to know before you purchase.

I am quite upset that the resolution is only 1366 by768, not the 1900 by 1080as advertised. Viewing quality is poor. I was traveling during the summer after purchase, and only tried it these two days. Now the return window was just closed. But the spec is false.

review_title: Great portable monitor, unless you want to actually transport it...
review_body: I could overlook the blurry screen. I could overlook having to go through crazy driver installation issues when I upgraded to Windows 10. But what I can't overlook is a giant white space in the middle of the monitor. I've taken this monitor on my travels maybe 3 times. I always pack it in its enclosed sleeve, padded between several layers of clothing in my hardside suitcase. After this latest flight, I opened it up to see a big white box in the middle of the screen with what looks like a bean shape in the middle, that blurs over to the side. This obviously isn't a quality made display, as I've seen others with this issue in the reviews. I just wish I'd read further before I purchased one myself. For a second lightweight monitor that you might use at home but not transport anywhere, it is adequate (as I said, not the greatest resolution, but still workable). But if you're buying this specifically to travel, think again. Or maybe purchase an additional hardside laptop cover, as what you might think would be adequate padding is not...

review_title: A nice monitor for portable operations.
review_body: Considering what this LCD monitor is, it delivers a huge bang for the buck. The ability to connect the provided USB III patch cable to the host PC and have an 2nd monitor makes this an excellent tool for portable operations, including trade shows, swap meets, or in my case portable ham radio operations (Field Day). The color is not as bright as that on the host computer, but very acceptable.

review_title: Excellent. Bought this as a second screen for work
review_body: Excellent. Bought this as a second screen for work. Loves the colors and works quite well with my other monitor.
Perfect
Excellent monitor overall. Color reproduction is leagues better than my old HP TN panel LCD, and the bezels are much smaller.

I picked this up for my new Asus ROG Oculus Rift system.  I knew I'd want something for others to see what the person in the Rift was viewing, as well as a way to use the computer outside of the Rift.

review_title: Monitors are working great with my new set up
review_body: Monitors are working great with my new set up. Bought 2 so I can have a dual monitor system, and it's amazing!!
Great, love the clear bright screen!

review_title: It's great, but with every good thing, there's a flaw.
review_body: It's not adjustable, but with every great thing, it's not perfect. It has a tendency for ghosting, I don't see any daisy chaining support going on here, but it's great for a lifestyle single-monitor solution, but I do love the edge less display. If you need something more high-end, go with a DELL or HP monitor.
Not uniform illumination, and very bright at the minimum level. Not a nice quality plastic, not comfortable settings buttons. Not a bad matrix.
Great monitor - the only thing I would change is the ease of viewing and getting to the brightness/contrast buttons. Not very easy to navigate between choices on the menu settings.

review_title: great colors; using it for this review and loving ...
review_body: Bright screen; great colors; using it for this review and loving it.

review_title: After some time to use this monitor is not great, just OK
review_body: Im changing my review.  I just found out this monitor doesnt have any way for me to mount it.  I havent been able to find one of the adapters for it either.  The review says standard mounting holes but the back of my monitor just has 4 divets where holes should be.  The monitor quality isnt anything more amazing than any of my sub $125 monitors.  I am pretty disappointed in this purchase now.  I would have gone with a different model, but the reviews seemed great.

I never write reviews, partially because I don't have time being in med school and once I've bought an item I'm usually too busy enjoying it to care. This, however, was an exception. One month into use and I'm still in love with this product; Asus is usually my brand of choice when it comes to computer products. I recently built myself a computer over winter break and decided to splurge on a nice monitor after seeing a friends LED monitor in action.

review_title: I really like this monitor for the price
review_body: I really like this monitor for the price! The 1ms response time definitely makes a difference while gaming in fast paced games.The contrast and color of the monitor is really good as well. My only annoyance (and this is probably more of a general complaint about monitors) is that it has built in speakers.. why? Almost all built in speakers are awful and not even worth using. I'd use my little bluetooth speaker for sound before I used the built in.. don't think its necessary for companies to include built in speakers on so many of their monitors.. it should be optional. Nevertheless a great monitor for modest 1080p gaming.

Dead pixel out of the box.... great price and monitor overall. I would rate it 5 stars if this wasn't the 2nd monitor I have purchased that is from ASUS that has had similar dead pixel issues. Guess I have had bad luck. Once I get a working monitor I will come back and change the rating.

review_title: Just a few stuck pixels so far
review_body: Got a good deal on this monitor at Christmas time, and I do like it.  You can turn the brightness way up on this thing, but I don't.  Looks better when it's not trying to signal Mars.  However, I'm starting to get some stuck pixels.  I noticed a few a couple of days ago and so I took a closer look at the screen and saw a few others.  They all repaired okay I wasn't expecting to have problems like that with this monitor.  If this thing gives me trouble it's going to find itself taking a dumpster dive and I'll go back to Acer.

I was quite impressed by the monitor when I first received it. Great picture quality, a better menu system than Dell monitor, good looks, and it was dead level for height with my 2nd monitor, which was an unexpected bonus. However 2 things became glaringly obvious rather quickly.

This is a great monitor! I needed a new one since my old one had a red line going down the middle and had pixels randomly going, so I found this and purchased two of 'em. Couldn't have been happier with my purchase.

review_title: VERY BAD IDEA FOR NVIDIA USERS!
review_body: I love ASUS products, I really do. I have a motherboard in my desktop, a notebook, monitor, and all of them have been great. But this monitor has a very serious problem: it cannot play nicely with an NVIDIA card. You will get washed out colors, with light blacks and yellow tints. Search around, and the internet will tell you to tweak a few things (turning off the RGB helps) but nothing can fix it -- as I found out when I finally gave up and contacted ASUS tech support. I'm sure this is a nice monitor - if you don't use one of the most popular graphics cards in the world. The reason, as best I can tell from the various theories among the game and monitor experts out there, is that the monitor only has HDMI ports (unless you use Displayport), and the HDMI-to-DVI throttles the colors in a way that DVI to DVI does not (or something to that effect). Whatever it is, you can see it if you use two monitors: white on one side is yellow-ish on the other. And my other monitor is an excellent ASUS 25" I bought a few years ago - and the color on that one is superb. This is some kind of design flaw, clearly, but other than sending it back (I love Amazon Prime) there's not much you can do.
LOVE this thing - it's changed my life now it's like I have two screens and can do so much more at once.

review_title: Amazon said it was their #1 Best Seller, but the last 2 days
review_body: I don't know about this yet, I'm a little leery right now. Amazon said it was their #1 Best Seller, but the last 2 days, after I sign in on my Computer, the screen goes dark and stays that way for an extended period of time. Only until I start clicking the mouse and shutting it off n on does the screen come back on. I don't like returning items, then I start mistrusting the people I'm doing business with. If I had to do it over again, I would have waited and saved some more money and bought a Dell Monitor. So, I don't recommend anyone buying this, buy at your own risk!
While I got this working quickly on two laptops, one Win 7 and the other 8, I am disappointed with the color redering and the lack of contrast.

This monitor is GREAT! I travel all the time and up until I found this monitor I was that person who rolled up to a hotel and pulled a full size monitor out of the trunk. I can carry this in my backpack easily and can now have a complete mobile office no matter where I am! Great deal and would 100% purchase again.
Love, love, LOVE this and use it all the time- especially for work/travel! I always get questions on it and recommend others to purchase this!

I have purchased 2 USB monitors from this manufacturer on two separate occasions and they both eventually, after 6-9 months, fail for the same reason; the usb cord that plugs into the monitor quickly becomes unstable over time and frequently disconnects. Then you either have to get a reimbursement or a replacement.  My advise is to find something with better quality connections ports or get a replacement warranty to protect your purchase.

review_title: I'm pretty sure it's the cable
review_body: I'm really bummed out. After upgrading my at home work station to a second monitor set up and noticing my productivity shoot up, I researched into portable monitors to help me boost my productivity when I'm at school. This thing worked great--until the cable stopped working. It's only been about 2-3 weeks. I'm not sure what's wrong, but when I connect the cable from the monitor to my laptop, nothing happens. I've also tried using a different computer and different usb inputs, but nothing works. I'm pretty sure it's the cable, but I can't find a way to order just a new cable.
Very poor line of sight on monitor as it fades out a lot if you move left or right / up or down. Okay for temp use... but would not recommend for regular use.

review_title: Overall this is a great temporary/travel monitor
review_body: Screen is a little fuzzy. Overall this is a great temporary/travel monitor. I use it when I have to work while traveling and it gets the job done. Good for the price!
Makes my life on the road better.
works well with a hub, light - only comment maybe the neoprene sleeve could have been a little looser

review_title: This was a great buy! The product is made very well
review_body: This was a great buy! The product is made very well. It also came with a case to protect the screen for traveling purposes. It is not very heavy and it does not take up much room in your bag either. I would highly recommend this product!
Great monitor and a great buy.  We have two now.
Beautiful screen, great colors. I highly recommend. I use for my second screen in my office. Videos are smooth and crisp. Blacks are deep. Great screen and great price.
I own 3 of them and all connected to the same PC. Perfect trio
Great monitor for the money. Seller was super quick on delivery, works great
Bought this for my office computer.  Exactly as described.  Easy to set up.  Great resolution.
Huge display, almost too big for my desk to chair ratio. Great clear and bright picture.

review_title: ... a bit bigger than I expected but otherwise an amazing screen. Doesn't come with an HDMI cord though
review_body: The stand is a bit bigger than I expected but otherwise an amazing screen. Doesn't come with an HDMI cord though. :/ Had to buy that separately.
I just received my third monitor; two on one computer and the third one on an NVR.  They are excellent monitors, and I think well priced.
Great quality and price.

The monitor will not recognize an HDMI or VGA cable for my PC. After searching multiple forums and finding this is a VERY common problem it appears the solution might be to change some settings in my BIOS. Just need to buy a second monitor to access my BIOS and fix this crap.
This is honestly an amazing monitor.  I purchased it as a second monitor for my computer, and so I could play console games on a smaller screen.  It runs amazingly, and has this perfect picture.

To be honest, i dont know much about monitors.  Out of an order of 2, once of them has 2 always on pixels, buy they are on the side and i can deal with that.  Besides that the picture is really clear and bright, it has vesa mounting, and the stand comes off pretty easy. Also really like the placement of the ports in the back, but even though it comes with both sets of cables, they are a little on the short side, so plan ahead for that if you pc is far away from where you want you monitor. Pretty happy about them, and cant complain with the price.  Would suggest going with the 24 inch mondel though, since the price is only slightly higher!

First off, this brand is one of the best in terms of helping you if you have a defect in the product. Their replacement plan can give you a fast return, which allows you to have a new one sent to you while they're waiting for you to send their monitor. All that is required is a credit card for them to place a hold on in case they don't receive the old one.

Tbh i used this for my xbox one and the quality isnt exactly what i was hoping for but its way better then the hd tv i used. Havent tested it on a computer that can pump out some real graphics but im happy with my buy. If you have a Xbox one X do not buy this.

Got a nice deal on this at about $147 the display is very bright and looks great I had to turn down the brightness to 70 though since its so bright but that isnt a bad thing. The response time on the screen is fast my only complains are in the very flimsy stand and no matter how many times I unscrewed and rescrewed the base in, it kept appearing crookeed. The left side was about 0.5 inches too high so the monitor looked titled. I fixed this by putting 1 quater and 1 penny underneath the right side of the stand to  help center it.

just got mine after reading all the "hype" reviews. Next to my Sammy 27 its not even close, colors suck. Cranked sharpness to 100 and letter still fuzzy. put settings same as Samsung, cant touch it. Put monitors side-by-side and played HD movie with half of screen on each monitor. Samsung outclasses it by a mile. I SWORE to never buy anything but Samsung and didnt listen to my own rule. NEVER again..returning this one, will pay shipping, its not worth it
Great monitor.

review_title: Fantastic monitor for a great price.
review_body: As monitor 3 of 4, this monitor is doing everything I ask of it.  I was even able to mount it (a fear I had purchasing it) as there are built in mounting holes covered by small plugs in the back.  Great monitor, consistent colors across all of the monitors (all of them are the same make and model), and allows for fantastic gaming as well as high end graphics creation. I love this monitor.  I would recommend to anyone.

Very good monitor over all. If you're going to use this for PC gaming it is pretty big and will hurt your eyes. Would recommend the benq 144. If it's a tv first gaming monitor second then this is perfect

review_title: Decent, but I have a few complaints.
review_body: The monitor itself is decent. The colors look pretty good. However, compared to a monitor that was half the cost, the picture quality is very bad. My biggest complaint is that you can not freely change all the settings such as brightness, contrast and sharpness. There are six different modes which you have to choose from and each has their own preset settings. Under these settings, you can change only a few settings, but not others. The mode I chose had decent colors and picture, but I couldn't change the brightness so I now have to deal with my eyes being burned out of my skull. Which, well, pisses me off. I didn't read anything about this setting before buying, and if I had seen that, I wouldn't have purchased it. I have had this monitor for nearly eight months now (used largely for gaming and school work), and I couldn't take it anymore so I bought an Acer. If you do not care about not having full custom ability over your monitor settings, then go ahead and buy this one, it'll work for you. Just hope that a predetermined mode with finite changes to settings will satisfy your needs.
Great value - much less expensive than other LCD screens.  I use it as second screen for my laptop.

So far not impressed. Laptop recognizes that there is a 2nd monitor, but screen remains blank. Tested ports and other USB 3 cables with no issue. If support aren't able to resolve this issue, I will be returning and getting a different brand.

review_title: and the screen resolution is pretty good.
review_body: Had a little bit of problem making it work for the first time.  Had to call my IT guy to set it up since the installation software provided didnt work with my laptop.  After the setting adjustments, it works well, its light weight, and the screen resolution is pretty good.

review_title: Much better connection/stand design than earlier
review_body: Much better connection/stand design than earlier models.  Nice padded travel case,  nice screen size.  Very satisfied.

review_title: Works pretty well, especially for the price
review_body: Works pretty well, especially for the price. Sometimes the screen connection can be finicky but otherwise works great for traveling when a second screen is needed.

review_title: My office setup everywhere I go to. Two screens at all times
review_body: Works great with my thinkpad laptop. Enjoy working with two screens while traveling.

review_title: I am already using a ASUS Zenscreen USB-C and it is working fine, no issue
review_body: Received my AOC , connect to my laptop and impossible to start.

review_title: Great for older laptops with no HD resolutions
review_body: Nice second monitor but 1) has a very limited resolution, 2) kills your laptop battery!  You definitely need to be plugged in when using this.
Don’t waste your money. You’ll have to replace it after about a year, if not earlier. My cable just doesn’t stay in the machine so it works 10% of the time. Garbage!

I need to travel to clients on a regular bases so really needed something like this. Only one cable and it fits in my laptop bag with my laptop. This thing is a must have for anyone who travels and hates to lug around equipment. Its a little too glossy so shows fingerprints well but overall the picture and size are perfect.

review_title: Great screen, but fyi no speakers included.
review_body: Awesome screen! Couldn't ask for more. I actually ordered the first one and it came to me with an LED in the middle out, so that there was a little white speck off center. REALLY annoying. So I contacted Amazon and they shipped me out another one before I even boxed the broken one up. GREAT customer service! I received the new one a day later and it works great. No problems at all. My son loves the size and clarity of it. I wish it had speakers but no biggie, he uses headphones anyway.

review_title: Great picture, pretty good settings options
review_body: I have three of these set up in a wall-mounted array. They look great and none of them had any issues out of the box. Antiglare coating is a nice benefit, and I cannot see the "rainbow" effect unless I have my face right next to the monitor so do not worry about that. I was hesitant after reading some reviews, but the coating does not cause weird visuals at normal viewing distances.

review_title: So far very happy with this monitor i upgraded from a old gateway ...
review_body: So far very happy with this monitor i upgraded from a old gateway 1680x1050 TN panel the colors are very nice on this so are the black levels.

review_title: Exactly what I was looking for. Great quality, price, capabilities, ect. I will buy from ASUS again.
review_body: This monitor is crystal clear, well-priced, and exactly what I was looking for.

This item was simple to install. How simple ? Only one screw. Wait, what? One screw... How and where? Just is and the screw is already built-in or set in place in the base of the monitor. As far as the monitor its a lot better than lcd. I recommended it those who watch netflix or videos. The videos with the led monitor is a lot better. Asus as a brand is great, 3 year warranty. How can it get better? I think when I bought mine, there was a rebate. So, check for rebates if you do decide to purchase this item.

review_title: A great monitor for both programming and gaming
review_body: This is the near-perfect monitor for both programming and casual gaming.  The text is sharp, and the gaming experience is very responsive with no lag.  My profession is programmer for the last 30 years, and this monitor is great for development.  I also play the latest FPS games on this monitor, and the graphics performance is great.  Others have mentioned the issues with the stand and also the awkward navigation in the menu.  I would agree with these complaints, but for the low price of the monitor, you could always buy a better stand.  I did not make many changes in the menu except for dialing down the brightness; everything else seemed to be fine as the default settings.  So again, a non-issue for me.

This monitor is great if you want a reasonably priced IPS panel.  The colors are perfect, and stay perfect from any reasonable viewing angle - the color changes a tad when you're looking directly down or to the side of it, but that's expected.

review_title: Happy with the monitor so far
review_body: Happy with the monitor so far.  Unless doing a detailed side by side viewing comparison, it's difficult to tell the difference between this and other monitors with similar specifications.  Most user reviews seemed positive, however.

review_title: There are better monitors for the same money.
review_body: I'm not 100% happy with this monitor. ASUS cut some corners on the hardware and it doesn't seek the active input. A really cheesy stand that is virtually nonadjustable.  Somewhat dissappointed in this unit.

review_title: It has a nice bright picture and is very clear
review_body: I bought this product because my old lcd monitor was starting to go out. I bought the ASUS VS228H-P 21.5-Inch Full-HD because it was advised on the MMO-champion.com budget build computer list. My old monitor was a used view sonic 21 inch lcd. The ASUS VS228H-P 21.5-Inch Full-HD was a big improvement for me. It has a nice bright picture and is very clear. It has a small,nice looking black frame that doesn't take up much room. Its very lite for its screen size. I think its well worth the money. It seems well made. It seems to be made to last a good amount of time. I hope it does!

review_title: Surprised by the quality for the rather low price
review_body: After several years my existing monitor of a different brand but same size developed dark corners and then just quit altogether. I was happy to see that the Acer R240HY bidx offered the same size screen. This screen has the added bonus of only about a .25 inch edge on the top and sides.
I love this new monitor. It is perfect. The size is great and the resolution also. Big improvement over the one I had before this one. Thanks.CCL
Good Monitor for my daily work. Love it!
I use this for work.  Spreadsheets, photoshop, research, email, etc....  My second Acer and would definitely buy this product again.
Bought these for my wife. I want them now! So clear and sleek design.
Performed exactly as expected, good value for the price.
Pretty impressed for the price of the monitor. Crisp looking screen and especially for the price.
Bought three of these to use in a triple monitor setup. Months later, still going strong. Definitely recommend them.
Five stars. The only wish I had is that it would pivot vertically. But the high def lloks great and I can sit far enough back from.the screen because it is amply large. Good value for the money!
Light, bright, easy to work and a joy to use. Recommended.

review_title: Brightest monitor even at low settings.
review_body: Wonderful monitor for a great price. Good color, sturdy stand and nice proportions. I only wish its brightness settings would go lower than Arizona summer's noon sunshine. A bit more height on the base would be nice also.

review_title: Great monitor, the pictures looks a little too sharp ...
review_body: Great monitor, the pictures looks a little too sharp tbh but i wouldnt say that was a bad thing.

I love this monitor.  The images are crisp and clear.  The monitor did came with some yellowish color when starts on but it is easy to configure.  Use the menu button first and then use the up and down buttons to make your selection in your settings window.  To exit settings use the first button to the left and for HDMI use the 5th button.  You can also configure to HDMI using the menu, 2nd and 4th buttons.  Couple of things to take in consideration,  this monitor is not glossy or have speakers but is fitted to use VESA mounts.  Other than that, this monitor rocks!  Also on the color area in settings I adjust the red and green close to 80% while the blue I left it to 100% and the monitor looks great!

My first IPS upgrade, and I'm wishing I had bought a second one to replace my second monitor in my dual-screen setup (although my desk isn't wide enough in its current configuration).  This is a beautiful monitor that is exceptionally affordable for an IPS display.  The value simply cannot be beat.

I purchased two at the same time and have them mounted on a desk stand as to position them at the right height and angle. I use them mainly for photography and web design and a little CAD work. Colors are true and both match. (I use a Color Munki to control color and brightness).

Don't get me wrong, I buy a lot of ASUS product and this Monitor works fine but I was looking for a Monitor the was the same size as the Monitor I already have.  I have a Nvidia graphics card that supports 2 monitors and I wanted to a match to the monitor I already have.  Unfortunately, the sizing was misleading making it difficult how close it was to my current monitor.  In this case the base was shorter, the screen was wider, thus a shorter height in the monitor screen.  Thinking back I should have order 2 of the same monitor.  So far it is reliable and I don't think it's going to die anytime soon.

review_title: Solid Monitor at a Good Price
review_body: I got this to go with my new ASUS M51AC-US004S desktop computer. This monitor looks HUGE when you're used to looking at a 15 inch laptop screen like I had been.
First - I have three in landscape mode. All three work better than expected. The colors look great and, luckily, I have no dead pixels.

review_title: Nice monitor, very sharp and clear, decent price.
review_body: This is a slightly upgraded version of my other monitor so I knew what to expect. It's crisp and clear, not much to say except that and I love it. It was packed very securely, no chance of damage. Came with a DVI cable - an HDMI cable would have been a nice inclusion.

I am still getting used to this monitor, but what I see so far I like. My only complaint would be that it is so automated that I find it hard to do the simple things like adjust position. I will learn but right now it is set to full aspect with no selection available for position. I also find that with my old eye's I have to use explorer in 125% view mode to see the characters. Not a big deal as there is plenty of viewing space for 99% of the web pages.

review_title: more like a picture frame than a monitor
review_body: Works as described and is very lightweight, small in size. Plenty bright for my purposes. 4 stars because the stand is not very stable, more like a picture frame than a monitor. I guess you can't have everything.
I like that's light weight.  Giving 4 stars because I still have to restart my laptop sometimes in order to use the monitor again even though my laptop was already on.
This is not a fantastic monitor, but it is a fantastic PORTABLE monitor.

I purchased this to go with my 13" 1080 laptop.  It works fine.  The issue is that the resolution is low.  It isn't really the fault of AOC though.  I should have read closer.  It works fine for most of what I need in a pinch but a higher resolution is more useful.  Spend more and get the higher resolution option. Fit and finish good- light weight although not thin .

I was very excited when i first plugged this in and started using it.  Only to have it turn off whenever it wanted.  the connection where the USB connects to the screen in faulty.  So be aware yours might have the same issue. I'll have to end up applying pressure to it with tape which is not ideal....
Great picture quality. Little bit thicker and not as compact as I was hoping. Still love it though.
Very nice product.  Easily transported in computer bag.
Very happy with the purchase. Now I am using for couple of months without any issues. The case is very useful, helps to keep the screen scratch-free in my travel bag. I use 3-4 times a week.

review_title: Works great with my Samusung XE700T1A Windows tablet
review_body: It works great with my Samusung XE700T1A Windows tablet. I can use the tablet flat on the desk with the screen up right behind it. All of my Windows apps are opened on the AOC screen while I keep one note open on the tablet so I can take notes.  Response is reasonable with a bit of lag but it meets all my needs quite well.
I use this as a second monitor at home and when I travel for work. It's light weight, good size, good screen, I use it even more than I intended to.
Great 1080p IPS Monitor. managed to OC to 75hz, max 78hz but 79 doesn't post. I would give it 5 stars but no vesa mount compatibility.
Purchased two monitirs. Fast delivery, goid color and picture.  Would recommend.

Perfect monitor for me. I use this monitor for gaming, as well as just every day computer work. Very high quality (especially for the price). great size. No bleeding on the edges of mine as i saw in other reviews. Probably the best monitor that you can get for this price. Good job Acer.

review_title: Great picture quality and I couldn't find a better price
review_body: Product exactly as described, only thing I wish it was bigger. I wanted one to match my other monitor, but they are off in size slightly. Great picture quality and I couldn't find a better price!

Bought this to replace an older Acer monitor that didn't have an HDMI input. The visual quality on this one is superb. This monitor has a headphone  jack that can be used when connected via HDMI. However, if you want to use your computer's speakers, you have to disable this output.
just what we needed. Thank you
Simply Amazing. The edgeless is far cooler than I had expected. Easy 10/10.
ACER IS A REAL GOOD COMPUTER MON
great price, arrived when anticipated. very happy with this monitor.

review_title: Great monitor, does not come with HDMI, only VGA cable.
review_body: Crisp, clear, and bright screen. Works great with the laptop we bought it for. Only wish it came with the HDMI cable but can't knock it to much for that. Only reason for 4 / 5 stars.

review_title: Monitors yellowish tint cannot be corrected.
review_body: Just received two of these to add to a 5 monitor setup which already included 2 Asus VS228H monitors that I bought in July, 2014.  Unfortunately the two new ASUS monitors do not have the color quality that the old ones have.  The white is very yellow, even with setting Color Temp. to cool or trying to manually adjust settings.  I am returning these and will replace with something else.  There is just no comparison with the other monitors when they are setup side by side.

I may be a bit biased, as I have long been a fan of this company's products, plus, this replaced an eight-year-old LCD monitor. That being said, I purchased two of the 23.6 inch monitors and absolutely love them. After tweaking the color settings a few times, I seem to have found a happy medium for general use. I have not experienced the light-bleed issues that some others have, and the vibrant color is vastly better than my previous setup. Every game I have thrown at it has looked great, as well as 1080p videos. Text and images are crisp and clear. All in all, this was an excellent purchase for this price range, and I might just buy a third to complete my triple-monitor setup!

I've been using this monitor for 4 or 5 years now, and it works well. No dead pixels, ever, and I like that the screen is not reflective. The only negative thing I have to say is that the AC adapter plug in the back is quite loose--so loose that it would disconnect the power! This is a pretty basic fault. I fixed the problem by wrapping Scotch tape around the plug to take up the extra space, so that it wouldn't be so loose. This did the trick and I have not had any problems since. Although I felt this was a good value for the quality of the monitor, it is ridiculous to have to play MacGyver at this price.

review_title: One bad pixel. I own another one of these (2
review_body: One bad pixel.  I own another one of these (2.5 years) and 0 bad pixels. I can live with it, and it might be fixable with jScreenFix.scr
Good size, good price, takes HDMI (many newer computers don't have the old fashioned VGA any more).

review_title: Display is very nice, stand is not.
review_body: I purchased this monitor a few years ago now and I'm still using it. Functionally, it's been awesome. The display is vivid and I don't find myself straining or with headaches at the end of the day. The only negative is the stand is VERY flimsy. Hopefully they've addressed that short-coming in newer releases of this monitor. But overall I'm pleased with my purchase of this LED monitor.
There are mixed reviews here. I took the dive and bought 2 of them for my set-up. I am not disappointed. I figured if i had an issue, I would just return them. Still happy 1 yr later.

I don't understand the 5 star reviews. While the picture is crisp on a still, any motion creates dark ghost images dragging behind the motion. I tested the monitor with different cables (HDMI, VGA) and connected it to different inputs on the computer. Comparing the same thing to another monitor and to an HD TV, the picture is awful. If I was only displaying stills, it would be acceptable, but for watching video of playing games, stay away from this monitor.

Great Monitor. Coming from an CFL back-lit monitor, I didn't realize how yellow the light was. The contrast on this unit is amazing and the white is incredibly white!! LED and quality of ASUS products. It's been posted before and is absolutely true but I'll repost. For better blacks and contrast in general, you will want to go into your settings and change the Digital Color Format from RGB to YCbCr444. This will make a big difference and the screen won't look washed out.

review_title: Not what you would expect from Asus
review_body: I bought two of these for a dual monitor setup.
Excelent...

review_title: Many better portable options out there - buyer beware
review_body: Awful. Does not work on a MacBook Pro as the comments suggest. Spent an hour on forums and web looking for drivers and all, ended up frying my Mac. You all should review and confirm comments if you’re going to leave them on the site. Many better portable options out there - buyer beware, you get what you pay for I guess.
Easy to use. Connect the usb cable and you’re good to go. Monitor has a great picture as well. Need a portable secondary monitor for travel, trainings, or use at home - this is your product.

The in depth reviews already posted pretty much say it all. Great mobile solution. Not the greatest resolution. My issue is I've had it less than a year and the monitor keeps disconnecting itself. Not sure if its bad cable that came with monitor and I can't seem to find replacement parts.

This is an excellent addition to my mobile office. You do have to get the angle right on portrait or you get the shimmering effect. Initially the 10ms refresh was extremely noticeable when I was moving the mouse around. Moving from my laptop to the monitor really got some getting used to. After a few days it's not as noticeable. Video works alright on it, I use it mostly in portrait for programming.
For a few bucks more you can get a better resolution and has the same features.

Love these monitors for work when I travel. Ended up buying a second one because I really need two monitors and liked it so much. Nice case. No need for power - uses computer for power. Can tilt at angle for your needs. Very nice.

review_title: The screen is great. It's nice and light to carry and comes ...
review_body: The screen is great. It's nice and light to carry and comes with a nice case.The problem is the cable and/or where the cable plugs into the screen. It's hit or miss sometimes and I really have to mess with it to get it to work.

review_title: The build quality of this display is extremely poor. It is flimsy and weak
review_body: The build quality of this display is extremely poor. It is flimsy and weak. Display quality is good and bright, so if you don't plan to travel with this display, it's perfect. I ended up going with a competitors USB display.

Not as good as I expected, but still a useful tool.  I thought it would be good enough to want to use regularly.  The quality is not ideal, and there is some lag so I will only be using when absolutely necessary.  Also, I am unable to access any configuration settings for the monitor on my Windows machine.  The extended desktop configuration defaults to the screen being to the right of my laptop (same side as my external mouse, so not ideal).  I don't see any way to change this so the screen can be used on the left side of my laptop (obviously you can position the screen on the left, but you have to drag the mouse to the right to access it).

exactly what i was looking for 24" monitor upgrade. fast response time , great color, rimless design. I'm just a carpenter but this works for me and my budget . Acer or amazon has not let me down yet thanks.
It monitors my 'puter.

review_title: This is a great monitor, no glare and beautiful color
review_body: This is a great monitor, no glare and beautiful color. I've had zero issues with it. I'm planning on getting another soon.

review_title: awesome do far it's been 3 months
review_body: Bought 2 of this for a dual monitor setup, awesome do far it's been 3 months, multitasking made easy.
Overall:

This is a great monitor -- colors and images are sharp and vivid.  Can't beat it for the money.  However, the colors are not calibrated consistently between monitors.  I started with two and the colors did not match from one monitor to the other.
It isn't worth that price. As you can see, a lot of light is coming out.
I purchased three of these and the picture is perfect. Thin bezel is a plus. You won't be disappointed with these monitors.  I do wish they had Vesa mounts but I'm not going to complain.

review_title: Looks great. I replaced a broken monitor and wish I ...
review_body: Looks great.  I replaced a broken monitor and wish I would have bought two.  My other monitor looks yellowish compared to this one.

review_title: good price. Have had no problems (almost a year ...
review_body: Crisp image, good price. Have had no problems (almost a year now).

review_title: Great looking monitor, its a LCD screen with LED backlit in a perfect gloss black 1080p resolution
review_body: Great looking monitor, its a LCD screen with LED backlit in a perfect gloss black 1080p resolution and the price is perfect.

Oldest son and I built ourselves some new gaming systems.  Originally we ordered 2 refurbished 23" monitors from another company and both arrived dead.  Returned them and bought these for not much more and they are great.  They have a vivid picture, easy to use controls, adjustable base for proper viewing angle, and every pixel is working in both of them.  I spent at least two days looking at various websites and in the stores, and if you are trying to narrow down which monitor you are looking for, then your journey has ended and you have found the answer right here. Wonderful monitors.

review_title: Great Monitor at a Great Price.
review_body: This Monitor is Great! 100% Crystal clear and 0 Dead pixels or any other problems. I have owned this for a month now and it still is working great. I am running it off of DVI right now. I will be buying the second one today as the 20$ rebate they offer expires 10/31/2014. (I am still waiting on the first rebate, but that is normal. They did say up to 8 weeks). If you pay 2$ they will rush you the rebate.

I Iike this monitor a lot. Does the job. I did not experience any trouble with the backlight bleeding but am in total agreeance about the stand. It's a pretty wobbly assembly and isn't a very sturdy setup for the width of the screen. I also found the screen adjustment control to be pretty horrible to use and the wobbly stand doesn't help this. Luckily you'll probably only use the control once at setup. As with most panels and TV's this thing is fully torqued up from the factory. Depending on the viewing distance I would highly recommend going into setup and reducing the brightness and contrast right away. Very nice picture and can't beat the price!!
I bought this to replace my old 32" TV that I was using as a monitor.

I purchased this monitor to use with an ASUS Chromebox. The box mounts nicely on the back of the monitor. The monitor itself has nice color  and contrast out of the box - no real adjustments needed. There are no speakers on this model if that is important for your setup. I'm using headphones or a Bluetooth speaker with the Chromebox, so no big deal for me. The price, including the ASUS rebate made this an attractive buy. Besides the HDMI port, I occasionally use the VGA input from a Windows Netbook.
Have been using the monitor for about 4-5 days.

review_title: Great for the price, bright and great resolution
review_body: I spend a lot of time working on my computer with multiple windows open, I had a dual 19inch monitor setup and replaced one of the monitors with this.

Not bad. We bought this as a gift for our sight-impaired mother to help her see emails. The matte screen helps, reducing glare, but not quite as much we'd hoped. Still, it's better than what we had before, so it was worth the expediture.  Overall, it's a sturdy montitor and does the job.

Bought two of these. #1 worked fine at first. #2 was getting random flashes in random areas of the screen, spanning the entire width. I switched cords and ports and it was always the #2 monitor with the problem. Sent it back and got a 2nd #2 monitor with the same issue. Then #1 started going black for an instant at random. Gave up. Sending them both back.

review_title: I like how the screen is simply plug and play like ...
review_body: I like how the screen is simply plug and play like all USB devices. Still amazed at how one USB port can power this IPS screen. The necessary hassle for this superb screen would be that it needs an additional software to adjust the screen brightness.
Purchased for travel and home use. It was easy to setup. Screen is sharp and makes working with multiple windows a breeze.

review_title: Nice monitor if you never need to to make adjustments to the screen.
review_body: Works great.  Just no buttons for screen adjustment; all through Windows.  So far, no assistance provided to get access to those screen adjustments.

Works well. But make sure you have access to download the software of your using a company computer. It wouldn't load on my work computer because my company wouldn't allow it. Had to use my personal computer for it to work.
great idea but the resolution isn't awesome/clear. Recommend getting a higher resolution 2nd monitor

review_title: ... full HD and a slimmer profile will stand up better. I had this for a few months and ...
review_body: I think the versions with full HD and a slimmer profile will stand up better. I had this for a few months and cracked the screen. A portable monitor needs a little bit more protection for the front with a case or something. It works well, but broke too soon for my liking. I would opt for something smaller in the future as well. 17" sounds nice, but it is large.

review_title: No longer working after just 3 months  - waste of $$
review_body: I am so disappointed with this monitor.  I bought this light weight monitor to take with me on business trips, but less than 3 months after i purchased it, the screen no longer works (just streaky lines).  I had some glimmer of hope as this has a 3 year warranty, but I tried the website listed on the warranty information and it is showing as no longer valid, and i called their customer service number and after a long wait was dumped into a message service.  I think i just threw $100 down the toilet...

review_title: This is a great little monitor
review_body: This is a great little monitor. Very portable, good picture easy to use with a single USB. There is a brightness setting on the next series up, but I prefer a dimmer picture, so I lean it back. Those who desire a blazing screen, here you go. Really a great product!

review_title: Very light and compact making ti great for travelling
review_body: Loving this monitor. Very light and compact making ti great for travelling. I use it for work and it does it job perfectly without any issue. Plug and play, although its better to install the driver like i did.
I travel for work frequently and when I am out of the office I miss my Matrix-like triple 21" screen set up. This was the largest, portable, USB-powered monitor I could find.

review_title: works perfect out of the box and colors are good
review_body: works perfect out of the box and colors are good. no dead pixels found. the auto port detect takes some time but still a good monitor.
Great Value! Works as expected with no quality issues.

review_title: Great monitor but not meant for PS4 or XBOX mostly PC
review_body: This monitor is only meant for a computer monitor, it's not meant really for a Playstation 4, or Xbox One monitor. So if you're looking for a good TV I would not suggest this one. I kind of made a mistake on buying this one thinking that I was a TV so I just rushed and bought it cuz I was looking for a cheaper price... There is no audio on the monitor at all, all you use is a speaker to plug it in, so in my opinion is not really worth it or unless you want to save money and buy it it's your choice. I am happy with the monitor though has great picture quality. That's basically it have a great day...

Very happy with this product.  It is everything as guaranteed in the product sheet.  The clarity is super and it is really light weight.  If I ever needed another one to add for multiple display, I would get another.

review_title: Great monitor for content creation but has its flaws
review_body: Great monitor for content creation but has its flaws, #1 so far there is a lot of back light bleed, #2 you can not mount it on a wall or a monitor arm and #3 if your going to use a webcam, it will cover some of the screen. But this is still a great monitor for much better viewing angle and a much natural image than of a TN monitors.
Good quality, bright screen, great price. Very happy with my purchase
My son loves it.

review_title: Stop looking, this is the one!
review_body: I replaced an older monitor that had started to occasionally flicker.
Great picture quality and design.  Only complaint is that the placement of the screen adjustment buttons.  The buttons are small and beneath the bezel making it difficult to press the correct one.
Well, before the year was up, my monitor has turned bright green, and so far the tech support offered at Acer is almost nonexistant.

review_title: The product is too delicate. Reason I bought this ...
review_body: The product is too delicate. Reason I bought this was because we have employees who are on road a lot so having a portable screen really helps. This is the second time I bought this screen and both the times the product didn't last more than few weeks.

review_title: Bad experience using this with MacBook
review_body: Very blurry - price is good but the product is not very functional.

review_title: Works great. It dislike that if you sit under the ...
review_body: Works great. I dislike that if you sit under the monitor and look up at it, you can see the screen waving and refreshing but it still works. If you look down at it or look at it straight on you never see the refresh rate. It is portable and works great. A does on rare occasions have issues with gifs but that might also be my computer.

review_title: Nice appearance, good size doesn't work
review_body: Monitor wont charge/ come on with laptop have tried updating drivers etc still wont work..

review_title: Coolest Thing in Meetings (But order a Micro USB 3.0 Cord)
review_body: This is terrific.  I travel with everywhere I go and run dual screens.  In meetings, this is the coolest thing people have seen.

review_title: Works just fine for me with auto-install on Win 8 I can ...
review_body: Works just fine for me with auto-install on Win 8
Love it. It's extremely portable and the resolution works great. It's also the perfect size. It also works flawlessly, unlike the ViewSonic one I only keep having issues with.
I LOVE THIS THING. It's so lightweight and worked right away, no issues at all. :D

review_title: The screen was kept in the pouch provided and kept ...
review_body: The screen was kept in the pouch provided and kept next to the laptop at all times. After only four days use the screen is cracked internally without any external sign of damage. It is far too fragile for daily use by a college student.

Very nice USB Monitor! It is use for an addition monitor as needed. Easy to connect, the display is very clear. Even when used outside the display was clear. I highly recommend the purchase. It was worth the $$
I have 4 Asus 27 inch monitors in my home, this one was a gift and is reportedly working well.

Image quality is good, and text is sharp but the colors are a bit washed out, surprising since my AOC monitor has very good color, and was cheaper. Not to mention feel a bit more premium as well, However the Asus montior is better look and has less motion blur. So yea.

I ordered this monitor to go with my desktop and am happy with my choice. The package arrived quickly, and offered decent protection for the monitor inside (as well as a nice handle by which to carry it with!). The product was easy to unbox and assemble, and didn't require any tools other than my hands.

Would have given 5 stars but there was a scratch about 1.5" long in the middle of the screen!!! All the factory packaging was in place so I'm guessing it's ASUS's fault (It arrived in a ASUS sealed Pkg.)!? I removed the scratch using the white eraser trick (google it) and that was sufficient. Just didn't want to bother with the return.

If you're buying this specifically because you don't want a glossy screen you might want to order some gaffer's tape to cover the bezel while you're at it, and some kind of ballast or bracket to stabilize the display - the provided base is quite wobbly and just typing on a keyboard on the same desk was enough to make it shake until I stabilized it with a stack of paperbacks.  Secured and bordered with black masking tape (or with the bezel otherwise de-glossed) this display is a decent value.... though if you do any kind of graphics work for a living you'll want to try before you buy.

One of the best monitors I've owned, and I've had a lot of them. The short and sweet is that the build quality is good, design is nice, and it was cheaper than others. The buttons are .. well.. buttons, I hate touch screen monitors where you have to tap some region to turn them on or off, they never work right ( Dell .. ahem! ).. It also has a good energy saving mechanism, unlike others... It was light and easy to mount on my monitor arm. ( Currently I am sporting two of these and two Dell S2440L )

review_title: The picture is amazing on this
review_body: Bought this for Christmas for my husband, and he loves it.  The picture is amazing on this, and he says he has definitely noticed that his gaming has improved because it cut way down on the lagging he was experiencing.
Good images, using with a Mac Mini.

Good monitor, no missing pixels, clear display.  However the screen has a green cast to it.  Not a biggy, 'cause I don't do a lot of photography.  I would have given it 4 stars, but it does not support VESA brackets.  There are dimples where the screws should go, but no threaded inserts.  Fortunately, I had space on my desk for it, and used my Acer monitor on the bracket.

review_title: I like the IPS and the dimensions are not too big ...
review_body: I like the IPS and the dimensions are not too big to give a headache.  Course if you sit on a bed to watch things from this monitor then you'd wish you had a bigger one but working on the computer from like a distance of an arm's length it's perfectly fine.

I am still pleased with the monitor.  I use it occasionally.  I updated my laptop to Windows 10 a couple of weeks ago and later discovered that I was not able to use the monitor.  But I went to Displaylink web site and read up on the upgrade to Windows 10, followed their steps (uninstalling the software, running their clean-up, then installing their new software).  My monitor works fine now with Windows 10.
so so quality with not so sharp image quality. will not recommend .....

review_title: Not as slimline as expected but works well.
review_body: Its just ok.  I hoped to have more slimline and easier transport but it works well.

I have had this product for not even three months and now the monitor is intermittently losing power and continually shutting down making my work day stressful. I am also being told that I can not exchange it for a new one and have to buy a new one. Why would I buy a new one when the first one was new and only worked for about three months. This product looks like a good deal, but it is not going the distance I would have liked.

review_title: ... monitors to use with my laptop and I absolutely love them. I use them vertically
review_body: I ordered two of these monitors to use with my laptop and I absolutely love them. I use them vertically, and there is some issues with the viewing angle when used this way, and the resolution is obviously not 1080p when compared to my laptop screen, but these monitors also never claimed to be HD. What I can say is that for the price, these monitors perform great, they feel durable and still lightweight, and they have become a new product I can't live without.

review_title: Does not work with newest Macbook Pro 15
review_body: Bought this just a few months ago and this will not work on my new Macbook Pro 15. I have installed all necessary drivers from the AOC site and am still experiencing issues.

review_title: Had to send back. The software was causing problems ...
review_body: Had to send back.  The software was causing problems with my HP laptop PC drivers.  It might work with other computers - just not mine with the Windows 9 operating system.
Brightness cannot be adjusted on windows 10

Works exactly as designed when connected to my ASUS mini laptop.  It's a little expensive, but looks nice and works well.  I hope to see the price come down a little in the future because I have other applications where this unit will work perfectly.  I'm surprised that there isn't more competition out there.

review_title: I love it so much I use it at home too
review_body: I am a consultant so I travel with this all the time (it comes with its own carrying case and built in kick stand that is very secure).  I have dual monitors on the road just plug into my USB port.  Fits in with my laptop.  I love it so much I use it at home too! Just as fast as a regular monitor (I am not a gamer) but I do spread one spreadsheet across both screens and there is no delay.  Love this thing!!
I have to say the screen is better than what I expected and can support PS4, actually, the frame is very thin making the screen looks cooler. It  even performs good with PS4.
Really like this monitor.  Bought it for my daughter after purchasing a new PC for her.  Makes my older HP monitor look dull.
Very good picture great value for price
Very nice , would buy again.

review_title: Thin profile, sturdy base, nice looking monitor!
review_body: Sturdy base, very thin profile and screen border. Great purchase!
Good, clear display with tons of brightness. Very thing and light, and it has a large display area for it's small overall size. I'm very pleased with it, especially for the price.
great monitor for the price.
great!
This monitor is awesome. It has a great look and feel. The  screen is very clear and crisp. I would by another if I could.
great value and size, good quality

I've only had this monitor for a week, so take this all with a grain of salt. I will update it if there are any changes (bleeding or otherwise). So far it's a pretty good monitor. My only gripe is with some text that appears somewhat blurry with the 1920x1080 settings (and with text jacked up to medium sized). It's rare, but there are some sites/screens where this happens. I also had to turn down the brightness as the out-of-box settings were incredibly vibrant. I will probably tweak the settings to optimize them (eventually).

So, this monitor is great! Absolutely love using it! The colors are fantastic and the clarity is wonderful! Has all the inputs i need(VGA, HDMI, DVI) and even a headphone output for sound. Ive used this for both my gaming PC and for my xbox 360 and there has been no lag whatsoever. Everything is so crisp and clear. I recommend if you need something awesome but not super expensive.

review_title: Good while they work but customer support is a rabbit hole
review_body: I agree with others that this is a good monitor. That said, there are lots of good monitors. What differentiates a company is what they do when something goes wrong. And to be fair, had the monitor continued working I wouldn't have written a review, so my motive here is simply a caveat emptor for others.

I bought this monitor for my desktop computer after using a plasma TV for a while.  While not as crisp as the picture on a Panasonic Vierra, it's an excellent monitor for the money.  The picture quality is great. Differentiation between colors is very crisp and the brightness sensitivity allows for a lot of customized view settings.

This is my first HD Monitor and it makes everything look more real. I am enjoying all of my games as if new because I am seeing and noticing things I never did before. Absolutely a stunningly beautiful picture.

This is a very nice monitor. It has a nice clean image with many adjustments and presets that allow you to configure the image to your taste or room lighting. Some people have mentioned a tendency for the unit to wobble when touched or when typing on the keyboard. I find that when touched it doesn't wobble any more than many other screens and it damps down quickly in any case. As to wobbling when you type. Get a sturdier desk. I have had no such problems.  I especially like the 3 year parts and labor including shipping warranty.  This monitor replaces a flat screen CRT that I have had for many years and kept because it was very high end monitor. Unfortunately it is only 17" and then time had come for something bigger. I find the images crisp and the 2ms response time is great for gaming which is my primary activity on this system.  All in all I would recommend this monitor highly.

review_title: Right out of the Box - 5 minutes - Works Perfectly!
review_body: I just received my new ASUS monitor from Amazon.  I immediately opened the box, took the monitor out and put the base on it - about 2 minutes - added the power cord and HDMI cable and in less than 5 minutes, all connected and working perfectly.  The monitor is thin and has a great resolution.  I hooked it to a new ASUS laptop that I received on Monday and this monitor has a much better picture and resolution than the laptop - both are High Resolution.

Excellent overall picture quality. The color reproduction is very good, but not the best, and the screen isn't the brightest thing, but the screen is devoid of any artifacts, color skews, chromatic aberration, contouring, and LED leakage (all problems I've previously had). I do not notice the backlight side leakage that is common with IPS displays. Lastly, the contrast is excellent under low light conditions.

Just started working from home. Was given a 20inch acer that died almost immediately. I bought two of these originally and liked them so much I just bought a 3rd. Great picture, love being able to switch inputs. Great product.

I bought this monitor to put on my desk and hook my xbox one to it. It is the perfect size for console gaming. It has an excellent response rate to minimize input lag and the size is just right so that you dont have to move your head all around the screen to see. I feel like it really does make me a better player at first person shooter games, mainly Call of Duty Ghosts. The picture is extremely clear, color depth is excellent, and the LED lighting is awesome. Only downside is the monitor tends to wobble more than it should when my desk it bumped but thats not really an issue. If this monitor was $200, I would still have bought it. I am going to buy another very soon to replace the monitor that I use with my computer. Highly recommend.

I just ordered this for someone else.  She received it today and told me that it works, but there's a high pitch noise which is a little annoying.  I know how annoying such a sound can be so I gave it 3 stars, otherwise, I'd probably rate it higher.
I love this monitor. I've connected it to my laptop to add desk-top realistate. And it has worked out really well. Well worth the price.

review_title: ... clear-and it has none of those fussy cords- the best thing is this screen is super light- it makes ...
review_body: this is awesome- The image quality is very clear-and it has none of those fussy cords- the best thing is this screen is super light- it makes working remotely even more possible!

review_title: Good Monitor for laptop traveling with dual screens
review_body: These are very nice and convenient.  i saw someone with it about a year ago and just now had a reason to get one.  I am glad I did.  I plugged it right into my Windows 7 computer and the device was installed without a needing a disk and worked almost immediately.

review_title: It was a little annoying to set up
review_body: It was a little annoying to set up, but other than that, it works perfectly and works as described. It is so much easier having a second screen while working from home.
I use this as a second screen for demos on the road.  Would love to try the larger unit but this works great. Easy to find the Mac drivers as well.  Cable is included.

review_title: Poor power source - doesn't turn on
review_body: I was unable to get this monitor to power on. The only power source is through the USB cord. Even with all USBs plugged in and my computer plugged in as well, the best I could get was a flashing screen. I even tried two different monitors and two different computers and had the same problem in all cases.

review_title: Constantly malfunctions, incompatible with cord extensions 9 times out ...
review_body: Constantly malfunctions, incompatible with cord extensions 9 times out of 10, cord I got with it was faulty. Not worth the money spent. Already looking at different products.
Perfect but I knew this because a relative has one.  Shipped quick, easy to install and works great.

We have bought 3 of these to use with our laptops on field audits, because we are paperless, and love them.  They're light, sturdy, no set up issues with our Dell laptops.  Have migrated them from Windows 7 to Windows 10 with no hiccups.  I even dropped mine on my office floor and the screen separated from the assembly, and I snapped it back together, and it "kept on ticking".  I came back to the website to see if they had come out with a larger screen, yet.  That's my only complaint; we'd like a 22".

I bought 2 monitors and Both of them work great the definition is great and the images are crisp and clear. Best thing I like that they have a gaming mode for the lighting and that they are super light weight.

review_title: Had it about a week and it looks great, it turned out to be a good size ...
review_body: Had it about a week and it looks great, it turned out to be a good size at 24".

I've owned a pair of 2 of these monitors and I'd have to say that they're pretty decent. They're not perfect but if you're going for perfect then you're definitely going to want to go with the more expensive monitor. The matte finish on the screen is nice for preventing glare and fingerprints. There is a little but of backlight-bleed towards the sides and corners of the screen, and the color on either monitor is not exactly the same.
