Overall they are pretty decent, but I'm not sure if they were worth the non-sale price of around 170$ each.

UPDATE 2! Continuation of the praise: I got the monitor back from MainteQ America in Fontana after about a week and a half of waiting. They fixed the one I sent them, and so far it's working like a charm. I must have had a small faulty part or something, but I'll never know because they didn't tell me. They shipped it back extremely well packaged, and for free. I still rate the monitor 10/10 in terms of quality/price.

Yea.. "Wow" Pretty much sums it up.  I had an Acer 22" before this one and thought that was nice, then decided to give a family member the Acer monitor and replace mine with this unit.  The difference is night & day.  The colors are so vivid and everything just pops out at you.  I love the 1080p resolution.  I currently have the monitor hooked up via DVI from my PC and everything looks perfect @ 1080p.  bright whites, black blacks and everything in-between.  No dead pixels, the monitor is packed and secured nicely.  Super easy to hook up, no monitor wobbling when I'm typing.  I've only had it a day (Ordered it yesterday via Amazon Prime!) but I'm loving everything about it so far.

review_title: Five years on, it's still working perfectly.
review_body: Purchased 5 years ago, still working perfectly.  The only thing I could desire for my needs would be a better dimness control.  Other than that, it's been a great monitor, a good value.
As usual, ASUS created a solid product that worked exactly as expected. ASUS electronic products contain the best firmware software to control logic functions. That includes PC motherboards.

If you get a monitor that works properly this is a beautiful monitor for gaming and watching movies, but I'm giving this 4 stars because my husband and I both bought one and the one I received made my gaming look grainy with any movement. I exchanged it and had the same problem with the next one, but had no problem when I plugged in my husbands monitor to my computer, so I finally just returned mine and bought a different monitor all together.

Great bang for the buck, best value in an eIPS in this class. I needed a 21.5" monitor with VESA mount compatibility to squeeze under a hutch and this is EXACTLY the right size. Great picture quality; color gamut not quite as good as my old true IPS Dell UltraSharp, but definitely good enough for my needs and half the price. No dead pixels, no backlight issues. Lower the default brightness setting for best results.

review_title: Two monitors in a row arrived DOA.
review_body: Trying to buy this monitor has proven to be a horrible experience.  The first one arrived DOA; it would not power up.  Amazon sent me a replacement; same problem.  Trouble shooting with a computer tech revealed that it had a bad power cord.  We determined this by plugging it's power cord into a monitor that I knew worked.  But that was not the whole problem.  The monitor still would not work when I plugged in a power cord that I knew to be good.  Two monitors in a row arrived dead.  Unfortunately,.I was planning to use this monitor as a 2nd screen to increase my productivity editing films.  Instead, it has cost me time, money, and aggravation. Since ASUS usually produces good products, I have to assume that they have just built a bad batch and I would stay away from their monitors for awhile.

review_title: Screen looks absolutely amazing; would definitely buy again for the very small ...
review_body: Wish it was mountable, it isn't. Screen looks absolutely amazing; would definitely buy again for the very small bezel.
Great entry level monitor, the images are sharp and refresh quick.
Great monitor. I use it for work, major upgrade form what I had. I would definitely recommend, and maybe even buy a second soon.
beautiful screen. very clear. i bought this for my husband to online game. He loves it!
Love it.
good
Son loved. Given as a gift.
Added so I have two screens together works beautifully

review_title: Worth the price and then some.
review_body: This monitor is beautiful. Everything I throw at it looks phenomenal. Aesthetically the monitor is slim and sleek. Great overall product from Acer. For the price, I would recommend buying 2 of these. Be warned, the monitor only comes with a VGA cable, so plan accordingly. It isn't really an issue though, as Amazon sells solid cables for decent prices.
I got this on sale and it is really nice

review_title: Satisfactory screen with very little lag.
review_body: I use this as a second monitor to view documents and work on excel files.  The lag is not bad at all.  The image quality isn't the best, but as a secondary monitor used only every now and again, I don't mind not having an IPS quality screen.  For the price, it can't be beat!
So far so good - day zero, hour 1.  If you're on Windows 10 - Try this link if the driver that comes on the CD doesn't work.  http://www.displaylink.com/downloads/windows

review_title: Simple to setup and works great so far
review_body: This is exactly what I was expecting and needed. I'm using it as a second screen for my laptop in my home office. Simple to setup and works great so far.

review_title: The plug end that fits into the monitor on all of them has been difficult to plug in and falls out very easily.
review_body: Have purchased several of these and they generally work as expected.  One weak point:  The plug end that fits into the monitor on all of them has been difficult to plug in and falls out very easily.

I bought this as a second monitor for my desk. The screen works great. Can play videos without an issue the stand puts it at just the right angle for me. Only issue I ran into was that the cable where it connects into the back of the monitor is very loose so if you accidentally hit the screen or move the wire it gets disconnected very easily.

Bought this on September 15th and it is not working on November 21st.  Only took two months to stop working.  i took very good care of it, and only traveled with it twice.  very disappointed and would really appreciate a refund or replacement.
I use this with a Dell Latitude 3470 running Windows 10 and it works great. Have been very happy after using twice a week for past couple of months.

review_title: Monitor stopped working second time I used. This is ...
review_body: Monitor stopped working second time I used. This is the second one of these monitors. The first one had issues with the connection but using duct tape I as able to use as a travel monitor. Was reluctant to by a replacement. Reached out to the company and was assured they had fixed the issue. Definitely can say that the issue has not been fixed. Incredibly disappointing and frustrating.

There is virtually no support for this product by the manufacturer. It either works or it doesn't and if it doesn't, well you just bought a $100 dollar boat anchor. Buyer beware! I have a Dell Latitude E7470 and I've wasted hours trying to get it to work. I've connected it to other PCs and it worked on a different model Dell laptop but not my wife's desktop.
The cord disconnects every 2 minutes. Now I am in need of a second screen before I go on a business trip. What a let down. hopefully my cord was just defective.
This is a beautiful, crisp monitor.  Looking back my only regret was not going bigger!

review_title: Quality monitor... with a caveat for Mac users
review_body: Cool monitor, beautiful image display.  Crisp and colorful, feels like a much more expensive product.

I've had this since mid 2015 and it still works perfectly, Besides the fact that there's no speakers (I use my Polk headphones so there's no problem) everything works great, I use it for my PC gaming, Regular PC use and Xbox one gaming, If I turn off my xbox/PC and leave the monitor on it goes into a weird sleep/hibernate mode and turns itself back on when I turn on my Xbox/PC, I thought this feature was pretty cool, All in all its a great monitor, Is/was a great price and I would recommend anyone to buy it.

I bought this monitor 5 months ago, and the display went dead intermittently a few weeks ago. I thought nothing of it, until it started happening more often and I had to shake the thing to death to get it working.

review_title: They are a great monitor, have never had any problems
review_body: I have 3 of these monitors now that I use on a daily basis for work.  They are a great monitor, have never had any problems, and the colors, resolution and operation are great.  I think that the form factor looks really great, especially if you mount them on a monitor mount (mine are on a dual monitor mount).  They are a crazy high def cinema display, but for normal everyday use as a computer monitor they are perfect.  I would easily recommend this monitor to anyone.

review_title: Nice monitor. The rebate makes you jump through hoops
review_body: Nice monitor. The rebate makes you jump through hoops, though; non-responsive and irritating. First ya gotta fill it out online, then decide if you want it in less than 8-10 weeks, it'll cost you a dollar. Then ya gotta print it out AND attach all the credentials...then mail it in! Obviously not worth the time, the ink, the paper, the stamp, the envelope, the dollar, AND the irritation for a $9 rebate. Ya got me this time, Asus!

I use this with my Xbox One X. It works really good and easy to adjust. It's a good buy if you need or want something inexpensive, but reliable. It has a 60 Hz refresh rate which is the same as my 55" 4k Smart TV. So this works perfect for me.

Edit: I hate to do this, but I may have jumped the gun regarding the tartan problem. It appears to be either driver related or the fault of my HD 7970. Apologies. One star added, it's a great value, so long as it's working properly. Customer service was pretty quick to get back to me, and despite a small language barrier, got me on the right path to resolving it.

Great monitor that my wife uses for her home office with a Mac Air.  Only 2 stars because the rebate program is bogus.  I followed the instructions and cut off the only UPC code and bar codes present on the box.  The rebate was denied due to: 'Required Documentation missing-Original UPC AND Serial Number Barcode Labels'.  My guess is they use any excuse possible to avoid paying the rebate.

review_title: I figured I would upgrade and see how it goes
review_body: I wanted to wait a while to see how things go before i write a review.

review_title: Product is great. There was less border around the edges that ...
review_body: Product is great. There was less border around the edges that i expected, making it look very stylish. I got 2 of these for a duel screen setup and the picture looks amazing. Would buy again. -1 star because the delivery was late, but otherwise would be a 5.

I love this monitor so much! The picture quality is fantastic! For the price of this monitor, it is worth the buy for sure. There is some bleaching in my monitor on the sides and it used to bother me at the beginning, but when you use the monitor all the time you forget about them. When getting another monitor I will definitely buy this item.
Love this monitor, got it at a good price and is huge with a sharp picture, the stand could use a bit of work but overall for what i paid for it, it was a deal.
Super beautiful monitor especially for the price.  Watched 4K video on it and was more than impressed with the graphics.
great
I love the product!!

review_title: Great monitor, but it came in damaged packaging
review_body: Great monitor, but it came in damaged packaging, and there is what seems to be a plastic film peeling off the very corners.

review_title: but very pleased to his point
review_body: I haven't had the monitor long, but very pleased to his point.
I bought two of these monitors and both work excellent.
Love this monitor fits good and great price

review_title: Beware this is a USB only monitor, both for ...
review_body: Beware this is a USB only monitor, both for power and video input - there doesn't seem to be a way to display images from an HDMI source such as a digital camera or a Raspberry Pi.  So, if there isn't a driver for your system you are probably out of luck.

review_title: (Almost) Helped Me Solve a Special Problem...
review_body: Unfortunately, I ended up returning the AOC due to lots of connection drop-outs.  This may have been due to the length of USB 3 cable needed for my application (see below).  I ended up using an ASUS MB168B+ USB monitor (1920x1080 & considerably more expensive) for my application.  So I've dropped my rating from 5 to 3 stars.  Even so, the AOC has a built-in flip-out stand which the ASUS lacks.

review_title: When I got this I was very pleased. It was easy set up and did exactly ...
review_body: When I got this I was very pleased. It was easy set up and did exactly what I needed. However, I only used it twice and now it doesn't work anymore. So obviously I'm not pleased with that. I didn't pay that much money for something to only work twice. Possible I have a defective item:

review_title: If it were more durable it would be five stars.
review_body: This was initially exactly what I needed as a traveling consultant who moves office to office and meeting room to meeting room.  Unfortunately, the constant act of plugging and un-plugging soon rendered the USB connector inoperable.  It would be an excellent product if it were a little more durable.  My co-worker paid a little more for the ASUS monitor and it is still going strong.

No more strained eyes on the road, I can keep my dual screen setup while I'm traveling. It has a sharp display and is very light and easy to carry with USB plugin. I even set it up at work as a third monitor for my desktop, now everyone is jealous.
It has only lasted 5 months and is now useless. It will flash on but goes dead. Completely lifeless. I have tried numerous troubleshooting and driver updates and still dead.

review_title: This was the perfect way to add a second monitor for my macbook
review_body: Had to travel a bit for work. This was the perfect way to add a second monitor for my macbook. Super easy to install (I just googled "AOC e1659Fwu driver"), and it's actually lighter than my mac. Have used it a few weeks now and it's been super reliable. Screen could be brighter, but that's mainly because I'm using it next to my retina display. Worth the money.

review_title: A second monitor perfect for the road warrior
review_body: This is a life saver - a portable, second screen for my MacBook Pro. While it isn't on the same level as a Retina display - or similar high-end monitor - it is lightweight & reliable. No power supply needed, just a USB 3.0 port & a device driver.

Loved it for 6 months, used it a lot - probably 4 days a week on average. One day recently I plug it in and nothing. Dead. Nothing. I need another one and given the price I will probably buy the same again but I would love to know what went wrong.

We got this portable monitor two months ago for my husband to use with work.  He often needs to be able to to see things on two screens at once to get things done efficiently and save time.  He can connect this monitor to his laptop and view tasks on both screens.  It has a kickstand that is adjustable so you can get it set to just the right angle, or you can fold the kickstand down flat and lay the monitor flat or whatever you need to do.  The case is great to protect it from getting banged up or scratched when he puts it in his laptop backpack.  He says it works great, but the installation software disc that came with it didn’t work and he had to go to the website to get the download.  Occasionally he gets messages on his laptop saying something about the monitor not being compatible or something like that - I am sorry I don’t recall exactly what he told me the messages said, but he said it’s not really a problem because the monitor still works great, and he uses it a lot.s Portable LED Monitor w/ Case

This is a great monitor for general all-purpose use.  Plenty of real estate for word processing and spreadsheet applications.  I paired it with a 2 GB video card and really appreciate the picture quality for photo editing and web page design.  I do play the occasional online game and stream some video so, the HD capability performs nicely.  I kept the packing box for transporting the monitor to display my work to prospective customers and benefit from the little "tool-less" mounting screw in the base...thumbs up to the design engineers at Asus...no laptop could compete with the picture quality of this monitor. Price/performance ratio are spot on.

This is the best monitor i have ever had. I have sold computers for a living, i knew this monitor from my selling days and decided to purchase it. It has been the most durable monitor i have ever had in my life. Do you want to know just how durable this monitor is? One day my psycho girlfriend was mad at me for playing games for over 6hrs, so she decided to knee the monitor. To my surprise the monitor was still intact and worked like a charm. So i bought a second monitor, and again she gets mad at me for gaming, so this time she throws it off the desk...and well you guessed it, the monitor still is in the same shape it was from the day i bought. 10/10 would recommend. Might even purchase a 3rd.

review_title: but its off-axis viewing is terrible. If you go even slightly off to the ...
review_body: This monitor is an okay value for the price, but its off-axis viewing is terrible. If you go even slightly off to the side or above/below the right angle, the screen washes out or turns to shadows.
No dead pixels. I use this monitor for hardcore computer gaming in addition to console gaming.

review_title: light bleeding - now i got to return it -
review_body: I purchased, I found severe light bleeding coming from the bottom right corner of the panel. I trade and my background is black so I see it all the time and is very noticeable and distracting .

review_title: Good Price but 2 flaws I found
review_body: I mainly bought this monitor for the HDMI plug in for my xbox in my office. At the same time I'm also using it as a second screen on my PC. Price was good only two things I have an issue with. The plug-in for the power on the back of the monitor is very touchy. You move it a hair and your monitor loses power. I've had to constantly push the power cord back in several times just because I tilted my monitor a bit. Second issue have is I haven't even owned it a month and I can already see a dead pixel. Not a big thing but can be annoying sometimes since it looks like a red speck right in the center of the screen. Other than these two issues the monitor is well worth the price I paid.

The one I'm on is actually the second ASUS VS228H I had to get because the first one had three hot pixels stuck on the screen. If they were in an abandoned corner I might have been able to overlook them, but they were right in the center of my screen. Amazon thankfully made the return process quick and painless, and the two-way shipping was marvelous. They sent the new one, I set it up, and I sent the old one back with the provided return label. Easy.

I've had this for a month now, since I built my computer.  I was dubious about it at first due to the low price, but it really is pretty awesome!  Colors are vivid, the stand set-up was easy, and it has a nice number of inputs on it.  Has a headphones jack as well that comes in handy!  I am running mine via HDMI and love it.  Nice, non-glossy finish and is very sleek-looking!

review_title: Clear as hell, fast response. This is the ...
review_body: Clear as hell, fast response. This is the monitor to get if you just need a high quality barebones 1080/60 display.

review_title: Quality Product, can't beat the price
review_body: This is an excellent display for the price. I am using two of these monitors for a dual monitor setup with my ASUS Chromebox. I recommend this monitor if you are not concerned about frame rate and just need a monitor for productivity or internet browsing. PC Gamers may be disappointed with this monitor as this monitor only supports resolutions up to 1080P. Other than that, this is a great monitor. I have been using it regularly and I have had no issues.
Great buying experience!!! Highly recommended!!!
nice design and clear view. easy to install. simple
Have been enjoying this monitor
nice
Great quality for the price. I will get 2 more when I can afford it :)
Easy set up.  Looks wonderful.
As expected
WHAT A RELIEF!  IT'S ALL "RIGHT THERE" NOW.  WORKS BEAUTIFULLY!
Monitor is nice. Good color, pixel density, picture. However mine has started to flicker after just three months. Product quality may be an issue.
Great resolution, but the monitor went bad in just two months and Acer is making it pretty painful to get it fixed. I'm disappointed with the service, not the product itself.

review_title: Poor quality. Started having problems with it after less ...
review_body: Poor quality. Started having problems with it after less than a dozen uses since I use it infrequently it was well past the return date and was unable to return it.

Screen died in 2 months and they would not honor the warranty, said I damaged it in handling. I am  back to caring a standard LED screen which I have done for years with no failures. This screen is light, and easy to carry but I afraid not reliable and the company does not want to stand behind it. I would advice against purchasing one.

review_title: The screen turned out to be better than i expected
review_body: I bought this AOC screen to use it with my new laptop because a second screen would be really helpful while i am gaming, studying, programming and web designing. The screen turned out to be better than i expected. Its easy to install, arrived fast, even though it was thicker than i expected it is very light and i am easily able to take to college with me and back. It was also affordable and arrived way faster than i expected it to. I was able to install it on multiple computers easily so it deserves 5 stars.
works good a little on the dim side, Mac will need the latest driver...
Not Plug and Play. Beware.

review_title: Great for the the Road warrior
review_body: Been using it for a few months now. Great for the the Road warrior. Keep in mind, the morons at TSA think its an oversized tablet and WILL search it separately.
When it worked, it was great but four months after I purchased, it stopped working. Doesn't seem like its well built internally. I had it mounted to a stand.
Excellent value/quality monitor, I used it for work so mon-fri 8 hours daily and work perfect! I’m buying 2 more so I can used my Mac with 3 screens. 100% recommended

review_title: Not plug and play for all laptops!
review_body: I puechased this AOC monitor but it does not work well with my ASUS Taichi laptop. Although it says plug and play, it does not work. :( it works well with a Lenovo I used from my job, but now I need to use it with the ASUS and I am struggling with it. I assume it must be compatibility issues that AOC needs to improve.

review_title: Works for three weeks, then it stops
review_body: This product was great when...it worked for the first three weeks. I tried to reinstall the drivers many times and at most it worked once. So I just quit trying and I can't return it. The online help is poor.

I am a stock trader, so I installed a new set for my home. This are easy to use, the quality is very acceptable. It takes a little bit get the settings properly adjusted but you would not do this every day, so what a heck.

This is a very nice monitor.  Someone commented on the fact that when using the power button the whole monitor tilts with the pressure to push the button.  That is easily worked around.  Put your forefinger on the edge of the frame above the button and use you thumb to push the button, kind of like squeezing thumb and finger together.  There is very little movement in the stand that way.  I do wish I had bought a monitor with touch capabilities.  I had to buy a new computer since purchasing the monitor.  The backup OS is Windows 8.

review_title: absolutely great, except for the fact that the buttons on the bottom dont work!!!
review_body: im adding to this review:

Coming from a ten year old non-HD TN panel, this monitor almost brought me to tears. Colors are vibrant, and I love the quick access pre-set color options on the front (theater mode, gaming mode, scenic mode, etc). On top of it all, I was surprised just how light this monitor is when compared to the 19" flat panel display is replaced. The stand isn't the best as it's very wobbly, but there's a VESA on the back that will allow you to upgrade to a more steady platform if desired.
It's a fairly basic, no frills monitor.

review_title: Can hardly believe how great this thing is.
review_body: Wow. For the price I was definitely expecting something a bit.. cheaper? This thing has surpassed my expectations in pretty much every way, especially with such a low price tag. Beautiful display. As one of(if not numerous) the other consumers mentioned, I would definitely not stick with the default screen settings. I used a configuration listed on another review, and it worked wonders. If I was FORCED to nitpick to give the skeptics /something/ to run with, I'd say that the stand isn't the greatest thing ever, and it can lead to a screen that wobbles very easily; however, I would not let this deter you in the slightest because it's hardly something I notice unless I'm focusing intently on it. Very satisfied.
So glad I stepped up to an IPS monitor - makes me want to go through all my old photos again now that I can SEE them!

review_title: Great monitor at a great price
review_body: Great monitor!!  Very easy to hook any of my game machines (PS4. XBOX, etc.) as wel as my laptop.  Images are crisp and nice depth of color with some minor adjustments to the out-of-box settings.  Very happy overall and would definitely buy another.

review_title: Buzzing after 16 months of light usage.
review_body: Great monitor, but only lasted 16 months. On brighter screens with a white background you start to get a bad buzzing coming from the panel. Very disappointing. Pass on this for something of better quality like Viewsonic.

review_title: Great Price Point for Value - Technical Error in Specifications
review_body: This monitor is an excellent value for the price point, and I am general agreement with the favorable reviews.  I would like to add that if you drill down into the technical specifications on the Amazon listing it states:  "Ports and Connectivity VGA Video Out Ports: 1"  In fact there are ZERO video output ports on this monitor, they are all input ports (verified by ASUS support).  I was hoping to daisy chain another monitor to this one, but that is not possible without an additional splitter.

review_title: I shut it down for the weekend & the monitor seems better..
review_body: Ordered 2 back in October. about 1 month ago, 1 started getting a darkened picture that would not adjust. I shut it down for the weekend & the monitor seems better....fluke??? Overall, they have been great for the price paid.
Great screen. I really like how you can turn down the brightness a good amount. Seems to have a nice light to it. I have sensitive eyes and I'm glad I bought this product.
Good price. Nice size.
The specs are in the descriptions. I don't know what to write here other than that the descriptions are accurate.

Wanted to setup my home office with a dual monitor setup. The monitors look smaller online, but when I actually set them up in my office, they were a lot bigger than expected which is great for me! The quality is very clear too. Definitely worth it!
Easy to setup, easy to tilt and easy to use.
I purchased this monitor mainly just to watch movies on while I worked on my computer.  Once I figured out what I was doing , I really enjoy it now.
Excellent

Fantastic monitor for the price. Great quality picture, but keep in mind that it only comes with one type of cable so if you are setting up dual monitors, or have a mac, make sure that you use a thunder cable or order the proper adaptors.

Not much in this area on reviews on this monitor, so just want to say I plugged it in, Powered up my MacMini and was amazed.  I can see details in the shadows in brightly lit pictures.  The colors are vibrant. There is a headphone jack on the back so I guess it has sound, my speakers are plugged into my computer.  I did use a HDMI cable to connect, but it did come with a vga cable included.

review_title: Great price and easy to connect and install
review_body: Great price and easy to connect and install.  However, I would not send out a CD installation disk.  If you're like me, your laptop does not have a CD ROM drive.

review_title: Excellent second display for my laptop
review_body: I'm used to dual and triple monitors so when I travel, it's annoying to work on just one screen. This product fits neatly into my laptop backpack, is lightweight and works great. The kick-stand holds it at the perfect angle and it can be used in landscape or portrait mode which comes in very handy.

review_title: Though I took good care of this monitor it didn't matter
review_body: I purchased this monitor 3/16/16 for $99 and it is no longer working as of January 2017, cannot connect to the laptop. This is my second one in two years. Though I took good care of this monitor it didn't matter. This monitor is now selling for $149. I'm not inclined to make a third purchase.

review_title: Weird dead spot in the middle after a couple months ...
review_body: Weird dead spot in the middle after a couple months... I carry this around with me everywhere. Maybe something in my backpack poked it... Who knows.
once the software was loaded it lite up and i have been using every since.

review_title: Screen is great, Software & Driver works fine
review_body: Screen is great, Software & Driver works fine.  Brightness & Contract Good.  Love the USB3!

review_title: Too slow, don’t recommend for work
review_body: Extremely slow monitor, bought for work because I travel and work remote frequently and it was too slow to allow me to work efficiently. Returned immediately.

review_title: This product was horrible. Broke literally after one month of using it ...
review_body: This product was horrible. Broke literally after one month of using it because one of the pins of the usb cable broke off. Absolutely pathetic product. Buyer beware.

review_title: After a Month, cable connector loose.
review_body: The stand isn't very stable in environments with clutter. It collapsed a few times ending in scratches on screen. The cable connection on the back is not loose from a month of use. Pouch it comes with has no room for cable.

Got mine delivered yesterday to replace my old e1649 that the wife stepped on. Much slimmer profile, better stand, and the cable connection is much better. Not 5 stars because the resolution is funky, but for the price it is a great buy

Bought this for my work.  Every person who walks by it comments on how beautiful and big the picture is! Asus has always been a wonderful brand for me and this is no exception. Super fast at 1ms.  Black frame is gorgeous.  2 small cons (not enough to take away a star): 1) monitor does not go up and down 2) a bit flimsy - tends to wobble (very mild) if desk or whatever you have monitor on is not very stable. Would easily buy this again.

review_title: The mount itself was easy to assemble (just a screw with a twist cap ...
review_body: Asus VS228H-P/VS228 21.5 Inches Led Backlight Widescreen Monitor was delivered on time. It was packaged well for travel. The mount itself was easy to assemble (just a screw with a twist cap that goes into the bottom of the stand on the monitor). The product itself was delivered in great condition - no broken pixels, no dents,  dings, or scratches on the screen, frame, or mount. The picture is crisp and clear - gaming, videos, and general browsing all look really good. Highly suggest this monitor for gamers, photo editors, and graphic designers for its large/wide screen size. Only have had it for 3-4 days, but I will update this review if I run into any issues in the future.

Have yet to use the monitor as my PC hasn't arrived yet. But based on materials, fit and finish, and overall appearance I love it. Will look great with my speakers and set up. Will update review once I'm able to use it.

review_title: Looks washed out at beginning. Fix for that makes it really dark sometimes, but still looks great 90% of the time
review_body: Picture is washed out when you first turn on the monitor. I feel like its a common problem with newer monitors, but oh well. After about an hour of tweaking and adjusting the settings the picture is no longer washed out. However, the screen can be really dark for somethings (like screenshots of games, or a little dark in some games). It's like the monitor has an automatic adjuster, except it sucks (SmartView IS turned OFF). It's not terribly often, but is annoying when it does happen. Haven't found a fix yet. Other than that picture is crisp and the ports and features are nice. Build quality fine. 22'' screen is nice. And when the screen isn't really dark (maybe 90-95%) of the time, games and movies look great.

review_title: Nice monitor, great for gaming... love that it has built in speakers
review_body: This is a very nice monitor for the price.

Bought for my gamer son. He loves it. Thinks it is the perfect gamer monitor. No blurring, no issues with any game he plays. Only minor complaint is about the ASUS $10 rebate. ASUS "lost" the mailed Amazon invoice that was attached to the UPC and rebate form. They processed the UPC and rebate form. Offer to email PDF proof of what was mailed was rejected as the ASUS rebate processor doesn't accept emails. Had to reprint Amazon invoice and mail it again. I hope they process that one. They graciously gave me 30 days to fix their error.  I would suggest ASUS process rebates more carefully, unless that was a rebate avoidance tactic. AND I would suggest ASUS join the 21st century and accept emails for rebate issues.

review_title: I bought this monitor used, and apparently used in ...
review_body: I bought this monitor used, and apparently used in this context means, comes without essential components and partially functioning. I had to spend about 3 days finding the screw that connects the base of the monitor to the stand from aces hardware, only to be greeted by flickering green pixels once I found the replacement screw. Apparently the monitor wasn't capable of rendering certain colors. I took the liberty of testing my monitor again to make sure it wasn't my Graphics card (GTX 970), and coming as shock to absolutely nobody, it wasn't, as my 6 year old Dell monitor was able to display the image without any green flickering pixels using the same DVI input. Do be wary of buying from the Amazon Warehouse or whatever they call their used product delivery service, your mileage will vary.

review_title: This monitor is out of this world.
review_body: I really love this monitor a lot.

One thing id like to say is that the stand is not that small like others have said its just right for the size of the monitor, it wouldn't like that great if the stand was taking alot more space than it currently does. The stand was easily screwed in the Monitor has Standard mode - game mode - night view mode - theater mode - scenery mode that changes the look of the display. The speakers it has are not really good so I will not be using them.
I did a lot of looking around and read a lot of reviews. This monitor kept popping up when I would search for monitors price for performance.

review_title: If you're looking for a budget HD monitor (non-4K), ...
review_body: If you're looking for a budget HD monitor (non-4K), look no further! The Acer R240HY 23.8-inch is probably the most value for money monitor you can find online. I have this for several weeks now and can tell you that the widescreen HD display is quality at this price point. Also, the blue light filter that's included is a life savior for anyone who uses electronics on a daily basis.
works great.
Love the screen size!!  Color is great, too.  No complaints. The price was affordable and am very happy with the purchase.

Love the display, simple, small bezels and clean.  Minor gripe is icon underline on task bar is sometime hard to see when viewing from 24" away. If I tip my head down to view the monitor straight on, i can see the underline.
The images are not as clear
For it being a cheap monitor it has served me well. It is just a great product.

review_title: Awesome 24" monitor, especially used in pairs!
review_body: EXTREMELY thin bezel, bought 2 and set them next to each other, you can hardly tell there is a gap in between the pictures! Has all three types of connections (VGA, DVI, and HDMI), which a lot of monitors do not lately. Looks absolutely flawless when gaming or watching 1080p60 video on Youtube/Netflix/Prime. I noticed the smoothest picture seems to come via the HDMI connection, which makes sense. Sure, they aren't VESA compliant, but I wanted to use the included bases anyway. Easy to assemble the base, and its clean 'ring' shape is stylish and minimalist. A truly great buy for the price, and two of these side by side give me a 48" desktop for $260!! Arrived in two days thanks to Prime.
Great monitor I love the brightness, contrast, and the edge frame is very small.

review_title: I bought two and they are beautiful side by side with my extended desktop
review_body: I bought two and they are beautiful side by side with my extended desktop . Almost looks like one screen as the thin edge is barely noticeable...
So clear and crisp, its beyond belief. The ring base is kind of weird, but overall an A+.
Great screen works flawlessly

review_title: Poor performance and a line running through it
review_body: I have a line running through the screen and causes system slowness everytime I try to use it. Cannot return it as it has been more than 30 days. I would not recommend this product.

review_title: Quick, Fast and in a hurry
review_body: I've wanted a USB monitor for a little while now and decided to research and buy a few days ago. Yes, a few days ago. This product just arrived and I love it. The design and size are great and it fits nicely in my bad along with my laptop. I ordered a sleeve not knowing it came with a sleeve. For anyone reading this review, now you know.

review_title: Watch out for freezing with certain applications (on Chrome, at least) after the first few months
review_body: Worked as it should when I received it, but after the first few months, it started "freezing" when I was using certain applications on Chrome.  Despite updates on my end, I still can't get the monitor to cooperate consistently.  As a result, whenever I'm working away from home, I am stuck re-booting my computer ~3 times a day.  I'm beyond the window of returns & product support now (short window!!!).

review_title: The screen is very dull, it is not bright at all.
review_body: I love how easy it is to set up, just plug it in USB and it is good to go. Works great, the only downfall is that the screen is very dull, it is not bright to how I would want it to be. For the money spent, I would think that you would be able to adjust the screen brightness in some way.

review_title: Love it when it works at all
review_body: Love it when it works at all. Likely a software problem. the monitor itself is very sleek with nice screen.

review_title: These are great for me to use while traveling
review_body: These are great for me to use while traveling. Love the pop out leg and included carrying case to prevent damage while stored in laptop back. So far no issues with color or clarity

review_title: Smaller than I liked. Had trouble locating a driver to download
review_body: Smaller than I liked.  Had trouble locating a driver to download.  Like this concept but would like the image to be better quality.  Nice that it is thin and it fits on my Italian easel.
love it, bit of a hitch in first order but the wonderful Lady at amazon customer service did me wright. love her and this product

review_title: Windows 10 doesn't seem to be supported.
review_body: I have a Lenovo X1 Carbon running windows 10 . This product did not work with my setup. Windows 10 would not allow the setup software to run. The support website does not have the latest drivers and does not address windows 10 issues. There is no phone number for technical support. I emailed their technical support and a day later have not received any response. I would NOT purchase this headache ever again.

review_title: Good monitor, but rebate offer is not worth the paper it is written on.
review_body: The monitor is a good monitor. Does everything that I want it to do. Easy to read. The stand is a little wobbly, but other than that pretty good. Don't bother trying to get a rebate from them. They don't intend to honor their word on their rebates. They will weasel out of it anyway that they can. They have a good product. but I don't intend to order anything else from them, because they refuse to give me my rebate. Doesn't make sense to me to loose future business for a $10.00 rebate.

review_title: Best monitor I have ever owned
review_body: These are my favorite monitors. I now have 4, 2x on each of my workstations. The color quality is amazing for the price. Blacks are very black and whites are vibrant and clean. I have had my first pair for 3 or 4 years now. I highly recommend these to anyone that wants a large screen.

review_title: I have 2 monitors from hp and 2 monitors from ...
review_body: I have 2 monitors from hp and 2 monitors from Asus. I used HDMI for all monitors. Monitors from HP pavilion 23CW work perfectly and no hassle. My asus monitors show no VGA signal eventhough I used HDMI cable. I tried into my Alienware desktop and also Alienware laptop 17 R3. I called 4 times to customer service but  they either asked me to call back them in next 5 mnts or put on hold and disconnected.  I am wasting my time and money for this products. I will return this product, enough for 1 day. I will definitely choose my HP Pavillion 23CW.

I just got my monitor and it is so bright I was almost shocked. Now I know what the difference is that everyone talking about the specs was referring to. It pays to do your homework before you buy, and this was a perfect example. A great value for the money. I also like the attention to customer service, as I called to find out about the warranty, and had no trouble quickly getting all the information I wanted (btw, it is a great warranty - 3 years parts and labor). Don't pass up looking for a rebate on the Asus rebate site. There is an April rebate for this model.

review_title: It's the only worry free electronic device I have
review_body: I bought this monitor in 2013. It works and functions exactly the same after moving 5 times, knocking it around etc etc. To be frank, this is the only device of many that as never given me a single problem. Colors seem accurate, specs are better than average for the price. I recommend it.
Great so far, I do notice 1 bad pixel.  I mainly use it for spreadsheets, but it seems good with Youtube and photos.  I don't game anymore, so not sure if it would satisfy a gamer.

review_title: I have been very happy with them except for 1 dead pixel on one ...
review_body: I bought 2 of the VS247H-P monitors 3 years ago (Newegg). I have been very happy with them except for 1 dead pixel on one of the monitors. I bought this to have a third. I intentionally bought the identical model to keep things matching. While they look the same physically and specs listed are the same, there is a very obvious difference in the quality of the picture. With the new monitor, the blacks are not as black and none of the colors are as crisp. The picture is more washed out. I have tried multiple settings on all monitors and made sure they were the same. So, if you can buy one of the older models, they are great....I'm not very happy with the latest one I received.

review_title: Buy It You Won't Regret It!
review_body: I love this monitor!  I purchased for use as a 3rd monitor for work.  I also have another ASUS monitor.  This one has a nice, crisp/clear display.  Much better than the one I currently use as #2.  I like the new one so much that I will be ordering a replacement for #2.  This was probably my most useful purchase that I am certain will last for quite some time!!

review_title: The color on this is Much better than my old monitor
review_body: The color on this is Much better than my old monitor...

Nice monitor for office use, bright and easy to see from all angles.  I have several other models of Asus monitors in the office and have been happy with them overall.  My comments echo past reviews, the color profiles are strange out of the box and some adjustment is needed.  Also the monitor does not feel solid on the base and does rock a little if you touch the buttons.
all work great
nice monitor wood buy again
The best monitor I've ever had. Eyes don't fatigue as fast. Arrived in perfect condition much earlier than expected. Couldn't be happier!

review_title: It is big and easy to use… Easy connectivity
review_body: BRIGHT colors and lovely flat/matte screen.  It is big and easy to use… Easy connectivity.

Great monitor. No issues, other than a light ghosting effect that is only visible in a certain color spectrum due to the "Overdrive" mode. You can turn this mode off under the settings, labeled as "OD", but it makes everything worse, so I'd rather have it on and deal with the very minor ghosting effect. Overall, a good monitor for the price.

review_title: I bought 3 of these and couldn't be happier. all 3 monitors work amazingly
review_body: I bought 3 of these and couldn't be happier. all 3 monitors work amazingly, also none of the monitors had any dead pixels which i tested with dead pixel buddy. the only con is that you can't mount these without a special adapter. i would totally recommend this monitor.
Excellent monitor for the price, picture quality is great and good for gaming

review_title: Came quick and everything is as advertised
review_body: Product came in on time. The item is as advertised, the bezels are slim (1cm), 1080p IPS LED (came with no dead pixels), the monitor is very thin and light. Comes with a hdmi cord as well as a dvi port. It is very clear and the colors are accurate. I paid $165 for it on sale and would buy it again.
Good value.

review_title: Looks great for such an inexpensive display
review_body: No problems. Looks great for such an inexpensive display.

review_title: Great monitor, poor cable connection. Extremely fragile - don't use if you need something portable.
review_body: The monitor itself is totally worth buying and is wonderful to use, as long as I never move the cable. The connection on the back of my model is very weak, and even nudging the table causes it to shift just enough to ruin the connection (very frustrating). I agree with all the pros already written, but the connection issue on the back of the monitor is enough to really drive down my rating, since it really drives down on functionality.
Havnt had this to long yet but i gotta say it works great so far however i will probably update this review on a later date

Great screen, met all my expectations. The only negative for me would be that due to it using a USB connection there is a slightly worse latency than on VGA/HDMI monitors, so I would not buy this for gaming. For all other purposes it is a fantastic product.

review_title: Good monitor for price but has limitations
review_body: Good monitor for the price, but doesn't work well with video and limited adjustability of image. I use with a macbook pro to view pdf files or web pages while working on programming projects and it does well for that, but videos can cause the screen to black out.

review_title: ... spreadsheet and it cannot display properly is not a good use case for my work
review_body: Display setting have issues understanding display ability is down from other monitors but when going from a word document to a spreadsheet and it cannot display properly is not a good use case for my work.

review_title: Great second monitor for working while traveling.
review_body: Awesome for what I bought it for.  I'm used to working with 2 monitors at work - the one on my notebook and a separate screen.  Bough this for use on vacation since I knew I would have to be working, and my tired old eyes like having the second monitor.  Worked like a charm.
Excellent large portable screen. Fits in my ebags work backpack with laptop and a bunch of other stuff. Updated plug into the screen is a great modification by the manufacturer.
Great product!

Bought this for work.  I have a docking station with two monitors at my job,  when I take my laptop home to work,  I miss having both screens. This is the second one I have bought (first one I dropped and broke) and they have worked great! Gives me the dual screens I need!
Great size for an additional screen. Great resolution and easy to use. Only wish is that it had more than one USB port so I could plug in my mouse and plug on my additional screen.

I got this Monitor a few weeks ago. I love it, the colors look amazing on it and gaming is really nice with the 2ms response time. Some people complain that it has a little bit of a wobble, it does. As long as your desk doesn't wobble, the monitor wont either. It does wobble when I turn it on, because the power button is on the bottom right. I wouldn't even worry about it anyway, it stays still basically all the time. I would recommend this monitor to anyone, its nice and big. I'm coming from using my 15" laptop, so it seemed really big at first, but I got used to it. This is my first monitor that I've ever bought and I am very satisfied.

review_title: Nice image and refresh, but the blue wash is bothersome. Reliable monitors nonetheless.
review_body: Color tones are hit/miss on these. I have three and putting two side by side is a hot mess. Can't get them dialed in at all. Nice image and refresh, but the blue wash is bothersome.

review_title: Good but doesn't knock my socks off
review_body: My old 4:3 display finally gave up the ghost. After some quick research, I settled on this unit. Set up was easy. Controls are straightforward. I'm not sure I'll ever use the display presets, but they're an interesting feature. Viewing angles are what I'd expect from an LCD display. It's plenty bright. Blacks are nicely black. I'm a little annoyed by the eye-tracking LCD motion blur. There's a lot of shimmer when I move my eyes looking around at different spots on the display. I didn't notice this on my Dell 1701fp at work or my old Samsung that this display replaced. Overall, this is an acceptable display for the price.

I am extremely disappointed in this monitor. It's only 3 inches different (went from a 18-1/2 to this 21-1/2 but the display is terribly stretched out. It hurts my eyes to look at it and there's absolutely nothing in the instructions that came w/it that tells me how to fix this problem.

review_title: Great for people who have less than 1.5 yrs left to live
review_body: Worked well for 1.5 yrs and now it has a constant thin black horizontal line across the screen. It is usable, but annoying. Would not recommend unless you think your world will end within the next 1.5 yrs.

review_title: Go for the VS248, lasts longer.
review_body: Nice display but I've started noticing the white is not uniform along the width of the display. The brightness is but dragging a white image from the right to the left side of the display you can clearly see the white turning into grey. I thought it was because I sit at a slight angle but it really is the display. It does stay very cool and doesn't use much power and since I'm not a designer I can ignore the white issue for now.

Great monitor. I don't game, I use it at work. So it display Excel spreadsheets and such very nicely. I needed a larger monitor with a display port connection to complete a triple-monitor setup. Did the job. Have two other Asus monitors, no complaints. Good stuff.

LCDs are always a tricky proposition.  Dead pixels, broken bezels/stands etc.  But this was good to go right out of the box and wow the light, color, brightness everything was 100% perfect.  I either got "the good one" or they are all can't miss.  More and more I'm learning to love everything Asus puts on the market.  The only drawback is that the stand is a little low if you are going to put it on the same desk level as your keyboard.  I found myself looking down until I just went ahead and purchased a wallmount (never thought I would do that for a PC monitor!) so if you have single level desk surface, this might need a tweak.

This is a great monitor, but one of the primary reasons I want to post this review is to warn any gamers out there of a feature that you need to turn off that runs default on this monitor. "Trace Free" is set to 60 at default and for some reason causes a very odd and very noticeable blur effect in almost all of the GPU intensive games I have played. Set "Trace Free" = 0 immediately to solve this problem, I'm not sure why this setting even exists or what it does other than create a ridiculous blurring effect.

Great monitors for the price. I am using two of them on my home PC. Have VGA, DMI and HDMI inputs and autodetect and switch to the correct input automatically. Great video quality. Would buy them again.
Nice bright display.  Works great for what I need at the office as a 2nd display for my laptop.
Amazing clarity and color. If you can love an inanimate object, then I love this one. One HDMI hookup handles video and audio perfectly.
This is one of the best mobitors that i have ever seen. The colors are great, the brightness and the contrast is amazing on this monitor. I definitely recommend it.
Love this monitor.  Great price!

very great monitor for every day use weather it be gaming or stuff for school. i was very shocked with the picture quality with how big this monitor is. very nice sleek design and was packaged very very well. cannot find a better ips monitor for 200$
Item as expected

review_title: Great monitor for movies and gaming
review_body: The absolute best monitor i have purchased in my entire life i playing fast paced shooters like csgo and get no input or display lag whatsoever great buy and a must have
Great monitor.
Great picture quality for the price. All-in-all, a lot of value with this monitor.
thanks

The display is really light, looks really nice and works well if you're just using it as an external display. It doesn't have HDCP support so there are a lot of websites like HBO and AT&T U-Verse, on demand shows, iTunes or other purchased video content that can't be played on this display so it didn't work for what me as I'm traveling and wanted a bigger yet light and portable screen (which this is) to watch tv shows from services I subscribe to or movies I've purchased (which it sadly can't)

review_title: It never really worked quite as well as it was ...
review_body: It never really worked quite as well as it was described. Sometimes the drivers wouldn't take. Hopefully a plug and play model is will be available some time soon if it isn't already.
Monitor quit working after several months.  Very disappointed.  contacting manufacturer.
It's OK as an extra screen but the resolution is very low and has no controls whatsoever to fix it. Cable to connect to pc too short

review_title: It started off as an "ok "screen but as time ...
review_body: It started off as an "ok "screen but as time wore on, the back connector started to show signs of ware and had a hard time staying plugged in. I would not purchase this product again in the future.

Would have 5 stars except the maximum resolution is not up to par with modern laptop monitors, so you have a descrepency between screens. However, it must be said that the product is super useful and reliable. Within 12 hours of owning the product, it took a 6' fall onto the hard floor. It separated into three pieces and within 20 seconds i had it all snapped  back together and it works great.
Only lasted a couple months, right after support ended  green line and goes dead. Don’t buy this!

review_title: Wonderful addition to my mobile office with just 1 complaint
review_body: Love this monitor - makes working on the road so much easier!  Great size, light weight, its a perfect addition to a mobile office.

review_title: Great tool, lightweight and enables you to take a ...
review_body: Great tool, lightweight and enables you to take a second monitor wherever you go.  Resolution is a little off from my laptoo, but its not that noticeable.

review_title: I don't know why I bought two of these. ...
review_body: I don't know why I bought two of these. I guess the price was reasonable compared to others. However, the USB adapter on both of my monitors never stays in. So once I tap the chord, the monitor becomes unconnected the computer.

This review is for the VS248H-P.  A month ago, I purchased the VE248H Asus monitor, and ended up returning it due to ghosting and light bleeding, and then I bought this one.  So far, seems to be the right choice.

review_title: Looks beautiful at nearly any viewing angle (which is great for ...
review_body: Looks beautiful at nearly any viewing angle (which is great for local co-op games like Left 4 Dead, etc., when sitting to the side a bit), and the colors are very accurate and bright in well-lit rooms. The 3.5mm headphone jack is really convenient if you don't feel like plugging your cheap PC speakers into the motherboard, and HDMI input is nice too since the cables are so easy to come by any more and provide an audio source for the headphone jack. The screen size is not too big for twitch shooters, but not too small for expansive RPG environments or playing splitscreen, but it is of course a matter of opinion. The settings and presets you can choose in the menu do an okay job adapting the screen for different uses (night mode, gaming, theater), but ultimately don't make much of a difference for your average guy who just wants a decent monitor. On-screen text looks very crisp and clear, no blurring issues whatsoever. The screen does tilt with a little force, and the build quality is pretty good; the stand can feel a bit flimsy at times, but for the money, you're still getting an excellent display that you will not be disappointed with.

I really like this monitor! I got this as a birthday present and so far it is great. Super clear, crisp picture. My old monitor was a Gateway 2007 (And I don't think those are even being made anymore) But this monitor even at its lowest resolution is leagues better.I would recommend it. The only thing I don't like is that sometimes when I am gaming, (Fallout New Vegas for example) if I go into a pitch black area the screen goes off. I don't know if its something to do with the settings and resolution or what. But I just got this 2 days ago, so I will figure that out. Other than that, this is a great monitor to own!
Very Bright monitor.  It took me a while to adjust to my liking, but now I'm used to it and liking it more.  I'm still waiting on my $10 Rebate.

The Monitor is fantastic, picture quality is excellent and it works great for gaming. At this price I have seen nothing that compares. The one thing that is kind of weird and I don't know if it is the monitor or something else in my setup is that when I change from a dark oriented image to a light oriented image there is a brightness change. Again I dont know if this is from the MOBO or the monitor. Not really a problem just kind of weird. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a low priced monitor

This is the second time I've bought this monitor. I bought one in 2013 as a monitor for my gaming PC. I just bought another one a few weeks ago and it works great! The colors are great and the best part is that, when I originally bought my first one 2 years ago, there was a rebate. Now (2 years later), there is still a rebate!

review_title: I have a total of 3 monitors and all three ...
review_body: I have a total of 3 monitors and all three of them are exhibiting the exact same bluish hue to them.

review_title: NOT AN LED MONITOR!!! LCD monitor LED backlit
review_body: Pretty disappointed, not anywhere in the description does it say that it is actually an LCD monitor..It has LED all over the description but the LED is only for backlighting ....also it arrived in a bigger box with a gallon of Elmer's glue we ordered laying on top of it, pretty careless packaging .. I am keeping it because it is for my daughters first desktop and will work good enough for that but if you are looking for an LED monitor for gaming and such this is not it...

Had my boss order this for me for work. The display is great and definitely increase my worked productivity than relying on a 17 inch laptop screen alone. Dual monitors are always a good investment. It is clear, bright, and high quality.

review_title: Works as you expected, and for a good price.
review_body: So i bought this monitor around Christmas, and all i can say is that it has definitely impressed me. I upgraded from a 1440x900 monitor i had for quite some time that was starting to go bad. I mainly game on this computer, so i wanted 1080p. I saw this one and looked into ips panel technology and im not going back. This monitor makes the colors pop on anything i play or watch. I have played many games and movies on this monitor without seeing a impact on performance due to the 5ms refresh rate (FPS games work just fine, i notice no frame hiccups or input lag). All in all a very solid monitor that gets the job done well and doesn't punch you in the 401k.
Good montior for the price!
loved it
Very nice
Good picture. Works as described.good sound.
I love the matte finish. It's smudge and glare resistant. It even comes with an audio jack that the manufacturer doesn't mention!

review_title: So far so good. I just really don't like the white color ...
review_body: So far so good.
I wanted a full HD display to upgrade my Intel NUC desktop
WoRks great. Clear picture. Using it with gaming set up.
Value for money !! excellent Product !!

review_title: no questions asked and the new one is perfect.
review_body: First one didn't work right - constantly went on and off...Amazon replaced, no questions asked and the new one is perfect.
I like to much and it's a good support for training people in site
This would be a 4 star rating (with a deduction of one star for the occasional trouble with the monitor coming on when plugged in).

I wish I didn't have to restart my computer every time I plug it into my Mac. However, it takes about two seconds to restart, the colors are great, and it has been a lifesaver when I work from home. I'd recommend it.
this thing is awesome! i use it for my work laptop when i have to take it home.

The product lasted 11 months. My co worker had the exact same model and his did not last quite a year either. It was great for travel and working from home to have that second monitor from the laptop, but should have lasted longer.

review_title: Nice addition to MacBook Pro for presentations
review_body: I use this display with my MacBook Pro. (For presentations, I show the presenters notes on this display).  It works well, and is reasonably compact (not impressively compact though.)
This thing is great. won't work with chrome book though. it needs windows.
Its great worked as advertised.

review_title: I'm an auditor and work remotely quite a bit so this is great for taking the dual monitor workstation and making it ...
review_body: This is a life saver. I'm an auditor and work remotely quite a bit so this is great for taking the dual monitor workstation and making it portable. It's super light so it doesn't add much weight to your bag. I haven't had any problems with resolution, but then again I work with spreadsheets and not graphics.

review_title: ... same monitor a year or so ago -- worked great. That monitor was destroyed in a luggage incident
review_body: I had purchased this same monitor a year or so ago -- worked great.  That monitor was destroyed in a luggage incident.  Ordered it again.  New one didn't work.  Got a replacement and it would turn on but perspective would change randomly and I couldn't keep anything on that screen -- it would pop over to my laptop screen.  My boss had the same monitor but a year older. I hooked it up and it works fine.  This leads me to believe the driver software has an issue for the models made after our initial ones purchased a year ago.

review_title: 1.5 years later and still going strong
review_body: This monitor's still going strong after a year and a half.

review_title: Great color, use to edit 4K video. Nice refresh.
review_body: Nice monitor! Great color compared to other gaming monitor. Using Alienware 1080 GeForce for video editing. This monitor is more true to design for playback on my Samsung 4K. Refresh rate seems quick, no traces while editing action videos.
No speakers but who cares when you have a monitor this high quality.

review_title: Great monitors for home or work. Maybe not top choice for videophiles and hard core gamers.
review_body: These monitors are beautiful. I bought two and have them side by side. They are perfect for normal home use or work. They have brilliant colors and sharp crisp text. The physical design is top notch with easy to access ports. HDMI, Display Port, and VGA. There is some light bleed when the screen is supposed to be black. It doesn't bother me a bit.

review_title: ... monitor for 3 years now and it is still great!
review_body: I've had this monitor for 3 years now and it is still great!

Like it a lot and it has 3 inputs. Very handy. Really nice affordable monitor that I use for everything; vertical monitor, tv, amazon fire tv, ps4, xbox one. Mounted up on the arm I bought with no problems. Stand comes completely off. No worries with this monitor. Buy it if it fits your needs and price range.

review_title: Good Monitor, Still Unsure About Customer Service
review_body: Have no complaints so far and its been a few months. I know their customer service sucks(due to my last monitor) but I couldn't pass this deal up. If something goes wrong with this monitor and they do not fix it correctly the first time and in a timely manner I will not be purchasing a ASUS product again, however the monitor works great and we will hope it continues to.

I recieved this monitor 2 or 3 weeks ago and I must say this monitor is awesome! I plan on buying another monitor of this though because this is only 1 HDMI. This monitor is amazing, I noticed how vibrant and colorful it is especially when playing my PS4 games like Infamous Second Son and Killzone Shadowfall. I bought this monitor used - very good to prepare myself for next generation console gaming like the Playstation 4 and Xbox One seeing as I never owned a 1080p monitor or TV before. Well, I can tell you the jump  is HUGE. My monitor came in the mail with no problems like dead pixels or light bleeds that many have had before. I decided to trust Amazon and ordered it and waited July 4 weekend for it to come on Tuesday. I didn't notice anything bad with the monitor and it appears as if t's new. I'm extremely happy with this product and I would recommend this to my friends and you.
As I type using this monitor, it wiggles back and forth, causing the words to dance in front of my eyes.

review_title: Abysmal set-up instructions and poor customer support
review_body: Setting up a new monitor should be easy--plug it in and connect the VGA or DVI cable to the computer.  Well, not exactly.  The instruction manual does little to explain the function (or the location) of the various buttons which control the power supply, display orientation and numerous other functions.  So, unless you are technically savvy about these monitors, give consideration to the set-up issues before making a purchase.

review_title: The picture is sharp and easy to watch for hours on end
review_body: It does what I want it to do. The picture is sharp and easy to watch for hours on end.
Great sharp images.  Has a sophisticated non reflecting screen that doesn't trash the resolution like most such things.
Works great, nice 1080p gaming immersion
One of the best budget IPS displays I got this for my gaming setup I spent $1200 worth of Pc parts and couldn't afford a nice monitor cause I'm a peasant and poor do yeah buy this
love this monitor! huge upgrade from my 10+ year old dell monitor.
fits right on my desk. Love it
Love this monitor. Only thing i wish it had was a display port. Great quality. Would look amazing if you had 2 or 3 of these in a setup.
perfect for my use, no issues after months of use, priced well.

review_title: Great value, absolutely no issues with this
review_body: Fabulous monitor. Love it, I wish the stand was adjustable, but for the price this is phenomenal.

review_title: great upgrade from what i am use to.
review_body: Very clean looking picture.  The only problem is now I have to replace my older 2nd monitor because this one has such a beautiful picture.

Although I have noticed a little bleed from the backlight, I really can't tell unless the screen is on a completely black background. Very satisfied with this monitor, and debating buying a second one.
These are fantastic monitors. They look very nice, even the backside, but you won't be looking at that much.

I bought this monitor based on the reviews.  I am coming from a 17" old lcd.  This huge monitor is absolutely what others have experienced.  It arrived secure in the packaging.  It comes with a DVI cable, VGA and power cord.  Im using this with the DVI.  There are no bad pixels in this screen at all.  Great clarity and precision.  You cannot go wrong with this.  I was a little scared to spend the $, because I was almost settled on the 21" for about $120. Glad I chose this one.  I can get real close to the movies and games that I play without squinching my eyes.  Plenty of screen for the money.

My fault on the price--Amazon would not price match and right after I made my purchase it showed up elsewhere for less...  The monitor itself was a plug and play no brainer, and worked perfectly out of the box.  I have no image issues, and use the monitor every day as my primary.  My video work is okay on this size monitor, but I am planning on moving up in size some more and putting this one in the secondary role.  The size is a live and learn for me, no fault of the monitor, and I would consider another Asus if the price was right.

review_title: Nice monitor. The colors are nice and saturated
review_body: Nice monitor.  The colors are nice and saturated, and the picture is crisp.  The buttons are actually on the bottom of the screen; I'm not a fan but my husband is who uses the monitor and he doesn't seem to mind.  I'm disappointed it didn't come with sound.  Perhaps I missed that in the information section, but I was under the impression it came with on-board speakers.  Again, this didn't really bother my husband as he is partial to wearing headphones.

Bought two of these for my fiancee's workstation. Both of them came with dead pixels. One of them the pixel was flickering and tapping it on the side made it go away, been gone for a couple days. The other monitor had a dead pixel right in the middle and wouldn't go away, returned to amazon.com. I've bought dozens of monitors over the past decade and failure rate for me is like 30% it seems, so not a big deal. This review stays a one-star until I get a replacement, then I'll evaluate how the monitor performs.

There is nothing bad I can review about this monitor. It was more than I had imagined. Monitor was tightly packaged, no damage whatsoever. The screen is in perfect working condition. Easy to set up. Very satisfied. For those of you looking for a monitor, look no more. You've found yourself a beauty!

review_title: All around a great purchase, with a couple caveats.
review_body: Pros:

review_title: Great moniters at a great price!
review_body: These moniters are awesome. I have 3 of them on a triple screen stand. They are great for everything. I haven't had any issues with them at all. The screen needs some adjusting when you turn them on for the first time but after w bit of fiddling they look great. They feel like they are made well. The power cord is a little short so watch out if your plug is a bit away. Other than that there's really nothing bad to say about them.

review_title: and the monitor wobbles like crazy as you press them
review_body: Using this with my PS4, and the games look gorgeous. My only complaint is when you need to jump into the menu system for the monitor, the buttons are on the bottom of the monitor, on the right side, and the monitor wobbles like crazy as you press them. Now that I have things set up to my liking, I don't care, but I was doing quite a bit of tweaking initially and it really made the monitor feel cheap to see it wobbling constantly like that.

review_title: Best portable monitor on the market
review_body: Best portable monitor on the market.  It's slim, lightweight, and comes with a protective sleeve for travel.  Have purchased 5 of these for staff members and they all love them.

review_title: This unit is sleek and love the one-wire connection
review_body: I owned the previous version of this monitor.  Unfortunately, the screen was damaged, thanks to baggage handlers.  This unit is sleek and love the one-wire connection.  I would DEFINITELY recommend this product.

review_title: They went cheap on materials...lost connection.  3 uses...nice
review_body: Screen works fine, but after 3 uses....the USB  connection in the back is so loose it won't keep connected.  Now with the connection I will power but will not send signal...blank screen.  I have many AOC monitors so I was very disappointed in how poorly designed/manufactured this unit was.  The lightweight is a great plus for travel...but it has to have quality parts used in connections.  If you plan to use this on the road...why else use USB 3?  DO NOT WASTE you MONEY.  Very cheaply made. Junk.  Find another option.

review_title: I have one and am happy with it
review_body: I have one and am happy with it. Looking at the site because I am about to purchase another one.

review_title: Small tweaks would make it a great screen.
review_body: This is a good screen when it is connected but it has already gotten very frustrating trying to get the cord to stay in place and not disconnect.  Anytime I try and move the screen the plug disconnects. They need to either make it a more snug connection or make the cord more flexible since the thick cord seems to cause some of the positioning issue.

review_title: Works as expected on Windows 7 but still does not ...
review_body: Works as expected on Windows 7 but still does not seem to work on Windows 10. I hope they create a driver soon.

review_title: but the resolution is so poor that normal text in word seems blurry unless zoom ...
review_body: It gets the job done, but the resolution is so poor that normal text in word seems blurry unless zoom is adjusted. You get what you pay for with this external monitor.

I travel for work and this is a great companion as I am accustomed to using dual monitors when in my office.  Setup was a bit cumbersome with my company laptop due to outdated graphics driver but after some trial and error I was able to get it to work.  If you're having trouble getting it working, try updating your graphics card driver from the computer manufacturer.  No issues getting it working with my MacBook Air!

review_title: Revolutionary, On-the-go friendly, Works amazingly well
review_body: This monitor is incredible!!  I'm a computer programmer and have used it for several months now to bring to a co-working space and on work trips.  It's light-weight, fits easily in my work bag, and is a great size and height to pair as a second monitor with my Mac Pro.  The only slight drawbacks are that occasionally a square of pixels lag behind in updating the screen and I haven't figured out how to adjust the brightness.  That said, I would not hesitate the least to purchase this monitor again.  It's amazing!!

review_title: ... excited to get the portable monitor but I was sad to see that it did not work for my ...
review_body: I was so excited to get the portable monitor but I was sad to see that it did not work for my Mac. It turned on and off and would not stay lit.

review_title: I love it  makes viewing much better.
review_body: This was a great upgrade from my Acer 19 in. The color and the clarity is so good, the pictures are crisp and clear. The price was very reasonable, it was a good buy.
works great. great picture very happy
great monitor for the price, the base is a little unstable, needs to be a little heavier.
They are great for the $$$$$$

review_title: Can't beat it for the price!
review_body: I love this monitor, I don't think you can beat it for the price. I even bought a second one and now have a dual monitor setup. I use them for everything, my DAW, Netflix, and even gaming. I also safely overclocked them to 75Hz with no problems whatsoever.

review_title: Great price on a work monitor!
review_body: All the screen size I need. Good quality and brightness too.

review_title: I do a good amount of gaming with it
review_body: I can use this thing at night with no problem at all. The screen seems a lot different than other monitors i've used. I do a good amount of gaming with it, and things are super smooth. Loving this monitor for the price, also the thinness of the border looks great.
Has been working totally fine for about a year.

review_title: Very good monitor and serves its purpose perfectly
review_body: Very good monitor and serves its purpose perfectly. I use it for gaming on a console and it preforms [perfectly. I have won 17 games of fortnite using it and the graphics while playing sports games like NHL 17, FIFA 18 and NBA 2k 18 look great. 100% would buy.

review_title: The monitor looks cool and all
review_body: The monitor looks cool and all, but it was definitely not worth it. It serves it's function, but that is all. I bought this for gaming, and I regret my decision. I thought this would be a good budget monitor for gaming, but I really should have invested in  something better.

I am not a monitor enthusiast, but I am quite knowledgeable about general computer topics. This monitor Is wonderful compared to my old 720p 17.5" monitor. The #1 reason why I chose this type (IPS) of monitor over another was the dramatic benefit of wider viewing angles. Before I had to have the display at a particular angle, otherwise the dark colors would look wrong. Now the picture quality looks great at all angles. Also, I have played Saints Row 4 and Crysis 2 on this monitor; they look great and I have not noticed any lag issues. Others have mentioned a light bleeding issue, but I have not noticed this at all. Overall this is a great monitor at a great price.
