for some reason it took a full week before it was shipped which i dont understand but when it finally did get shipped, it got here pretty quick.  packaging was decent, monitor arrived in good condition.  gave it 4 stars because i have a stuck pixel in the middle left of the screen and since it's only 1 i can't do anything about it.  first monitor i've bought for myself after getting thousands of LCD monitors for work (not this model but i've seen a LOT of monitors over the years), and I get the one with a stuck pixel when its my own that i bought.

Monitor functions great.  The only thing I found silly was the monitor comes with VGA and DVI-D but no HDMI cable.  Granted I had a spare so no big deal for me, but VGA is dead outside of some legacy support and DVI is not included on every video card any more.

I had a Samsung monitor with a 1ms response and really loved it, but it died in a year just after warrenty was up...When I got this monitor the colors for everything were funky and it took some setting changes to get it right. Probably would not have taken as long if I used a higher quality video as the video itself was kind of like cam quality. Since the initial setup I have had no problems and I play all sorts of games with no blurring. Also no dimming or black issues. The monitor only uses like 10 watts too. It is ridiculous. I tested power usage with my USP.

Beautiful picture, very high quality, great price for a solid display with a few extra bells and whistles. Only complaint is the fixed stand that can't be adjusted, but if you put it on something to level it with your eyes (I used my router) then it's no problem at all. Would definitely buy again.

I bought three of these for a triple monitor setup.  So far, they look great.  So much better color than the Viewsonics they replaced.  Sharp contrast.  Very vivid and pleasing to the eye.  Literally, I had no idea how bad my old monitors were until I set these up.  A monitor is not just a monitor.  Although I'd like to upgrade to 4k, I'm going to keep these as my main monitors for quite some time.

I just replaced my old office pc monitor with this one and it is fantastic! I recommend Asus. Why? I have another Asus monitor that is similar but smaller that I bought on Amazon over 5 years ago that is still running strong.

review_title: Monitors are decent - 2 in 4 had issues
review_body: I ordered 4 of these for a studio setup.

review_title: Nice display for a good price
review_body: I use this as a secondary monitor and am pleased with the performance it offers in this price range. The IPS panel gives it good viewing angles with good color saturation, and the response time (if you want to game on it) is a very respectable 5ms. The on screen menus are fairly easy to navigate, and it has VESA support. The design is nothing to write home about and the monitor stand is pretty pathetic. It will wobble very easily assuming you put it on a surface that would be prone to being bumped. Mine also has a strange input issue were you will have to manually hit the input button again for HDMI (recommend using DVI as it comes with a cable and it solves the issue). Other than those small gripes though this is a fantastic monitor for the price if you are looking for a nice multipurpose, affordable IPS monitor then this is a good pick.

Perfect size for my needs.  I thought having it be just under 24" would be an issue, but I'm not going to notice unless I'm right next to a 24" monitoring.  The monitor is very sharp and colors are good.  It was super simple to set up and use.  It was recognized immediately on Mac yosemite and Windows 7.  VESA connection worked great.  HDMI and DVI connects worked great.  The only thing I wish it had was a DisplayPort connect.  I couldn't find that in a monitor at this price.

review_title: Once you use two screens one will never be enough ...
review_body: Once you use two screens one will never be enough again. This product is light. My only complaint is the USB hub required  to power it. Creates a wired birdsnest.

I could not get the monitor to turn on and so went to the AOC website for assistance. I downloaded the suggested driver several times but it still would not connect. I completed the request for support on their website twice but have still not heard anything from the company. I currently have a very sleek looking paperweight.

review_title: No power cord needed, just USB plug and play
review_body: GREAT product and a pretty decent value.

review_title: but it works like a charm
review_body: This is my second AOC monitor and I might even get a third. The first one was a previous model and it didn't have the vesa holes in the back (which I need for my home set up). But I've had the first for over a year and I keep it with me in my back and use it on my desk at work as well at a coffee shops after work when I work on my own projects. The plastic casing on that one has started to scratch up a bit as it didn't come with a case, but it works like a charm. Frankly, even if it crapped out on me at this point, I'd still think it was worth the money given how inexpensive they are. I should mention that I wouldn't use it to edit video as it will lag but that's not why I got it. All and all, I have no complaints.
the 1600x900 resolution isn't the best - but for the price it's a great portable monitor. Build-wise it outlasted my ASUS MB168B+, so there's that.

review_title: Can't recommend except for those who really really need it
review_body: Simply didn't work with my Macbook at all. Worked ok with my PC. A little sluggish response time, which maybe I should have expected with a monitor of this type, but does not work just like my 2 monitor set up in the office.

review_title: Don't know how I lived without it.
review_body: Wow, this is very nice having a portable external monitor. I have it plugged into my 3.0 Plugable hub and no problem. I don't have to try to lug my 21" monitor around the house when my home office is too hot with the summer heat; I just keep my portable monitor handy and off I go. It has a nice sleeve too.

review_title: It was a little tricky to get set up with ...
review_body: It was a little tricky to get set up with Windows 10, but I googled the make and model and the internet was able to help!

Love the light-weight, single USB connection for an ultra clear 2nd screen that makes writing, graphics, and other displays so much easier to deal with. The choice of horizontal or vertical display is very useful for making presentations to others.
good price works well

review_title: Very awesome! It didnt have a lot of back light ...
review_body: Very awesome! It didnt have a lot of back light bleed like some people reviewed. Worth the low price, plays games very well.
Exelent
I’ve had this monitor for over a year and it still kicking. No signs of it wearing out or discoloration  and honestly for the price this is a really good monitor.
great screen, arrived quickly

review_title: Great for gaming, great for TV watching
review_body: Has been a great TV, no issues, I would buy more if I had room!
Perfect. 1 year no problems, I love the thin bezels and colors. PERFECT.

review_title: Sweet dual monitor setup, love the small non noticeable border.
review_body: Set these up as dual monitors for my home office to my laptop. Nice!!! Love the non edging, colors are vivid. Very pleased.
Nice product at a nice price
Beautiful monitor!

review_title: A Perfect Monitor for Everyday Use as a Computer Tech Nerd.
review_body: Here is A brief Video Review of the product

review_title: After a week's of use (about 1 hour / day) ...
review_body: After a week's of use (about 1 hour / day), the color are all wrong.  Have tried to adjust it using both monitor controls and the workstation, but everything is just faded out.  Screen brightness / contrast are way to high - even though I have the brightness setting set to the lowest value.

I know this isn't the newest monitor on the market but it's still a great one. No dead pixels, and vibrant colors. The tool less stand takes about 15 seconds to install. I really wanted the 27" monitor, but just couldn't quite bring myself to part with the extra $100. Even so this 24" screen seems much bigger than my 22" one that I bought about 4 years ago for quite a bit more than I paid for this. Comes with a DVI cable and a HDMI cable. Very satisfied with my purchase!

This monitor is everything i wanted. I have better than perfect vision and it is nice to have to struggle to see ever pixel. very clear and good color. amazing response time, you can definitely tell its a very fast monitor. very good monitor for the price.

review_title: These monitors work well as tri-mounted.
review_body: Bought three of these for a tri-mount, they work and fit very well, especially the monitor that I put as portrait orientation. They have somewhat of a privacy filter on them or just due to the angle, but standing on the side or at an odd angle causes the screens to look darker.

I hate how Amazon seemingly did not check this product before it left the warehouse. Yes, I did buy it used. But the description said that the only issues with it were purely cosmetic. One little mark on the top, and one on the bottom. However, when I hooked it up to both my Xbox One and PC, the monitor did nothing. Everything was plugged in correctly. I tested both the HDMI and DVI inputs. I tested every possible variable. I am no stranger to PCs or monitors, so it can't be ignorance or stupidity on my part. The monitor simply does not work. It blinks on for half a second, turns off, does it again, and then stops. I can partially blame Amazon for sending me this unusable product, but I can mostly blame myself for thinking that this used product was actually going to work. Absolutely pathetic.

review_title: The price for this quality just cannot be beat.
review_body: I recently bought two of these units and have been very happy. It was very easy to calibrate this monitor and the colors are amazing. I have my two monitors mounted to my desk on

review_title: Quite a good monitor, Good price ($130 at the time)
review_body: Very good Monitor, I have three of these, It seemed like for a little while one of my monitors began to flicker every 10-20 or so minutes for one quick pulse or so, then would stop, It hasn't happened since, but I assume it was simply the wiring since it hasn't

I recently bought a computer with an HDMI port and wanted to get a monitor that could support it at a reasonable price. It arrived quickly, in perfect condition, and was easy to assemble. It came with a DVI and VGA cable included but I was a bit sad to find that it did not come with an HDMI cable. It's a large display with a clear picture (I'm used to a 21 inch monitor) and the only down side that I can see is that it doesn't have built in speakers. That is easily resolved though and this is definitely worth the price!

This monitor is beautiful and just the right size. I previously ordered a 27" monitor, and that's like sitting in front of a TV. It might sound appealing, but having to turn your head to view the sides of the screen is annoying. The screen looks very crisp and the colors are great. The stand is a problem as other reviewers have mentioned, but it's easily fixed. Whatever the direction it's leaning for you can be corrected by placing something (scraps of paper) in the stand before you screw it in to even it out.

review_title: Perfect for a Gamer like me
review_body: So first things first, i absolutly suggest that if you're looking into buying a smaller monitor for a relativly cheep price, buy this one. I am a pretty big gamer and i just recently moved to university. The first thing (priorities right?) i do is plan out how i aim to play games in my free time. Step one, buy a monitor.

review_title: Very happy! The screen is slim and only requires a ...
review_body: Very happy! The screen is slim and only requires a single usb plug in to get up and running. Perfect for me since I switch between my office and home office frequently!
great size for travel and works great.  exactly what I needed for my laptop.
I bought it less than a year ago and now with my new HP Elite 820 laptop, the monitor is not compatible with my graphic card... Sad, I wasted money... very sad

review_title: It's working great and I'm very pleased with it
review_body: Make sure you follow the install directions PRECISELY otherwise you will have issues.  Mine wasn't working initially but I contacted AOC support and they not only responded right away but they gave me instructions that fixed the issue.  It's working great and I'm very pleased with it.  Great if you travel for work and need a portable monitor for your laptop.

This product arrived and it didn't work.  I thought something was wrong on my end, took my computer to repair place along with the AOC screen, wouldn't work even after checked and rechecked it.  Now I can't return it because I'm a week late on the 30 return policy.  OUCH.

review_title: Perfect. Expands my workstation while I'm on the go
review_body: Perfect.  Expands my workstation while I'm on the go, allowing me to be productive anywhere I may be.

For anyone needing a portable computer monitor, this is a great product. Lightweight, good picture quality, easy to set up, large display area. The sleeve protector is a plus. Cord is a bit cumbersome and awkward to connect in the back of the screen but once connected it is just what is needed for dual screen display.

First of all, Amazon's same day delivery rocks!  Thank you!  Second, this is a great product and just what I needed.  I am a computer technology professional and work from many different locations.  I was wanted/needed a second monitor, but didn't want to carry around "the bulk".  This one is plug-n-play, travels well and easy and is USB powered!  I am thinking of getting another if my video card supports it.  I would highly recommend!

I love it!! The only problem is the cable, which was included, does not stay in the screen... The use side is not s problem... I'll be working and suddenly the screen is dark.  Oh well... It's s lifesaver beyond that
Perfect for PowerPoint presentations by laptop.
Beautiful colors at 60 FPS, and a sleek design. There is no USB on the back, which I find rather stupid since even my 10 year old monitor has a USB port on the back.

review_title: Affordable monitor that works well for gaming
review_body: I bought this monitor because I foolishly purchased a gaming laptop with a screen that was too small. For $129, this monitor was a good purchase. It's thin enough to be unobtrusive in my living room, but increases the display area for my games enough that the gaming experience is greatly enhanced. I'm using the single HDMI output for connectivity, and the graphical detail is excellent. I haven't found the edge lighting to be as obtrusive as some reviewers have reported, perhaps because I don't play games in a very dark room, so that's a moot point for me.

review_title: beautiful colors. I just wished if I could adjust ...
review_body: No complains, light weight, beautiful colors. I just wished if I could adjust the height.
Nice and big!

This product is great, looks amazing when I play my Xbox one. The reason why I give it a 4/5 is simply because it doesn't come with a build in speakers. Besides that this is a great monitor and I would really recommend this monitors to all gamers...

review_title: Bought it 5 months ago and it just stopped working ...
review_body: Bought it 5 months ago and it just stopped working its incredible that in five moths a monitor gets damaged so far i havent been able to contact acer for the warranty, to be clear i just stopped turning on and warranty does not apply. DO NOT BUY if you dont want to risk your money....
nice
Overall, great value for the price. HDMI, DVI an VGA so you can always connect legacy computers to it.
Has great picture and sound. Perfect size for my room!
Love it. As expected. No issues. So far so good.

An amazing monitor straight out of the box. I got this monitor as I was buying/building a new gaming pc. This has great color and just really clear picture quality. Also great for watching and streaming videos. Easy to install and mount to the included stand mount. I can run most current games and videos at 60+ fps and videos at 720 and 1080p no problem and the picture looks great!

I got this in the mail yesterday and wanted to check it out. It worked great. Although I don't have a preference on glossy screens as opposed to these, this really lived up to its reputation. Although it is only 21.5", not the 22" amazon describes it as, it is more than fine. It pivots upward and downward which is very useful, but you can only rotate it on the base or if you loosen the screw (which I would not recommend) you can turn it. The screw keeps the entire unit very stable and it is very easy to learn how to use the command buttons. The power cord is quite short, however, so I would recommend buying a longer one. It has a DVI, VGA and HDMI port on the back. The computer comes with a DVI and a VGA cable and I had an HDMI cable so i tested all of them out. They all work great, whether it is a laptop, desktop, xbox360 or TV. You can even switch between them if multiple sources are available which is very helpful. This really was a great buy :)

review_title: Great Monitor at a Great Price
review_body: After researching many other 23-inch IPS monitors, the ASUS VS239H-P appeared to be one of the best products available. I was debating between this monitor and the Viewsonic VX2370SMH-LED, but ultimately went with ASUS due to the equally good reviews and very low price offered by Amazon.  I am very happy with this purchase, since the ASUS IPS monitor has a very high quality picture and the stand was not wobbly (as other reviewers have indicated) on my large home office desk.

Have had this monitor for a month and I haven't had any problems so far. It arrived quickly and the picture is great, just had to turn the brightness down a bit. Only things I would fix about it would be to make it taller, it feels like it's too long (I got the 23 inch monitor) and not tall enough. It also wobbles a lot, which is the biggest issue I have with it. The stand needs to be bigger to better support it so it's not constantly shaking, it's annoying

review_title: ... this monitor about 2 or 3 years ago and loved it. I bought a second one to dual ...
review_body: I had purchased this monitor about 2 or 3 years ago and loved it. I bought a second one to dual monitor but the new one I bought has a yellowish tint (the monitor to the right) while the 1st monitor I bought is bluish (the monitor to the left)... I read through the reviews but could not find an actual solution.. Please help and sorry if this question has been answered before.

review_title: the color and resolution is very good. I have been able to use the monitor ...
review_body: I've been using this monitor for a couple of years already, and it is still running very smoothly. In fact, it has never given me any problems. I connect it to my Dell laptop, and as long as the connection is firm, the color and resolution is very good. I have been able to use the monitor as a second screen for my job as well as a TV screen for streaming Netflix and JW Broadcasting from my laptop. I don't know what I would do without this second monitor!

review_title: Great monitor. A definite upgrade from my previous one!
review_body: My husband got this for me to replace a much older monitor, and it is fabulous. Very crisp picture, good size, and a great price. I recommend it- especially with a wall mount over a desk. Just a FYI- the power cable is a standard one, not a flat one at the back. If you are mounting it pretty close to the wall you will need to order a separate cable that is more L shaped at the attachment point so it can sit closer to the wall.

review_title: Purchased two of these connected with dual dvi. One ...
review_body: Purchased two of these connected with dual dvi.  One of the monitors was noticeably grey compared to the other one and slightly dimmer.  Not a huge problem will exchange it and see if this continues to be a problem.

review_title: Tried and true asus VS series monitor. No fancy ...
review_body: Tried and true asus VS series monitor. No fancy features just a solid 1080p panel, I've been using the 21" version for years and never had any problems and I have high expectations for this one as well.

review_title: A absolute must for picture/video editing!
review_body: I needed these (bought 2) for processing video and picture media.  50 million to 1 ratio at this price is almost hard to believe!  They are amazing and make all other monitors look sad.  The stickers do come off so you can have a very elegant look on your desktop.  I might go with putting them up on a rack arm set because it will free up real estate on the desk.  Perfect size and stunning clarity.  Very happy I bought these and did my homework researching the competition.
Picture looks terrible on MacBook they use airplay to use as second monitor. But gave 3 star because looks pretty good and interfaces better with a pc.

review_title: OK - but I found no better options
review_body: Nice size. Good resolution, but the screen is very reflective. Good quality, but overall it seems a little delicate and flimsy. The auto-rotation did not work. The VESA mounting is 75mm. The viewing angle is narrow vertically.
awesome mini monitor love it

Excellent as a second screen, however, I use it to manage presentations in cafes and small spaces where is not possible to bring a projector and ecran or fit a large display. Works pretty well and do not add too much weight or volume to my backpack.
This would be 5 stars if there was such a poor connection on the back where the cable plugs in.  You jostle it just a little, the screen shuts off.

review_title: Not able to use as it was a little large ...
review_body: Not able to use as it was a little large for travel and I have been able to get the additional screens to work since attaching this unit to my system.

This is such a great "mobile" monitor.  I travel a lot and can easily transport this monitor in my briefcase along with my laptop.  It just plugs directly into my laptop, no additional power cord needed.

review_title: Poor screen quality and has already broke in month 8
review_body: I have only used this a for 8 months and only once a week for my home office. The screen is really poor quality and it has stopped working already. I think i’m too late to send back. So not recommend buying this product

Low res display is not great compared to my Rmbp. However, it is a durable/tough/perfectly usable second display. Would recommend for someone looking for a second display. The entire monitor is about the size of a 15 inch retina mbp. Only thing better than this product is the upgraded HD version(But thats 200$). Also, purchased square trade warranty

Worked great except the connection to the monitor was not very secure.  After 6 months, the cable would only keep the connection by manually holding the cable to the monitor.  Was informed by tech support the cable has been improved "type B" but doesn't help me now.
Ordered 2 monitors and set up was easy. One monitor is brighter than the other. Did not try to adjust because it’s acceptable
Border-less style is pretty cool. It make me feel I have a larger screen. No obvious light leaking
Fantastic monitors!!  I've purchased 4 already for my office.  The bezel is so thin, works great for dual monitors.
Going strong and I love the image quality.
Brought this as a birthday gift, and I've very happy with how it looks.
Wish I could adjust brightness, but performs well even though it isn't the sharpest picture.
i am loving this monitor. Super light weight. Great size. Easy setup. Hope this lasts a long time!
very good Monitor

For what it is, the advertised features, and the price, I rate 5 stars.  I used to use Viewsonic Professional series LCDs for Digital Audio work and light video editing.  For my 13" laptop, I just desperately needed a good monitor to allow me to see all of my tracks and panes without incessantly scrolling and resizing.  I couldn't justify spending the cash on a pro model for my intended purposes.  I've been using this monitor all weekend, and it's been fantastic. No janky pixels, clear, crisp picture, and lightweight.  I haven't even checked out any of the preset modes, just ran it out of the box.  I've been working in dim lighting, sunlit, and fluorescent-lit conditions with no issues whatsoever.  As a utility monitor it's fantastic. I don't play video games, or watch movies at my workstation, so I can't really comment on that.  Sure, some more adjustability of the stand would be ideal, but that shortcoming is listed in the product details, so I don't count against.
I really like this ACER R240HY , so clear and bright  I would buy again when needed

It came with a dead pixel towards the top. Since I have lots of work to do here, I can not return it. Also the contrast is low since its only LCD. Also it is not showing Standard asus manufactures name in display settings, instead it shows some other company name. I have a doubt that this is a counterfeit product. Do not buy this item if you cant find something cheaper than this. Something is not right with this one.
Perfect.

review_title: This monitor is great. I got it directly from the amazon warehouse
review_body: This monitor is great. I got it directly from the amazon warehouse. It was about $30 off because of "Less than 5% damage to the back side of the unit" which I can't even see. It has a great 1080p picture and, with the right HDMI cord, has a great response time as well.

I really like this ASUS monitor.  The price was good and the ASUS brand was recommended by my IT guy.  I use it with Windows 7 Pro 64 bit and the image is great.  It has 3 separate inputs for VGA, HDMI, and DVI.  It doesn't have speakers or a webcam, but it does have an output jack to plug in your own speakers.  It has menu buttons on the lower right to select input and make adjustments to the screen.  I would highly recommend this ASUS monitor to anyone looking for one in this size.  You can pay more, but you wont necessarily get more.

Came together easy enough. My only complaint, it doesn't auto-detect inputs. When you get it, it's set to VGA input. If you plug in HDMI (I have a PS/3 plugged in all the time and sometimes a VGA tablet) it says "no input detected" and goes into sleep mode. There is no opportunity to use the menu and switch inputs. You have to plug in a VGA input and then utilize the menu to switch to HDMI. If you unplug (or turn off) the HDMI input and plug in a VGA device the same will then happen. Bad design imo, and no mention in the manual. This would have been easy to build around.

review_title: For the price it is a very nice monitor.
review_body: I have enjoyed using this monitor.

review_title: I like my monitor a lot BUT...
review_body: I like the monitor a lot

I should have listened to the other reviewers that said the stand was shaking.  It's horrible!  I have had this for a few months now and I like the monitor but it's very disturbing to be typing and the screen is shaking.  I've had to prop the monitor on some speakers to keep it from shaking so much.  The clarity of the monitor and the colors are beautiful.  I tried calling customer service, but to no avail. They said they have no other stand for the monitor.  I will not be buying ASUS again! For them to put such a flimsy stand on a 24" monitor is disgraceable!

review_title: Amazing colors and picture perfect quality
review_body: For a 1080p monitor this has to be the best i have owned.
Just got it in today.  Setup was super easy and straight-forward. Picture is bright and crystal clear!  Highly Recommend.

review_title: The quality of the picture is not really great, but it does the job
review_body: For the price, it is a decent monitor.  The quality of the picture is not really great, but it does the job.

review_title: This monitor is great. I use it specifically when I work from ...
review_body: This monitor is great. I use it specifically when I work from home with my company laptop. Having the extra screen really helps me get a lot of work done versus working with just my laptop screen.

review_title: Reading Documents Have Never Been Easier!
review_body: I purchased this secondary monitor for school as majority of my reading are in PDF format and it is quite difficult to read on a laptop when it is in landscape setting. The screen is bright, crisp, and essentially no lag time as all.  I would highly recommend for anybody who wants to utilize a secondary screen for personal or business use.
This thing is a complete POS, used twice then the display turned into modern artwork of some sort.  Plastic garbage.
If you travel - you need this!
Little light on the image, but does the job when I need it.
good product.  slightly dimmer than a regular monitor but it's very useful for having dual screen on a laptop and work on the road.  very happy

This product is junk. I only need it when I travel. Only got to use it twice before it broke down. Now I plug it in and get nothing...no signs of life at all. I didn't expect it to last forever but more than a year would have been nice.

This is exactly what I have been looking for.  Quality is great.  Easy to use.  Easy to travel with.  I love to adjustable leg on the back.  Highly recommend, especially to business people who travel and need a second screen like myself.
I love this monitor.  Super lightweight and a clear picture.  Plug and play, no issues.
great monitor for the price
Good construction. Picture quality is above expectation. Only problem I have is that you can see the backlight around the edges between screen and bezel.
Thin bezels are great and works just fine for gaming.
just needs speakers

review_title: For its price range, it does its job. ...
review_body: For its price range, it does its job. As long as you don't expect to be gaming or doing professional photoshopping on it. I use it only for document editing and chatting, while my main monitor is more pro-priced.
I upgraded from an old samsung monitor and this monitor is awesome. It was really easy to set up and looks great.

review_title: Quality and crisp colors,  best for budget!
review_body: My personal solution for a quality led monitor perfect brightness and crisp colors.

review_title: These monitors are great. My Fiance ordered two of them for dual ...
review_body: These monitors are great. My Fiance ordered two of them for dual screen. They arrived as expected and the size and picture are both great!

review_title: but I like these better because image quality is just as good ...
review_body: Bought two of them for home office use to replace eight year old Acers. Can't beat these monitors for the price. We spend twice the amount on 24" Dell monitors at work, but I like these better because image quality is just as good and the thin bezel is a huge plus.  Don't overthink purchasing 24" monitors, you'll be happy with these.
This model does NOT come with an audio  connector. The manual states that the audio option is only available on selected models.
The quality and color is GREAT. I purchased this to add a second screen for my computer. My other screen is an ASUS also. I won't use another brand. The BEST, not just for the money. Simply the BEST.

review_title: Works great but not as well when playing video
review_body: I have this monitor as a part of my 3 monitor computer set up and it works great for everything BUT video. I'm not sure what it is or why and it's not screen tearing but it's like a bleed ghost effect on video. I tried just using this monitor by itself but it was still there. Didn't worry about troubleshooting the problem because my main monitor is what I watch video on. But if you're gonna use it for that look up if there's any way to solve that problem first
Im reviewing the VS247H-P, it seems the amazon site has different models on the same page so be aware of the differences between them, I was not!

Purchased this monitor to play my xbox 360 hookup through the hdmi cable. This monitor has lightning fast response time compared to playing on my 55" tv. Even when the tv is put on "game mode" it still has a lag which makes a lot of difference playing Call of Duty and first person shooter games. I don't recommend using the game mode on this Asus monitor because the picture quality isn't that great. Even with adjustments the picture seems to look faded and lack the true color that this Asus of capable of. Try using the enhanced screen mode for vibrant colors and more exciting picture quality. I sit about 3.5' away while playing games. I didn't try hooking this up to my PC yet but I can only imagine the great picture quality it will produce. For the price I paid I'm happy with this purchase.
Use this primarily as a second screen for my laptop and for gaming with my xbox1. Great monitor.

review_title: The Asus VS247H-P monitors are great replacements for older monitors.
review_body: I bought 2 of these monitors after reviewing some other reviews.  I'm very glad that I bought these monitors.  I used them to replace 2 older monitors that had different form factors that caused me to have some issues with the different screen resolutions and sizes that I had to deal with while working from home.

review_title: Works really well with my Macbook Pro Retina
review_body: Totally get it for its value.  I was a little concerned about how little it cost, usually you get what you pay for.  I did some research on monitor reviews, and all the results came up in the 400 dollar range and over.  But this monitor does the job for hundreds less!
Lives up to the reputation.  Got one for my brother for photo and video editing and I use mine for light PC gaming.  Love it, depth of color is great as well as the range of vision, gotta love IPS.

This has been a fine monitor and value, and if not for spite I would have given it 4 or 5 stars.  Great color and definition, no dead pixels or light bleed; yes a little wobbly on the stand but not an issue with my setup.  Using it on a recently revitalized (SDD HD, max RAM, upgrade to Snow Leopard) Mac Mini 2,1.

For the money, this monitor is very good. It's vibrant. My digital photos from my dslr look much better now. Can't wait to buy a decent video camera. I've not experienced any light leaks as some have. I set both the brightness and contrast at 80, and it's just fine for me.

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!  I work with multiple programs and spreadsheets all day.  As long as I have this with me, I can work from anywhere.  My work PC is a Macbook Pro.  It was basically a plug and play, works great with my Mac.  It's SO light, very portable, Fits in my 17" tote along with my Macbook so I take it everywhere I go.
I have always been hampered by working on my laptop, every other  computer I work on has at least two monitors. So I was enthralled to get this and it works great for me.

This portable monitor has improved my work life beyond anything that I could have imagined. There are no bulky cords to carry and it's so light weight that I hardly notice anything extra in my bag.  It was a little awkward to install; however, once it was there...it was on and popping!

review_title: Annoying to set up but great once it's working
review_body: I just had the most frustrating time getting this to work. It kept connecting and disconnecting every second or two.  I thought at first that it was a compatibility problem (I built my own PC). After messing with the display settings for a while, nothing was working. Then I changed out their USB cable for my own since I had a few laying around that I had purchased from Cable Matters on Amazon, and it works perfectly now! They just had a lame USB cable.  If you have issues, consider just getting your own cable, even though AOC says to only use theirs (well it's crap, so no!).
i bought the 17-inch model. It is not bright enough, but at this price point, I can't expect more.

It started out to be the perfect solution for working on the go. I wish I had read the reviews first, as opposed to taking one person's word for how well this worked. Like many others, I began to have problems with the connection. Now I can't even get it to connect at all. It flashes on and then blinks off immediately. I hope you read this before wasting your money!

review_title: It is like the screen is very sensitive not quality like the ...
review_body: I have had this monitor for less than 3 months and the screen is completely messed up.  After one month there were a few black spots on it and just yesterday it went black with colored lines on it.  I do not carry this monitor with me I just use it at home as a 2nd screen for work.  It is like the screen is very sensitive not quality like the ones I use in the office.

review_title: If you're hooked on multiple monitors, this is the best way to travel and work.

review_body: I use this in combination with my work laptop. It has very nice picture quality, clean looking bezels, and is easy on the eyes for long overtime sessions. This is what I purchased it for and I couldn't ask it to work any better for these basic tasks.
Pleased with this product.

review_title: Due to the thinness of the bezel it takes up not much more desk space for an amazing gain in screen size and resolution
review_body: Loving this monitor which replaced a 20". Due to the thinness of the bezel it takes up not much more desk space for an amazing gain in screen size and resolution.

review_title: Great price and product for the price
review_body: Great price and product for the price. It's very nice having VGA, DVI and HDMI connections available on the same monitor!!!

The display is bright and as advertised. My only complaint is that the instructions are virtually useless. They're too small to read without a magnifying glass and, even then, make little sense. There's something called "Splendid Mode" and I still have no idea what that is/does. That said, the display does come with VGA and DVI cables and is packed very well.

I purchased this monitor because I already had two of the exact model from several years ago and needed to add a third monitor to the setup.  The monitors hold up so well that you can't even tell which monitor is new.  I strongly recommend this monitor.

review_title: OK for surfing the web, but stick with ViewSonic for sharper images.
review_body: ASUS is usually a good quality product but I have to say the clarity and the color on this monitor was below par for photo and video editing.  If you are looking for a monitor for simply surfing the web, this may be for you but even after adjusting all the settings and using an HDMI cable the overall quality of the display was poor.  I'm sending it back and purchasing a ViewSonic which I have always had great luck with.

review_title: A great monitor for gaming and school-work!!!
review_body: I couldn't of asked for a better monitor.  Its size is perfect, big enough to feel immersed in my games yet small enough so it doesn't feel as "spread out" like a tv for a console.  I have had this product for a few months and have encountered none of the problems i have seen for the product.  I have only one dead pixel and it is in a far corner, the stand isn't that wobbly, and the text looks perfectly fine.  Games look great on ultra and the resolution of the screen is large enough for me to open up multiple word documents or websites and have them open at the same time, Great for research projects!  All in all i would recommend this monitor to anyone who is interested in it.  Absolutely fantastic!!!

Good quality monitor with nice, rich color and clean, glossy bezel. After extensive research, I finally settled on this monitor from other reviews in combination with the price. The body of the monitor looks and feels great; the picture is clean and attractive. Blacks are some of the nicest you will find in this price range, and bright colors are rich and vibrant.

review_title: Otherwise great monitor for the price
review_body: As others have pointed out, not overly adjustable stand and a little shaky. . Not an issue for me and I'll probably be mounting on something different anyway. Otherwise great monitor for the price.

review_title: Can't beat the price and it's a great picture
review_body: I've had for a couple months now so here's my 2 cents.

Great monitor at a fair price and of course, fast shipping from Amazon.  I'm not a video/graphics artist type and spend no time at all balancing colors or making serious adjustments - basically plug and play.  But, I'm a software engineer who spends many hours a day using a monitor and can appreciate sharp, crisp images (not a game player either).

review_title: Not Every Monitor Displays The Same
review_body: Now own two of these models.

review_title: This monitor is amazing. It's now my primary monitor
review_body: I accidentally bought this, thinking it was another monitor at the same price.

Move on if you are thinking about buying this poorly made piece of junk.  The problem with it is the cable connector.  Why on earth the company thought anyone would want to remove the cable off the back is anyone's guess. It's not like you can hook the screen up any other way.  Instead of making the connector permanently attached, it has a very strange connector that if you so much as move the monitor one centimeter, the wire moves, the connector disconnects and the screen goes blank.

This works great! It is very light and portable. I didn't have any problem with the screen breaking or any distortions with the screen, but I can tell it is very light and fragile. I would definitely handle this with care. I can now perform my job with two screens outside of the house!

This works awesome for what it is. The picture is not the sharpest but for the price and extra work space its worth it. After initial setup of installing drivers from CD the device is plug and play. It doesn't add much weight and it's super convenient.

review_title: easy to navigate the menu to change the settings
review_body: I have three of these monitors for a 5760x1080p display and they work perfectly.  No dead pixels, easy to navigate the menu to change the settings, and are great all around gaming monitors.  I have had one of mine for about 3 years and have started to see a fade in its color.  It's not too noticeable and it does not bother me much, but keep that in mind.  Very reliable and well built monitors if you're looking for a cheap yet great quality monitor.

review_title: This is a great monitor for the price
review_body: This is a great monitor for the price. Good color, contrast, and good viability.

review_title: Plug and play, right out of box!
review_body: No hassles or adjustments required...works great with my old (2005) ibook (with easy Screen Spanning Doctor hack)
So far so good is working fine. It came very fast and the color and picture is great

Simple but nice. Not many flares but it does its job wonderfully at a low price point. The IPS panel is excellent - the viewing angle is exactly what you would expect from a good IPS display and the colors are bright and clear. The controls on the display are not overly complex and it is easy to change the color mode and inputs if you are using different sources which show colors differently. I've been using this monitor almost 2 years and it has never malfunctioned in any way and what more can you really ask for?

review_title: You pays your money and you takes your choice
review_body: I am really beginning to appreciate my old Dell 2208WFP monitor. There is just no way I can adjust this monitor for true and pleasing colors. Since I bought the Dell monitor along with my PC back in 2008, I really don't know what that monitor cost as a stand alone. I would venture to say that it was much more than the $130 paid for the Asus VS228H-P. So if you want to go cheap, as I did, then be prepared for some disappointment.

review_title: I love this Asus 23.6 inch Full-HD LED monitor!
review_body: I bought this monitor for my work computer which I have at home. I knew my company wouldn't buy me a new display so I didn't want to spend a lot of money. Well this monitor is the nicest monitor I have ever owned. It is awesome. It looks attractive, very clear, clean and crisp. It's a shame I waste it on my work computer!  I would definitely buy this again and recommend it if you wanted a monitor for email, web browsing, spread sheets, word docs, etc....I'm sure it would be great with games too but I can't play game son my work computer. :)

review_title: Best Monitor Out There - For the Price / Performance - I Highly Recommend It, Looks Amazing!
review_body: Well, I too searched and searched and searched for a good monitor to replace my old LCD screen.  And after considering all the options available - from any location possible - this monitor was my decision and I'm not disappointed at all.  Very, very impressive graphics.  I have a Samsung S2333W monitor - which was the 'best' at the time (price / performance) and I then did a side-by-side comparison to this one, the Asus VS247H-P 23.6 inch monitor blows the Samsung away.  If you go into iTunes, and start playing a song, then press Control + T, you'll get the Apple iTunes Visualizer.  Then press Control + F to go full screen (these commands are listed in their View menu).  And that shows the monitor off - how fast it can display the graphics - clearly - without ghosting - and the color and brightness intensities are obvious too - especially in a completely dark room.  This monitor really is impressive - and it has a 3 year warranty and comes with both cables included - the DVI & VGA cables are in the box.  I was worried about the stand, but of the 3 monitors I have, this one actually is the MOST stable!  It rocks the least when you jiggle it back and forth.  Great buy - you will be happy with this purchase!  I couldn't find anything about this monitor I was unhappy with - 5 stars.

I ordered this monitor to go with my new computer. It's paired with an R9 290, and the image quality is awesome. I haven't seen any dead pixels and the color reproduction is miles better than the TN it replaced. The only caveat is the stand. It's sturdy enough to hold the display up, but it wobbles when something bumps the desk. Not a huge issue since I'm usually not moving too much when I'm using it, but still a little annoying.

I have bought 3 of these monitors in the past 3 years to use in a gaming setup. The first 2 worked perfectly for 3 years until just a couple weeks ago the right side of one of the monitors started to have color problems, showing a bluish color on the right of the screen. Its still usable, but I definitely plan to replace it soon. The third monitor i bought was a about a year later than the other 2 and it was  a slightly newer model. I have been using this one for the past 2 years with the other 2 and have had no problems with it at all.

I'm going to echo the quality control concerns with AOC. My unit was inoperable out of the box. When connected to the computer, it flashed, as if trying to connect, then went blank. It repeated the connection attempts four or five times, never successfully.

You have to take the time plug it back in and move everything where it was.  What's worse is when the connection is only loose, so it keeps connecting and then disconnecting the display.

review_body: Terrible light bleed around the bottom and sides, cheap build. Good value for general usage, if you don't play games in the dark.

review_title: As good as it gets for its price
review_body: As good as it gets for its price. There are no dead pixels, the bezels are supremely small, and it has great brightness. The only things I would change is the user interface for changing the brightness and modes, as well as the audio quality that the monitor gives out through the audio jack.

review_title: Decent but incompatible with HDMI-DisplayPort cable and Mac
review_body: It's a decent budget 1080p IPS monitor. However, be advised if you are a Mac user with an HDMI-DisplayPort cable. That cable wouldn't work for OS X; it only works when I rebooted into Bootcamp (Windows). So Mac users: get an HDMI-HDMI cable.
This has been a great monitor in every aspect but one.

I just finished setting up this monitor, and the color and graphics are unbelievable. I went from a 17" monitor that is about seven years old to this 24" HD, and the difference in size and quality of the picture is amazing.  The settings are easy to work with, and it looks great in both Windows XP and 7. The computer I installed in on is a dual boot setup with an Nvidia graphics card that is about 6 years od and only has 256 mb. It's an old system that will be rebuilt soon, but the monitor still makes it look great. I played several old flight sims, and the graphics were better than I've ever seen on my games. I can't wait to get it hooked up to a new processor and video card. This monitor is definitely worth buying.

This monitor is big and bright and has good response time, and I like having two HDMI inputs.  The built-in speakers aren't Bose quality, but they get the job done.  The monitor would be worth the money, except for two problems:
Pros: Good for high resolution gaming.

review_title: Nothing like the "Same" one I ordered almost 3 years ago
review_body: Bought one before back in 2015, decided that I would get another one! First thing I noticed is that the colors are completely different from the one I've had, second thing I noticed was that it has like 4 dead pixels. Will not be buying from Asus again.

I needed a new monitor and checked for the best possible mix of features, specs, and price.  This monitor was the winner for me.  I've had it and have been using it for several weeks now and am quite pleased with my choice.  Great colors, great clarity.  As others have noted, the stand is a little "rickety" (aren't most of them nowadays?) but it's not an issue for me since the monitor sits on a sturdy, permanent shelf and shakes only a little when I turn it on and off.  Overall, nice choice.

review_title: Its pretty nice and has better screen quality and clarity than ...
review_body: Its pretty nice and has better screen quality and clarity than our other Asus monitor. My only complaint is that I wish the border around the screen were a little thinner.

excellent monitor. Beautiful picture. Think some of the negative reviewers either got unlucky with a bum unit....it happens or they have a low end rig with dedicated graphics or cheap video card. I checked this monitor on 3 machines. One with a 9500gt, one with a 450gtx and one with a 960. All 3 beautiful picture quality. Brought it to my friends house. Checked it on his wife's dedicated graphics pc and his old gaming rig with a 8800gt and both did not look as good as my machines. Highly recommend this to anyone who watches movies or games on quality machines. You will love it !

Being an avid gamer, a monitor is absolutely key.  Seeing as I game from my laptop, I decided now was the time to finally purchase a monitor.  After browsing various deals and brands for several weeks, I finally made the decision to purchase this particular monitor.  The value was incomparable to other monitors with the same specs.  The monitor itself is a sleek black frame with a bright vivid display.  Personally, I did not experience the wobbliness of the stand that I have read so much about in the reviews.  In addition, another added benefit does include a $20 mail in rebate.  However, it was a pain to go through the process of filling forms out only to receive $18 after a $2 fee, if I wanted my rebate within a reasonable amount of time.  Granted I have only had the monitor for a week, I do not regret my purchase in the least bit.  So much so, I decided to purchase another Asus VS247H-P for a dual monitor set up!  In conclusion, it is the perfect monitor for gaming and various other computer activities!

I've had five different LCD monitors since 2003, and this one is my second favorite so far.  Colors are great; vibrant.  The stand is fairly and easily adjustable.  My only minor complaint is that the included mount is slightly flimsy and wobbles a little.

My co-workers can easily view the screen from multiple angles.  The stand, however, is flimsy.  By merely turning on the screen, I need to hold the monitor with my other hand to ensure stability.  Overall, the monitor is worth the investment.  It is perfect for an office environment.

I love the LED style; it's very easy on my eyes, even at different angles.  It responds very quickly to power-saving mode.  I really couldn't be happier with it.  And the price is perfect for the size.  Asus has turned out to be a great brand for me.  If you're reading this review, then you can trust me on this: it's worth it.

This monitor was an incredible purchase. As a PS4 user, I've noticed a significant increase in my gaming performance because of the high quality graphics and 1ms delay. The monitor's picture settings are also very customizable. Overall it's a satisfying buy for me.

I bought this monitor on a saturday morning, got it on monday afternoon when it was supposed to come tuesday (thanks amazon! :D) so that was an instant plus in my book. I might be overly impressed seeing as I am coming from a refurbished 720p 18.5" AOC monitor :P now to the display. It looks amazing!! I picked it up on sale for $130 so it was also an amazing price. If you are looking for an all around awesome monitor, get this! you will not be dissapointed!
