Both my brother and myself purchased this monitor. No problems. VESA mount works great, i have it on a stand with another older screen. HDMI sound pass-through allows this to be used with external speakers or headphones. I played all of GTA5 on this screen with a PS3 connected to the HDMI.

There are several modes that it comes with which are easy to program and switch between using the buttons that are located on the bottom of the monitor. The resolution of 1080P is great for those that want that rich detail when playing games editing video/photos. This unit does not come with speakers but does come with an HDMI input should you decide to use it with gaming consoles or something else, so an headset or external speakers with be needed.

I bought two of these monitors and so far they are working great. With the exact same connections and default setup they looked good by themselves however when placed together there was an obvious difference. Also, which is quite common and was solved quickly with Amazon, one of the monitors had multiple stuck pixels and the buttons were not responding. Overall, I will be ordering another of these monitors to complete a 3 monitor setup.

review_title: I would pay more for better product.
review_body: Cable stopped connecting in the back of the monitor a few weeks after purchase. Pins are fragile. I didn't see any bent pins, but wiggling it made it work about 10% of the time. Extremely cheap product and especially the connection in the back. I would pay more for better product.

review_title: These monitors are great for an awesome price!
review_body: These monitors are some of the best looking monitors I have ever seen. Picture quality is great and makes using my Macbook Pro for work and studying a breeze. I currently have two of these monitors set up on a dual monitor stand and they look spectacular.

review_title: Great product, but some minor issues i need to address.
review_body: First of, let me state that I bought this monitor to get rid of my HDTV I was using to play video games on.

Buyer Beware:  Missing the Display port cable.  I ordered two and both did not come with this cable.  Which is pretty stupid since that is how you want to hook it up.  Sadly dissappointed in ASUS.  You have to order a display port adapter.  Not expensive, but a pain to have to order when you didn't know you would need it.

review_title: Fantastic monitor, and worth the price.
review_body: The only reason I give 4 stars intstead of 5 is that it turns off when the computer goes to sleep and I have to manually turn it back on rather than just waking the computer like most monitors. I've searched for a solution but found none.
Very happy with this monitor.  Having all three port types (vga, dvi, hdmi) makes it nice.  No need to worry what computer connects to it.
Great monitors for the price. Fast shipping
So after doing a lot of research on various monitors, I decided to buy this VS228H-P. It's not the most expensive monitor, but it was good for my price range and it had good specs.

review_title: Great buy if you're on a budget.
review_body: Bought two of these in 2012 and working like new  for the past 5 years and survived two state to state home moves.  At the time I also was entitled to the coupon/discount from the manufacturer .  Awesome monitors for the price.

review_title: Asus VS247 H-P 23.6 in. Full HD LED-Lit LCD
review_body: I recieved this Asus VS247 H-P 23.6 in. Full HD LED-Lit LCD Monitor today. Hooked it up in a few minutes. I think the colors look great....I just adjusted the brightness down a bit. It has enough adjustments that I'm sure will satisfy you. No bleed around the edges and the image is crisp and sharp. I'm satisfied with my purchase. attach pic is of my Win 8 screen....no flash and no adjustments!

Image color is poor.  I had to do some searching around the web to find the right color settings and it still isn't right.  It was a replacement for a Samsung 2243BWT that died and I miss my second Samsung.  The Asus is light and thin which is nice, but it doesn't compare to the Samsung.  I also can't get the image to fill the screen using the HDMI connectionn 1920 x 1080.  Price was good though and as always, Amazon had it here super quick.  The stand is kind of wobbly, but not terrible.  UI is as bad most monitors.

review_title: Works great! Low price and high quality with IPS
review_body: It works great. Only downside was no speaker but I mean its a great price and why would you bother with a monitor speaker anyways.
Very happy with monitor good quality
Outstanding product
3 months after i got it i notice a dead pixel on the medium top left corner and is annoying
Amazing price on a very nice monitor! 1980x1024 resolution is great for pc games.
exactly what we were looking for

review_title: Great but a little motion blue
review_body: Great moniter really lightweight easy to install only issue is a little motion blur for content viewing but for the price and 60hz its really great
Great monitor and can't beat the price.
Zero issues, super bright (turn it down). Solid monitor, especially for the price.
Excellant screen

review_title: Very disappointed since this is only a few month old and ...
review_body: The picture was ok but the connection at the back of the screen is too flimsy and the plug won't stay in anymore!  Very disappointed since this is only a few month old and already won't work and can't be returned.  Poor quality on the connections.

review_title: This product is great. I have a macbook air running Sierra
review_body: This product is great.  I have a macbook air running Sierra, and this gets the job done.  They still need to update the drive for the new OS, but it's good enough for me.  I highly recommend this product.  It's pretty bad@$$ working dual screen at a coffee shop or on an airplane.

review_title: If you currently use an external video card to add a second screen, this will make you remove the software for it
review_body: I was super excited to order this as I travel 35 weekends a year.  Unfortunately, this did not work for me.  I already use an external USB video card for my desk at work.  This new monitor required that I use only their software, going so far as requiring that I remove the software that gives me 3 screens at work (the USB software).  I did not want to give up my 3 screen set up so that I can have a 2 screen set up on the road so I returned the item to Amazon.
Works well with my 15" Macbook Pro.

review_title: This is a great portable monitor that my staff use as a second ...
review_body: This is a great portable monitor that my staff use as a second monitor when in the field.  However, the reliability is horrible.  I've had 3 out of the 20 or so that I purchased fail.  Not satisfied from a reliability perspective.
I also have the older version and these monitors are so convenient for travelling.
Great quality screen .,no issues besides the cord isn't strong and is coming out the back now
This was a really good value and works really well.  There are more light weight choices but they are more expensive.
I love this screen!!  It's an awesome addition @ work!!  I think I might need a 2nd one now for my home office?!?

review_title: Works well / as intended only when stationary. Wish the connection between the Cord / Monitor was 100x stronger.
review_body: Installation was pretty easy. For me all it took was taking the CD to install the driver, restarting my computer then plugging it in. The reason why I'm giving it 3 stars though is because the plug is too loose for my taste... It's almost as if I put any opposite force on the cord it will get unplugged then move all the windows I had on this monitor over to my main monitor. It's fine if you are stationary and don't move anything near the cord but if you're using a laptop and move it around it can be frustrating when it pops out. It's my first time using an extra monitor and I guess I learned the hard way to understand why the USB extension was recommended with this item. It would be nice to put some USB connections over to the side then plug this monitor into that connection since the cord gets in my way. Overall, I think I made it sound worse than it really is since it's largely my fault whenever this cord gets unplugged but I've also only had it for less than a month and I feel as though the plug in for the cord got looser.
Awesome HD Monitor, used this when I upgraded my Home CCTV system to High Def Cameras, Looks Perfect! Could not be happier!

I built a CUSTOM PC and need a good, cheap well built part and this does the job and is just was it says... Easy install and works great! Had it for months and no complaints!! Looks great and good price

It is an amazing IPS monitor. The picture quality is just awesome, and viewing angles is just perfect. I used this monitor for gaming and also for studying, and it perform very well, no lagging during intense gaming. The monitor would have been perfect if not for the non-adjustable height and also for the wobbly base stand. Everytime you turn the power on button, it will wobble, forcing you to readjust the position. Everything else, just awesome. :)

For what I paid I was surprised at what I got:  top-end gear for a low price.  The monitor stand attaches to the monitor with no tools (there's a tab that flips out on the screw, just in case you don't have a screw driver).  Very solid and compact unit.  If you're sitting on the fence with this don't.  Get it.
This monitor after several years has performed above my expectations.  It's a winner in my book.

I bought this to display my security cameras 24x7 in the living room.  The LED light is a electricity sipper and the picture quality is outstanding.  I typically display four cameras at a time (3MP network cameras) and can easily see details from 10ft away.

LOVE this monitor. We had to keep our monitor size down due to space constraints but this monitor is a great size.  Can't say enough how beautiful it looks, from 3d games to movies to just surfing web, top notch monitor.

Well phoey. I replaced a Soyo 6.5 yr old monitor with this and its really no different. I've been struggling with the settings for hours, to no satisfaction. I'm only a human who web surfs, emails and such. Sigh. Why can't things be easy for us regular folk.
Impressive high-contrast display. The monitor worked better without Pantone calibration and needed no major adjustment, only a switch to the preset Theater mode.

review_title: After the first had one single bad pixel, Amazon happily replaced it
review_body: We took a chance on this brand, which is new to us.  After the first had one single bad pixel, Amazon happily replaced it.  Since then, it has operated & performed outstanding.  The pic is even much better than another, big time brand of the same size, which is used in another room.  Highly recommend this one!  We are considering an upgrade now, to a larger version & will most likely buy another ASUS, due to the price & quality.
Large computer screen.
A fine product, it works well.

review_title: Good monitors and good value for price
review_body: Bought these to use as double monitors and they work great.  Nothing fancy, and good value for the price.
Love it and I use it every day for work and it has never left me disappointed. (Bought over a year ago)

I've only had it for a couple of weeks but so far it works great.  I did notice the light on the edges when used in a dark room but that is expected from an IPS monitor.  When used in a well lite room which was the intention you don't see any light on the edges and it looks great.
Inexpensive monitor, decent picture, no sound no matter how high I turn up the volume.
Fantastic. It's as described and just what I was looking for.

review_title: This is a great screen at a very low price point
review_body: This is a great screen at a very low price point. My only negative comment is that on occasion it looses its signal with my laptop even though the cord hasn't moved or been touched. But otherwise its perfect and the brightness/size is ideal.

review_title: Lasted 1 year and then stopped powering up. I ...
review_body: Lasted 1 year and then stopped powering up.  I tried a different power cord and the monitor still doesn't work.
so far so good. not to bright and has good eco settings.

review_title: and I got a replacement soon after(which Amazon did a great job of getting it fast)
review_body: It came in broken when I first bought it, and I got a replacement soon after(which Amazon did a great job of getting it fast), but about using it for 2months It broke again. I always carried it with the case that it came with, and it still got broken. There goes my $100.. It's so fragile.. don't buy this product..

I wish I didn't have to install drivers for it to work, but that's expecting perfection. It would be nice to have one that is higher resolution, but I understand that May be a limitation of the usb bus. Still worth every penny.
Good product for the price.  Works as intended, just wish I would have forked out the extra money for the HD version.  After several hours of staring at the two I have, eye-strain is a problem.

I Love this portable monitor, I would not say that it is easy to fit into a bag with your laptop, But it is still quite portable. The only issue i have with it is that the screen can make the images appear to be a bit washed out.

review_title: Use extra care with USB connector or display may quickly fail.
review_body: The display is relatively heavy compared to some other portable displays.  I would have been okay with that but the display failed to do anything other than have a backlight soon after I received it.  (But not soon enough for me to return it).
Great monitor, much better picture than my laptop. It took a couple of tries to get the right software but love the dual monitors now.
Does what it's supposed to do.

review_title: Love the kickstand attached to it but not enough to
review_body: much heavier/bulkier than ASUS MB 168 model which I decided to keep instead of this.  Love the kickstand attached to it but not enough to keep

review_title: Perfect for on-site work at places where a second monitor ...
review_body: Perfect for on-site work at places where a second monitor is not available. Just fits in backpack; had to remove some unnecessary junk to make room (that's a good thing!)
Screen worked great up until the cord shorted out. Got the replacement and that one gave out as well. I think they should invest in a new cord?

review_title: Overall the monitor is amazing and good for daily use/gaming
review_body: Overall the monitor is amazing and good for daily use/gaming. However, I noticed a problem that keeps reoccurring. There are times when I leave the monitor on but put my computer to sleep. Once I turn my computer back on, the colors on the monitor are suddenly disoriented, it's almost orange/red infused to the normal coloring. But after I turn the monitor off then on, it works normal again. I run a dual monitor and my much older monitor never had an issue with that. It's not a big problem and a easy fix, it just sucks that it happens.

review_title: Very good display, a little bouncy
review_body: Got a pair of these, and I sit in front of them for far too many hours each day, mostly with browsers and spreadsheets, and a video here and there. The contrast and brightness are great, and my eyeballs are happy. The stands are a little wobbly, and coupled with my wobbly desk, that was a problem. But a stack of Post-its under the corner solves it, so it's not a big deal. I think a twin-post stand would be a better design, though.
I both 2 of them and I must say they work just fine, no pixel defect.

review_title: An overrated monitor that came broken and lacks very basic functionality.
review_body: I recently bought this monitor due to the amount of positive reviews and I was surprised just how bad this monitor is.  When it arrived, the first thing I noticed was one of the HDMI ports was DOA.  I could have easily gotten a replacement monitor with a live port if I liked the monitor at all, however there was much more wrong with the monitor.

review_title: ASUS VS228H-P 21.5" Full HD 1920x1080 HDMI DVI
review_body: Excellent monitor. The color is much richer than other monitors I have had in this price range. Would buy another but larger. Bright and crystal clear.

I wanted a new monitor to use with my six year old MacBook.  This does the job well, taking advantage of the maximum graphic capabilities of the Macbook's video card.  I use it with Lightroom and other photo apps, and calibrate it with a low end ColorMunki. I now have the perfect palette for adjusting colors and taking photos.

Not the greatest monitor of all time but in my experience one of the best for the price so I'll 5 star it. Fair all around, good color and deep blacks and Matt finish. Has the essential HDMI input but also VGA port if you don't want to use up a precious HDMI port on your laptop/ desk top if you're lazy don't feel like switching out cables every time you want to switch between your monitor and TV (which I do often). I've had it for a month in a duel monitor set up with heavy use and have not had a problem or complaint.

This being my first monitor purchase, I must say that this thing is nice. I didn't know how large 24 (23.6) inches really was until i saw this big box off the UPS truck. It's thin, sexy, and displays HD wonederfully. The stand is ok. It's not height adjustable but it is tilt adjustable (forward and back). The screen isn't shiny, it's more of a matte type of material. Still great though. Had no dead pixels when I got it and hopefully it stays that way. I'm currently using it for my PS3 because my PC isn't done being built yet. All you need is an HDMI cord for that. All in all, I'd have to say that it's well worth the money. I paid $157 for mine and have a @20 rebate so $137 for this is definitely a great buy!

I ordered one (21.5 inch) for the dual screen system a few days ago. Since I've owned the same monitor from the previous year, I expected it would also function well. As the item is under review currently by Amazon (March 14), there is something wrong with the units produced around the beginning of the year time frame. Mine produced in Jan 2014.

review_title: I have two of these monitors and I love them. I won't get into a crazy detailed ...
review_body: I have two of these monitors and I love them. I won't get into a crazy detailed review on color settings or anything since other reviews have done a great job of doing so already.
Defective on arrival. Next is a hassle to send back.
good

review_title: Absolutely perfect. Enough space on the screen to view my ...
review_body: Absolutely perfect. Enough space on the screen to view my textbook and class notes at the same time. Has support for HDMI, DVI and VGA. 1920x1080 is a great resolution for games to perform; getting 75+ fps on all modern games with my GTX 1080.
Great 2nd monitor. Can't beat the screen for the price.

review_title: ... ports or speakers but other than that not a bad monitor for the price
review_body: Wish it had USB ports or speakers but other than that not a bad monitor for the price

review_title: Gave to our son who needed a second monitor for ...

Love the "clean" look,  sets up easy and has great color and clarity.
ok
No issues and great price. I have two of these hooked up via my Targus doc and its awesome.
Picture perfect! Into photography so the clarity, colors are important!
Arrived broken!
I absolutely love my extra screen. Makes working at home so much more convenient!
good product
Good for extra real-estate on your laptop, but get a higher resolution is you can.

review_title: This is awesome. Had it less than a week and it ...
review_body: This is awesome. Had it less than a week and it fell off the table and broke into 3 pieces. Snapped them back together and it continues to work, that was over a month ago. Highly recommend this.

review_title: the case is good, price cost is
review_body: Portable, the case is good, price cost is enough
really no competiton for this so I have used it and it works
Not working with Surface Pro 4. I contacted customer service and they didn't help me at all.
Good pic quality. Took my IT department to install it but that is probably due to company restrictions.

review_title: Awful. Item was replaced after the attachment to monitor ...
review_body: Awful. Item was replaced after the attachment to monitor snap. Replacement broke within a month. I've tried different connections, different computers, and won't work! Thanks AOC

First and foremost, I am using this screen as a dual monitor for my iMac 2011 running OS X Lion. I bought a Mini-DVI to HDMI cable (3ft), not adapter, which conveniently connects my iMac's Thunderbolt port to the Asus HDMI input. Works seamlessly; no problems. The cable will run you about $40 at the Apple store, probably cheaper here on Amazon.

review_title: I have an older monitor that plays games better.
review_body: took a while to set-up, is dim with HDMI and you have to go to video settings to change. I have an older monitor that plays games better.

Have an ASUS Transformer tablet and have been extremely happy with that so was leaning towards them for monitors when shopping around; after a good bit of research this looked like one of the better products on the market in it's price range.  High contrast ratio really does make a noticeable difference.  Colors are very vivid and high refresh rate makes for very smooth motion. We'll see how it holds up over time but as the tablet that I have has done great so far I expect no problems.  Another quality ASUS product.

So far, I've been very pleased with the monitor.  It has the feature set I've been looking for since I replaced my desktop computer recently; it's larger than the Dell monitor it replaced, but still fits nicely in the footprint I have.

Bought this over 2 months ago and it is working great still, I am a full time student staring at powerpoints all day and this is great for that! It connects to a MBP perfectly with a minidisplay port to DVI. Only one HDMI port, so I had to use the DVI so I could still connect my xbox to the screen.

review_title: Colors are bad out of the box
review_body: Colors are bad out of the box, but after playing with it this monitor is absolutely amazing, especially for the price.  I can't believe I ever gamed on less than 144Hz.  Do not limit your gaming computer because your monitor is 60Hz.

review_title: Poor screen resolution, a lot of flickering
review_body: I bought this based on others reviews.  The screen resolution is terrible. I have changed cables and went HDMI, to no avail.  The screen has gone black a few times, then come back on.  There is also a flickering that happens off and on.

I purchased this monitor solely with gaming in mind. I have connected my Xbox 360 using HDMI and VGA, and neither have ever given me any kind of lag. It is excellent for shooters! The 60 hz does give you some jitters on the screen when panning at just the rights speed, but I have found it to be a very minor annoyance. I received it with no dead pixels and hasn't lost any in over two months since I received it on 11/26/12.
I bought this almost 4 years ago for $170 and it still works great. No lag. Amazing image quality and build quality.

To put it simply, this is a fantastic monitor. I am not very technical and I wasn't very familiar with the term IPS before purchasing. But, this monitor is really something special. The clarity of the images and vivid colors that are on display are absolutely beautiful. I was going to purchase the very popular VS247H-P (TN display), but in hindsight I think I have made the correct choice. Couldn't be happier with the purchase!
Excellent clarity and colors. Syncs up with other monitors with no problem using an HDMI cable.
This was literally plug and play. For my needs it is a great monitor at a great price.
great deal and work great.
Good Product and works great
Beautiful monitor for gaming. Perfect 1080p visuals with a sleek finish to the style of the monitor. Buying a second one ASAP! I had no problems when I received it
Bought for a work station - works well - no issues - bright and clear picture
So far this product has been great. I play video games on this monitor and I have not been disappointed.
These things are GREAT!
works fine - I don't notice any light bleed over around edges

review_title: it's so great I bought another
review_body: I'll keep it short and simple, it's so great I bought another. Amazing product for the price; much better than spending upwards of $400 for pretty much the same thing. The only thing I don't like is the fact you can't adjust the height of the stand, only the angle.

review_title: ... but a replacement was sent right away and I love
review_body: The 1st 1 I got didn't work but a replacement was sent right away and I love it
Very good fandango!
haven't been able to figure out how to adjust the colors, there are no buttons anywhere on this monitor, just the USB3 connector,
Very disappointed in how dim the screen is
Excelent screen, very ligth and good resolution. i recommend it

I'm a Internal Auditor so that requires frequent business trips away from my office. I'm use to having two monitors so I purchased the AOC monitor for travel.  It's lightweight and convenient. Travels easily through airport security.  Setup is a breeze since it's a USB port is only required. No power outlet needed. I love it. I purchased in February 2014 and it's still going strong.

This is my second USB AOC.  The first one was great except the cord connection was very delicate. This one, I received the first one and every computer I tried it on I got the Logo on the screen and then black.  So, I exchanged it. The same thing is happening with this one. So, I can only assume quality control is low?

review_title: The USB 3. 0 connection on the back of ...
review_body: The USB 3.0 connection on the back of these monitors is to loose to hold the cable in.

review_title: Easy to set up and great screen image quality
review_body: Bought this to have a second screen available for my laptop when working from home. Easy to set up and great screen image quality.
I now have one at work and at home.
Getting occasional flashes of red pixels as well as screen flickering. Would absolutely not buy again,

This monitor is amazing and clear. Got it for my Mac Mini. It gets a lot of use and is still going strong. It is very easy to read off of the monitor. It is easy on the eyes even after using it all day.

I originally bought this monitor as a gift for my husband, to go with his gaming pc. And once I saw how crisp and clean the display was, I knew I had to buy a second monitor for myself. The monitor works great for gaming and photo editing! 5/5, DO RECOMMEND.

review_title: Great monitor - best bang for the buck!
review_body: I looked around for a while for the perfect size and the right price and this was it!  This size happened to be the sweet spot, price wise and it will due for my purposes, which is mainly photo editing.  I have this hooked up to my laptop with a

Very good monitor! It does wobble a good bit if you accidentally hit if you shake the desk that it is on or the monitor itself. The power cord is very sensitive so if you try to move the position of the monitor expect it to become unplugged and turn off. Other than that the screen is amazing and looks really nice. Changing brightness levels are very easy and can be done quickly.

We bought this to replace and older Samsung monitor that crapped out. We use it for basic computing (Office, graphic design work, web surfing, email, etc - No gaming or movies) We like Samsung monitors, but found this one while looking at others. The specs, reviews, and price were excellent for this monitor so we went ahead and gave it a try. The color, detail, brightness are great. Good value for the price. You could pay more, but I don't know how much more quality you could get.

review_title: Great Monitor with Excellent Image Quality (When Adjusted)
review_body: Fantastic monitor, I've had one for four years now and decided to get another to supplement it. The out of box color is off, but with enough tweaking in the settings you can get great color reproduction. IPS viewing angle is good, it mounts easily, this monitor is an all around excellent product.
Great color. Good price. Easy to set up. Got it plugged into my gaming laptop. Connected the HDMI cable and it just worked without issues.

The monitor has no defects and provides vibrant color with good detail. I didn't have to download any special drivers or other utilities for Windows 8. I didn't have to make any special adjustments although the quickgamma utility, available from the internet, allowed me to improve color accuracy slightly.

For the price this monitor is exceedingly excellent. I'm an avid photographer/graphic designer as well as gamer. I can't express enough how good this monitor is. The color accuracy is pretty darn good and it's plenty fast enough for gaming and even a bit of video editing.
Great picture and good price. You can overclock it.
Best monitor for a cheap price

review_title: Nice monitor with an annoying quirk
review_body: Nice monitor for the price, but it likes to cycle through the inputs when I turn on or restart my computer, which is very slow and annoying.
Beautiful monitor
Just hooked this up using HDMI and love it!
Love it. Work well. Nice screen.
Beautiful screen. The extremely thin border gives a very nice viewing effect. Love it!
I like the product, but I would like to let people know that the product I got doesn't include an HDMI cable. There was only a VGA cable.

review_title: You get what you pay for (UPDATE, a way to reduce ghosting)

Good enough to watch videos and do business
no issues
Love this monitor!!  Makes my work so much easier since I don't have to switch back and forth constantly!

review_title: The protective sleeve is a nice touch to an already great screen
review_body: Bought this for a second screen for my laptop. I use the USB 3.0 connection and cannot say enough about this screen for the money. Works well is simple and convenient. The protective sleeve is a nice touch to an already great screen.

review_title: Easy to use and is pretty much a game changer ...
review_body: Anyone working in IT or is working predominantly using a laptop should purchase this slim and portable monitor.  Easy to use and is pretty much a game changer for productivity.

review_title: Works well for a great price.
review_body: Works well at a great price.  The image could be a little sharper, but the price is great and it does what I need it to.

review_title: I must say I am pleased with this product
review_body: I must say I am pleased with this product.  It's light and has good resolution.  It only requires USB power which is great.  I'm glad I bought it.

review_title: not so bright bur all good for the
review_body: work as expected, not so bright bur all good for the price

review_title: Cable connection is dodgy; flimsy construction
review_body: I use this almost daily and carry it in my workbag and so it get's a lot of wear and tear, but one of the rubber hinges fell off and now it's literally coming apart unless I snap it back in place.  The monitor cable is loose and if it gets jiggled even a little bit, you lose the display.  All of this after six months of use.  I wouldn't buy this again.
Light weight and easy to install on Mac book. The only issue is the brightness cannot be adjusted on a Mac

review_title: Need to download software to use it
review_body: I wanted to use this for my work computer, but you have to download software to make it work at all to your computer. Not a great experience

Excellent monitor for the price. No dead pixels. Some other comments suggested that default settings are overboard (read: bright) and this is true but EASILY addressed through menu buttons on monitor. Major upgrade for me and I'm very pleased. Remember it doesn't come with an HDMI cable but (just for the record) works just fine using the included VGA cable.

Can't complain much if you payed 165U$D for it after rebate. It does get a wee bit of work to get used to if you come from a small 17", but that's my fault. Although, the image quality of my cheap HP vs17 (really old one) doesn't really envy that much to this modern one... that was a bit of a bum for me, but eh... I enjoy it.

For this price range your not going to find a better monitor. I purchased 2 of these to run duel screen displays for my wife and they do not disappoint. Watching a Police concert in HD the other day I was shocked how well it looked. A $140 dollar monitor that runs HD? Yes indeed! Has ports for HDMI, DVI and even good ol' VGA(if your still running vga upgrade already!). They are shipped well and arrived in perfect condition in less then a week. Can't ask for better then that!

review_title: it is still perfect. Very happy with purchase
review_body: Did a whole lot of research before setteling on this monitor. 6 months later, it is still perfect. Very happy with purchase, considering getting a 2nd for duel screen in the future.

review_title: ... home with my Dell work laptop and am very happy with it
review_body: I purchased this to use at home with my Dell work laptop and am very happy with it. I do not use it at all for gaming or watching movies. It was very easy to install. I also use it with my Macbook Pro without any problem.
Great quality picture and response. No lag or ghosting. No noticeable artifacts. Vibrant color. Black blacks. White whites.

These monitors are the best.  Big hit at the office when I deployed the first one to our CFO.  Now everyone wants one!  LOL, I have to order more than what I anticipated.  The monitor supports HDMI, DVI, and VGA right out of the box!  Energy efficient and simply gorgeous.  The multitude of built in options and controls are unbelievable.  The brightness control on the LED controller is the best, hands down.  This monitor can be used as a TV and a gaming monitor for console gaming.  The ASUS team should be given a award for excellence for creating such a awesome monitor!!!

review_title: Not the most crisp but good deal for the money
review_body: I use this mostly for very detailed graphic design work. Sometimes it drops out the fine lines until you really zoom in. Also, be sure you do ALL of the calibrations via OSX setup. At first the type was VERY fuzzy and it took a few calibrations to get it where I liked it. When it comes to video, Netflix images are great, no complaints there.
Great price! Good size, picture is clear, but the text is not as sharp as a more expensive monitor. Not so sure this would be the best monitor for gaming. Best budget minded monitor I've seen though.

I got two of these and I wanted to wait to see how they do after a month of continueous use. They both work great so far with no pixel loss. For the price that I paid, dirt cheap, with the 50 mill to 1 ratio, how can you go wrong. My brother bought 2 as well and he has 1 or 2 pixels that have gone but with the 50 mill to 1 ratio, you can't really see it. All I can tell you is that they are a great deal, can't go wrong with the price or picture.

review_title: Acer is the best value monitor...
review_body: These are the only monitors I'll buy. Not this exact model, but Acer. They've got awesome refresh rates, they're good looking, borderless, and inexpensive. Good all around buy.
Colors are harsh, and lights/whites on photos are blown out. Cannot adjust the monitor to suitable viewing standards.
beautiful, if I had more room I'd buy an even larger one.
Perfect
Screen quality is great and you really can't beat the price on the 23.8in. Great price and great quality.
great monitor for the price, would buy it again and would recommend it to friends,

review_title: Really nice with very small bezel.
review_body: Really nice with very small bezel.  No speakers.  Output for headphones from HDMI

This monitor is a fantastic deal! IPS displays are so much better than the older style monitors. As another reviewer mentioned, the ring stand comes in handy for storing random junk like thumb drives, etc. The thin bezel makes it look more expensive than it is. The blue LED has the option to be turned off, which is a great feature if it bothers you. Also, my monitor did not have any of the bleed-through issues that some other reviewers mentioned. Would buy again.
VESA mount only with separate adapter, $30.00 +.  Looked back and did not see this anywhere in the product description.
Only lasted 60 days

review_title: Just what I needed - helps me save money
review_body: This was a great investment. I now sav a lot of money by not having to print out documents I need to review. Also save money on toner. Easy to set up.
Excellent
exactly what I was looking for.

It is very light, a snap to connect, and a must for business traveler. When it comes to work related stuff, except for the resolution, not much different between it and the laptop monitor.  I will get another one, if AOC ever comes out with a full HD or this one breaks somehow. I pack it in my carry on between clothes and it survives even when I had to check the bag once. You need one USB 3.0 and a second USB for additional power. The second USB can be any USB on your main device or even a charger from your phone, assuming the cable reaches.)
Stopped working 91 days in.  I think the cord is malfunctioning.  Worked great up until that point.  But seriously... 91 days.  That’s a joke

review_title: excellent - works as described and really enjoy having just ...
review_body: excellent - works as described and really enjoy having just one cord.  Only issue was driver issue; finally found the newest one and then it worked!

review_title: This screen only worked for two months. After two ...
review_body: This screen only worked for two months.  After two months, it powers on, but does not project information anymore.  I only see lines.  It is a shame that it worked for only two months.  I could not return it, because I got a message that the item is no longer qualified for returns.
Makes a loud buzzing noise.

review_title: Nice to have the additional real estate for my notebook
review_body: Nice to have the additional real estate for my notebook.  When you get used to having two monitors on a desk top, the single screen on the notebook is frustrating.

review_title: easy to use but terrible viewing angles...
review_body: it is compact and lightweight than i expected. But viewing angles are terrible, if you need more clear viewing angles you should buy the ips one. Easy to connect and share your desktop and also perfect for reading documents in vertical mode.
I love my new monitor!  The stand is a bit wobbly, but the monitor is crisp and clear and has awesome colors!  Highly recommend!

review_title: A bargain method to boost your computer productivity
review_body: It is so hard to believe that you can buy a 23" IPS monitor for practically nothing.  There was also a $20 rebate, too.  An amazing deal.

Although the monitors don't have any integrated speakers, they are pretty crisp. You're only getting average 67 hertz or so, but its definitely worth the price considering its build quality and display. From the looks of it, I really don't see anything wrong with this monitor if you are a console gamer or an average user, because most consoles run at 60hz anyway.

review_title: Great monitors, not a lot of features but a great price and a great picture
review_body: My wife and I work from our home office, and needed larger second monitors for our laptops. These fit the bill perfectly - the price was right, they supported VGA and HDMI connections, and provide great picture quality.  We have other ASUS monitors that we loved, and these have the same quality.

review_title: got it on sale and love it.
review_body: pretty good monitor. i play some fps games on it and it works well (ips is not ideal for fps games) its not as good as the TN panels for games but since i do more work on this monitor i decided i wanted an ips. when you get . first thing is to LOWER THE BRIGHTNESS! it looks alot better after you so because the brightness was 100 out of the box and this thing is really bright. if you play games more then work i recommend one of asus's non ips displays
Nice monitor for the price, the only issue is it seems to freeze when coming out of power saving mode and you have to turn it off and on like 5 times for a picture to come back.

Pros: The color is amazing, especially for the price. I have another monitor that cost me about $10 less and that monitor's color is nowhere near as vivid as this one. It's amazing for its price basically.

review_title: This is a very nice monitor. It has great color
review_body: This is a very nice monitor. It has great color. I have had it for about 9 months now without any issues.

I love the picture quality (IPS), 24" is the perfect size and these or excellent monitors.  The biggest issues is the blinking out every so often when connected to HDMI ports.  If you switch to the alternate connections no issues at all.  If you need HDMI, please be aware of this issues.  I order 2, and then had to order 2 more.  Same issue.

review_title: Excellent Picture Quality at a Good Price
review_body: I purchased this monitor about a month ago and I'm extremely happy. Asus in general makes great products and this is no exception. The screen is bright and the colors are crisp. The monitor has been used for gaming, movies, word processing, and internet browsing, and it has excelled at everything. Until I get a new computer I currently have the monitor plugged in to my laptop and am 'projector only' displaying the image. It works out well and makes it much easier to see than on my 15 inch laptop screen.

I love this monitor. Is one of the best budget monitors out there. I always play my Playstation 4 and its always good. I also connects my laptop to this monitor by HDMI and is great.. 5 stars. LOVE IT.
Simple and cheap. Didn't need anything fancy and this product is great for the price.
This monitors looks amazing. I did have to adjust the color settings to make it look perfect but otherwise looks great. I will definitely be purchasing this monitor again for my dual monitor setup.
Good monitor for a good price, and the thin edges look very nice.
the church like it

review_title: Great budget monitor with large viewing area and slim bezel
review_body: Crisp and clear monitor with almost side to side screen view. I am thinking about buying this monitor again to run duals on my new pc set up.

review_title: The picture on this monitor is AMAZING. I just hooked it up as an extra ...
review_body: The picture on this monitor is AMAZING. I just hooked it up as an extra monitor to my desktop PC, and the picture on this blows my PC screen away.

review_title: It is an amazing computer! The picture quality is very nice and ...
review_body: It is an amazing computer! The picture quality is very nice and not that hard to set up. I would  definitely buy it if you are looking for a nice computer monitor!
Beautiful monitor with a very small border and a smooth matte finish to minimize unwanted reflections. Can't wait to buy a second one for a dialysis monitor setup.
Clear and bright
Nice for travelling.
Light weight and fits in my backpack during work travel.  Very clear picture and easy to install!  Very happy with this product!
Works great. And easy to set up.
ok

The resolution is not as high as my laptop, so when I use it as an extended desktop I need to resize windows when I move them between my laptop and the monitor.  However, I generally use it as a duplicate of my monitor when meeting with clients.  Therefore, both screens are the same and it has worked good since I started using it a couple weeks ago.

review_title: I've grown accustomed to having dual monitors so was a ...
review_body: I've grown accustomed to having dual monitors so was a real pain to use the laptop.  This solved the problem.
Great product as expected, quick ship!

review_title: Good product for the price, with some minor flaws.
review_body: Works well for the most part. Sometimes freezes and can only be reset by rebooting the computer. Customer service is slow with responses. But overall a convenient and great product for the price.

Don't bother.  This lasted only one business trip.  The connection into the back of the monitor gets loose and then won't connect.  As it had been over 30 days, couldn't return to Amazon.  I contacted AOC customer "service" - their website seems to be designed so you can't find help...  I finally found the right person, followed the instructions and sent this piece of garbage back to be fixed/replaced.  Of course, the replacement doesn't work either...... Now I'm going to go fight with customer service again to try and get my money refunded as I don't want another one from AOC.  In case anyone else wants to submit a claim for repair, the email is romeo@epius.com.
Product arrived fast and was exactly as described.
Happy with the monitor. I play Overwatch, Planetside 2 and League of Legends mostly and it is a big improvement over my last 24" Dell monitor.

review_title: This 22-inch Asus VS229H-P performs exceedingly well for its price!
review_body: For its price and 22-inch size-- and considering that it's an IPS with HDMI port, full 1080 HD and LED-backlit-- this monitor can't be beat! The colors on the screen are unbelievably vibrant right out of the box! I did not even have to do a lot of tweaking to adjust the colors. And the viewing angle is excellent! Pictures on the screen do not show muted intensity when viewed at an angle other than the customary front position. The physical construction of the monitor seems solid, even when the base footprint is not as large as I expected. Asus also packaged this product very professionally and sent to me on time. This is my first Asus product and, needless to say, I am very much impressed! I highly recommend this product!

ok, I'm no techno geek, I don't know all the ins and outs there is to computers. I just ordered this monitor to go with my new hp computer that I had gotten for school and my old tiny monitor just wasn't cutting it. The colors are bright, screen is HUGE, have had NO problems, whatsoever and it works amazingly with windows 8.

review_title: He loved it. He is in college for computer science
review_body: This was a Christmas present for one of my sons. He loved it. He is in college for computer science, and he said I did good. :)

review_title: and it's still great!! The display is beautiful
review_body: I've had this monitor for almost 2 years, and it's still great!! The display is beautiful, and I use a DVI cord to connect it to my computer, instead of HDMI. It's just as good with the DVI cable. :) ASUS is definitely my favorite brand of monitors, and this one is amazing for the price.

review_title: back lighting is good, simple enough to set it up
review_body: ASUS's monitor has been very durable. Color is vivid, back lighting is good, simple enough to set it up. Just remember that it comes with stand, power cable (~6ft), DVI cable, VGA cable and that's it. If you need to use the HDMI port or audio ports, buy those cable as well.

review_title: If you do not want to shell out for high end peripherals or your current rig cannot push out 144hz then this is a great buy for
review_body: I am really enjoying this 1ms monitor as a temporary gaming monitor. If you do not want to shell out for high end peripherals or your current rig cannot push out 144hz then this is a great buy for casual gamers and streamers alike. As mentioned, I am using this as a temp gaming monitor because I have a 144hz on the way but even still, this monitor is running smoothly. The only hiccup I found with mine was setting up a display port connection. I dont know if its my setup, the cable I have, or the monitor itself, but if you run this monitor through a display port cable you could start to experience choppy frames and tearing; but then again this could very well just be on my end.

review_title: Clear and Bright, a Viewing Delight!
review_body: Fantastic monitor.  The colors are vibrant and bright, and the resolution is very sharp.  I have had no issues whatsoever with the quality of this product.  A year in, there are no dead pixels and it looks just as good as the day I bought it.  My only complaint is that I only have one!

I love this monitor, it's a great size. It's super clear, there's no glare from the sun or light, which I absolutely love because it's right next to a window, and I get a lot of sun where I live. If I had room, I'd definitely buy another for dual monitors. Reccomend this.

This is a great screen for a good price, I use it as a secondary screen for my 15.7in laptop, so there is quite the size discrepancy between the two, took a little getting used to but its not a problem. Once you use 2 screens it is hard to go back to one. On second thought I shouldve probably gotten something smaller but that is not really a complaint. I love how large this is, practically a small tv.
BEAUTIFUL VIEW !!!!!! AWESOME PRICE,A++++++++++++
wonderful
Bought for my second desk monitor.  Perfect size and very clear.

review_title: They set up easy and work great
review_body: I purchased 2 of these monitors for a dual monitor setup. They set up easy and work great. I've been using them for about a month now without any problems. The image quality is great!
It's good and light weighted.
It's about 2 month's old now, love the frameless look, color's are jump out at you and the wide screen is dynamite.

review_title: Works just as it should! Great Quality.
review_body: Great monitor! Been using it as my only monitor. I've seen good performance with gaming (I haven't tried to quantify it). No issues with back light bleeding, stuttering, dead pixels, etc. Works just as it should!
good monitor.  does the job
Have been using it connected to a PS4, PS3 and a laptop without any issues.
Great monitor in this price range. Maybe Acer could improve the stand... not easy to assemble it.
Awesome
Pretty easy to install.However, I think i need to download the software in order to get the rotation to work.

this monitor works well. it was easy to setup. i had one of the earlier models, and i used to carry it in my checked luggage. that monitor stopped working, so i have made the decision to carry this on my computer case. this way i can control the way the monitor is treated during transit. i do a lot of programming and dual monitors allow me the real estate to open the correct number of windows. it is also  handy for one on one training so that i use this without setting up a projector.

Great picture, great price, very easy to set up.  Personally, I don't see that much difference between the new version and the older one except the kickstand in the back.  Newer model is better in that regard, but AOC makes a good product in any case.  The carrying case with the new model is nice as well.  Can't imagine traveling with my laptop without this portable second monitor; a must for anyone who needs 2 monitors to work effectively.

review_title: Awesome to present in front of customers.
review_body: Works well when I am presenting in front of customers in a small environment.

review_title: This is a great 2nd monitor for traveling!
review_body: This is a great 2nd monitor for traveling!
Pretty good for the price, but not as high resolution or bright as I'd like.

review_title: ... my company and this monitor has been a really great tech tool
review_body: I travel for my company and this monitor has been a really great tech tool.  I would definitely order it again.
Great product and easy to use.

This is perfect for a second lap top monitor, and it travels easily in my computer bag. I would have given it a 5 if the resolution were a little higher. As it is, I usually reduce my Excel documents to 80 -85% so I can see more. But otherwise, much nicer and lighter than the old monitor I used to have to lug around.

review_title: Very satisfied, from the big things to the small.
review_body: As soon as I turned on this bad boy I was wowed.  There is nothing about this monitor I could love more.  The colors are miles above my previous monitor, as is the sharpness and brightness.  I would have to say though that my favorite feature about the VS239H-P is the extremely versatile viewing angles.  No matter how far up or down I tilt the screen, the picture remains practically the same.  The ports in the back are even more accessible than my previous monitor, with the HDMI and power plugging directly in at a horizontal angle, instead of having to fish around trying to plug them in from below.  I am very happy with my purchase and my next monitor will definitely be from ASUS.

review_title: What a great monitor for the price
review_body: What a great monitor for the price.  I use it for general computer use and not gaming so I am not sure if a gamer would appreciate it. The only thing I had to do was tone down the brightness a bit.  I have it set up as a dual screen and it makes my older screen look pretty bad. Now I have to save up to get another one.

review_title: Great monitor with a few things I feel hold it back.
review_body: Well I've had this monitor for about three months and so far I love it but there are a few things that really irk me about it. The color reproduction seems to be fantastic, the blacks look very dark while the whites look.... well white. However this is only on the image setting called "sRGB", the Splendid video settings I found to be completely useless as they either make the contrast and brightness look great but make the colors look kinda meh or vice versa. Now about the OSD, it works very well and navigation is pretty easy and simple, yet it feels very restricted. For example if I choose the settings that gives me the most accurate color correction which would be "sRGB" it will lock pretty much every setting in the menu. Under "sRGB"  it locks the Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Sharpness, and and "ASCR" (Acer Smart Contrast Ratio).

review_title: Very High Quality, Although Audio Output Does Not Work.
review_body: I am very happy with the quality of this monitor. Good size, great resolution and the matte screen prevents any glare from my windows. I liked it so much I even bought a second one to use as a second monitor. My one issue though is that there seems to be an issue with the audio coming out of them. I have plugged my PC into different monitors with the same cords and everything with audio coming out of those, but just not these monitors. It might just be me, but it is something worth mentioning.
This is a great little monitor. I use it for my home office and it’s clear! It has a great picture. Looking to try with gaming! Specs seem to match what I need!

review_title: great monitor. I am running Windows 10
review_body: It's purty! I am looking at it right now!. No complaints with product or seller, great monitor. I am running Windows 10. No issues with multi-monitor setup, attaches to Ergotron stand perfectly. If this monitor were a dude I'd shake his hand :-)

After owning this Monitor for about 6 months I have nothing bad to say about this Monitor. I primarily bought this Monitor to use it to game it on my Playstation 4. I was a little hesitant at first since I used to game it on a 61" Samsung LED TV and it would be a dramatic change to a 27" Monitor. But after gaming it for a while I realized that the gaming experience is much enjoyable in a monitor, not only that but the response time is so much faster and the graphics look Legit.

I have used it only 3 weeks now but so far it has been great. As for the rebate make sure you send them the FINAL details of the order. To get this I had to archive my order first, then I was able to print an invoice that said final details.

review_title: And more easy to read over my wide LG - which has ...
review_body: Ok monitor, priced right.  This is my third monitor and matches my other ASUS. And more easy to read over my wide LG - which has better resolution - but is just too small to read from 36 inches away. This bigger ASUS is my main monitor now and working well for that.

review_title: picture quality is very good. Easy to use and switch between inputs
review_body: I bought two of these for a dual screen setup, picture quality is very good. Easy to use and switch between inputs. My only fault with the monitors is one has a flaky hdmi input. If you move the monitor the connection loosens easily. I am not sure if it is a general issue or my bad luck. The monitors are 2+ years old and still funtion without issue with a good deal of use (I work from home 2 or 3 days a week plus weekend usage)
Beautiful. No bleed on my monitor. Sharp colors and excellent contrast. Love it.
A great value monitor.  I would rank it Top tier in term of price/performance.

review_title: this is an absolutely beautiful 1080p display
review_body: For the price, this is an absolutely beautiful 1080p display! I highly recommend this for people who just built a PC and need a good monitor to start.

review_title: Nice big screen little bevelled edge!
review_body: great quality! plug and play works great as an external monitor for my macbook pro. I use the thunderbolt to HDMI by amazon cable and it's amazing.
the monitor works great, but I'm not sure i like the stand. it seems a little flimsy and i don't think it adjusts at all.
great monitor for the price
Monitor cameras expected, my son loves it for his video games!
Good quality except for the fact that you can't angle the screen up or down. It is set at a very slight downward angle with no way to adjust it.
Works great and looks wonderful. We're very happy with it.
Top notch.

The form factor and size were perfect. The portability and carrying case are cool features. However, it arrived with dead pixels and absolutely does not work with Mavericks and/or USB 3.0. If it had worked, I would have overlooked the dead pixels. This product needs an updated description to note that it is for Windows PCs or older Macs ONLY.

Thank goodness it died in 3 weeks so I could still return through Amazon, but I did not want to take that chance a second time. While it lasted, it was great. The picture was nice, and it was easy to carry around, it fit perfectly in my laptop bag. Easy set-up (although not plug and play) but then came the flashing colors. Unplug, reconnect, worked for a few hours, then flashing colors. Next day, even worse, so back it went. Wish it worked, it was just what I was looking for when it did.

review_title: Monitor was easy to set up and turns on quickly every time ...
review_body: Monitor was easy to set up and turns on quickly every time I use it. Picture quality is as good as the monitor on my hp laptop.

review_title: I needed this extra screen for work. It was GREAT!
review_body: It was exactly what I needed. Worked perfectly!
The screen clarity is not good and tiring to the eye after using a while.  Wish the return window hadn’t expired, would send it back if I could and get a better quality monitor.

review_title: super convienent, and does exactly what I need it ...
review_body: Getting the driver set up was a little trying, and fewer PPI  thanHoweve I'd prefer. However, the product is affordable, super convienent, and does exactly what I need it to.

review_title: Great monitor. small enough I can carry with me ...
review_body: Great monitor.  small enough I can carry with me in my backpack but a big enough display to be worth it.  I've been using this for 3 months now with no issues at all.

review_title: Doesn't work that great on the windows surface or with a USB hub
review_body: Go to the website and get the device driver. Doesn't work that great on the windows surface or with a USB hub.
Screen broke within a couple weeks.  It may be portable, but it most certainly is NOT durable.  I would stay far, far away from this product.

review_title: This thing is awesome! It truly is plug and play
review_body: OK...This thing is awesome!  It's truly is plug and play!  also, it is powered by usb.  Simply install the driver, connect to your computer, and voila!!! it shows up under the control panel as a 2nd or 3rd or 4th monitor.  Refresh rate is slow, but if you need another screen for a static webpage(Twitter,Facebook,etc...) this thing is outstanding!

There are light strips that flash across the screen, apparently in an arbitrary pattern and without notice or cause. Customer service wouldn't offer any  suggestions and wouldn't take it back. They claimed it was my cord or computer but I tried it on multiple different computers with different cords, and different operating systems. It doesn't always happen but it's pretty ridiculous. I use an Asus laptop so I figured it would be good to go. I'm sure a tech person will respond to this with some sort of rationalization, but at the very least, know the company is not there to help you-I also couldn't get in touch with them for several days. I finally resorted to email and they emailed me back over a month later with a sophomoric diagnosis. Amateurs.
Received this monitor for Christmas in 2013.  I use it in a dual monitor setup and have been very happy with its performance.  The colors are crisp and the response time is pretty good.
PRO: After reading a lot of reviews, I picked the ASUS VS248H-P based on price and quality.  I fully agree with other comments of how good this thing is for the money so I won't echo that again.

I'm not super happy with this purchase. It's usable for something like browsing the web and word processing, but if you care at all about the accuracy of gray scale levels, then you probably won't be thrilled with it either. An all white background sort of has a metallic sheen to it that has a gradient across the monitor when you look dead on. It's very difficult to pick up on any light grey colors. RGB colors look nice and vibrant though.

review_title: The monitor is fine for the price
review_body: The monitor is fine for the price.  There is a 3/4 inch black border that I'm trying to figure out how to get rid of.  My video card may be outdated.

This is not a review of the monitor as that is covered clearly by others.  This is a review of the ASUS Rebate process which was followed exactly as stated in the instructions.  ASUS rejected the rebate on the grounds of lack of documentation and provided no notice of the rejection or details of what documentation was not provided.  I can state definitively that all of the required documentation was provided in its original form.  I cannot state that ASUS had no intention of honoring the rebate.  However, if you are making a purchase decision for this monitor based on the post-purchase mail-in rebate of $20.00 you should factor in the likelihood that you will be declined.

review_title: Great monitor, would buy again. Stand a little wobbly.
review_body: Crystal clear, no ghosting, very bright & detailed picture. Great contrast, would definitely buy again. Only con: stand is a little wobbly, even a slight movement on the desk results in monitor slightly shaking. Recommend purchasing a different stand or mount if this would bother you.

review_title: Great screens! Looks great on an open desk!
review_body: I replaced some older monitors that looked hideous on an open desk. The monitors look good front and back.... and very slim looking.

This is the 2nd Asus monitor I have purchased.  Both are 24" but different models.  They both are excellent in color and display.  This thing is half the thickness my VH242H and color is better.  It is worth the price.  Another good thing is Asus is now putting the buttons on the bottom instead of the face so it makes doing an touch overlay kit installation easier but I would recommend a smaller monitor if you are looking to do this.  Not many companies offer 24" touch overlays but it is a great monitor.

I didn't notice when I ordered this that it didn't have speakers on board. Apparently it's meant to be used as the second of a double monitor set. My bad. I would have returned it but my grandson broke down and tore up the box. So he's using it with external speakers. *sigh.* The picture, however is lovely, bright, just what I wanted as my old monitor begins to get dim. I'll probably get another Asus, but with speakers. They are really inexpensive for the quality.
My wife is very happy with the monitor.  Good display for the price.
This monitor is great, the only thing I wish it had was an up and down adjustment on the stand.
Bought this screen for my mother for her birthday. I just might buy one for myself. Picture is amazing, my mother loves it. I would recommend this Acer screen, you will not be disappointed.

review_title: Base is poor design, its big
review_body: Base is poor design, its big, awkward and ugly! Picture quality is fine.
Great monitor. Will be buying another for sure.
This is a really nice monitor. IPS is just so much clearer and crisp than any TN panel.
Very little bezel, vibrant colors, excellent buy.
Great product, Highly Recommended!!

review_title: Nice monitor at an affordable price.
review_body: Just as described.

review_title: Had it for a while still no issues great size for gaming with a PC or Xbox one
review_body: Had it for a while still no issues great size for gaming with a PC or Xbox one, and a Xbox 360
Broke after four months of use.  Was nice while it worked.  Its a paperweight now.

review_title: Wish I had bought it from Best Buy so I could've easily returned
review_body: Doesn't work well with MAC Book Air.  Wish I had bought it from Best Buy so I could've easily returned it

The cables are extremely loose. After using the monitor two times and ensuring good cable connectivity, the monitor never worked again. It turns on when initially plugged in, then immediately turns off. I tried on 3 different computers and had the same results. Bad product, HORRIBLE return policy.

review_title: works well. portable. light. durable. I ...
review_body: works well. portable. light. durable.  I dropped this about a week after purchasing, but to my surprise it was still working!
I honestly did not expect to be so satisfied from this neat looking light in weight portable usb monitor. Worked like a charm on usb 2.0 although it is supposed to be connected to usb3.

review_title: AWESOME!  I could have sold my monitor 10-20 times over after the first year. 3 confirmed purchases and they love theirs too.
review_body: Best thing ever!!!  This IS the answer to lugging around a heavy monitor or worrying about if a monitor will be available when you get to the office, especially when traveling.

For the traveling software developer this monitor is perfect.  Easy setup, light and portable.  If I had to come up with something negative to say...wish the resolution was a little higher.  Other than that this is exactly as billed.

review_title: Will not work with Windows 10 nor Mac OS 10.11
review_body: This will not work with Windows 10, nor with Mac (OSX 10.11 El Capitan).  Other reviewers have mentioned this, wish I would have read them first!

review_title: underwhelming quality, but for productivity 5 stars
review_body: great all in one, loses 1 star because the 1080 display, doesnt feel 1080 but still great.
So handy for trips.

I hate to knock this down any stars but I must.  Approximately 10 minutes into using this monitor the screen flickered a tiny bit and the bottom right corner of the screen went dark.  I didn't even have all the plastic peeled off yet.  :(
Ok for the money.  Colors not very good/washed out.  Build quality is good.  next time I’ll spend a little extra and get an IPS one.

review_title: Simply clean, large and displays colors beautifully!
review_body: I bought this monitor based primarily on needs.  This is hooked up to a new Mac Mini via HDMI and out of the box it's a stunner.  We didn't need anything serious as far as specs goes and I wanted something already tried and true as far as real world customer use/feedback.  This monitor filled all the requirements and coming from a 15" laptop screen this 24" is massive!  Great display, easy to use on screen menu.  Has enough ports/connectivity if you aren't need crazy amounts of additional hookups.  Only one negative is there was 1 dead pixel I had noticed after running a screen test but one at this price point for us was more than enough to keep and continue to use without much notice.  I highly recommend this monitor for the traditional computer user.

review_title: a little bit of false advertisement.
review_body: Now it says 21.5", but they must be using a different measurement system than I am because my tape measure says 20", 2" of which is plastic, so you get an 18" screen, and it claims to be an 80,000,000:1 contrast ratio, but the box I got says 50,000,000:1.

I looked around for a decent, well-reviewed monitor that didn't have built in speakers.  I already have sound covered.  If the manufacturer is putting resources into speakers, then the customer is paying for it.  If this monitor sells for the same price as a monitor with speakers, well, do the math... something had to be lessened so the speakers' cost is recouped.  Sure I could go with a cheap monitor...and get what I paid for.  This Asus monitor looks amazing, is bright, is crisp, handles all my intense gaming graphics, shows off amazing high def pictures my daughter takes with her high-end camera, and I can open up several windows and multitask.  I had no problems with drivers or making this primary to a two-monitor set up. Amazon.com's price was great, as usual!  And the service was fast!  I stepped up to the next shipping level and received the monitor in 2 days-right to my doorstep, well packaged.  I've purchased from Amazon several times before and their service continues to impress me.  I have other Asus products as well.  They have always exceeded expectations.

review_title: Best upgrade screen for your money!
review_body: I took a gamble here, and bought this as lightly used, saved quite a bit of money.  For just over $200, I now have a 27-inch computer monitor, hooked to my newly custom-built computer. I play a lot of games (warcraft, elder scrolls), and watch video, and it all works flawlessly!  I am very impressed with the quality of the monitor, sharpness, and the size!

At first I got this monitor and there was a very noticeable line of dead pixels on the right side of the screen. But thanks to Amazon's awesome customer service I got a replacement one in 2 days. The replacement one is very nice. 1080p monitor on a 22" feels right, as pixels are not noticeable until you put your eyes next to the monitor. Any monitor above 22" with resolution of 1920x1080 wouldn't be as sharp honestly. After that monitors would have to be 2560x1440 to be sharp, and would be more expensive. Overall happy with the product and price.

review_title: 2 yrs old and still a crisp picture
review_body: I've had this monitor for 2 yrs now and it's awesome! Clear picture. Great for gaming, doing work, whatever! I will say that the text can by clearer, but it's not really an issue for me. For this price, this was at the time the best bang for my buck. Bravo Asus! I will buy from you again.

review_title: might need to update drivers to use it.
review_body: the computer guy had to come download a different driver bc the picture was distorted---after that it works well.
It has a large spot of "backlight bleeding" on the bottom center, as well as a pixel that keeps getting stuck. Other than that, the display and colors are good and it works fine for gaming.
Good monitor. Not as sharp as I expected. Maybe I just need to adjust the sharpness.

review_title: When I got it I loved it. I have owned it now for three ...
review_body: When I got it I loved it. I have owned it now for three months and pixels are dying already. Its very annoying. Till that happened I loved it now I'm annoyed. Maybe you'll be lucky and it wont happen to you. But I wouldn't recommend it.
Great color and overall visuals.

review_title: Love these monitors and the price as well!
review_body: I bought 3 of these monitors for my gaming computer. I love the ultra thin bezels. the monitors have great color and picture quality. I cant believe how inexpensive these monitors are. I would and have recommended these monitors to my friends.

review_title: Plug and play. No problems so far.
review_body: Plug and play.  No problems so far.
Works well.
Great monitor.

review_body: would buy again  still figuring out the blue filter controls
Amazing picture quality, and no noticeable light bleeding.
Effing beautiful. The thin bezel really brings the screen to life. More than happy with my purchase

review_title: ... you had a second monitor then this is the best money you will spend
review_body: If you're mobile and wish you had a second monitor then this is the best money you will spend. Highly recommended.

i love this monitor - it's REALLY light and great for using at my office, at home, or on the road - adds almost no weight to my briefcase and adds a GREAT value while traveling.  I need as much monitor space as possible and in the past had to carry two computers when I travel.  This is really a great product.
Works great for a second monitor.

review_title: The product is great. It takes a driver to get it working ...
review_body: The product is great. It takes a driver to get it working with windows 10, but I use a driver updater tool that came with my MacAfee and it immediately recognized that it needed the driver and loaded it. Had it up and working on 5 minutes. A very nice second monitor for laptop!
Broke after 4 months of use.

review_title: Perfect for my intended purpose of watching my security system
review_body: Has all the bells and whistles I need for a connection. Perfect for my intended purpose of watching my security system.

I'll make my review short and simple... The picture quality is not as good as some people have described it to be. I am using this for gaming on my PS4 and in comparison with my TV it just doesn't match. But I did buy this for the low price and you can't beat that.

First, i love the monitor.  It is electronically excellent; beautiful, crisp color imagery. It looks good and does all that it should EXCEPT for the base, which missed the quality control check! I attached the base - simple job of tightening a couple of screws - set it it - it sits "out of level by about an inch from left to right edges of the screen. Temporary fix: a cd box under the right side of the round base. Stable? No, but level? Yes. Why haven't I sent it back? The screen is beautiful; I love using it and I don't want to give it up for the time it would take to return it and have a new one shipped. Maybe Amazon or Asus will see my review and give me a fix!
I spend 10+ hours in front of computer screens.

review_title: This monitor has fantastic colors that I didn't even know existed when playing ...
review_body: This monitor has fantastic colors that I didn't even know existed when playing video games. Only downside is the viewing angles are pretty terrible in comparison to my LG Flatron IPS231

Just installed today. The backlight is a little bright, may have to adjust, but otherwise the picture is vivid and crisp. I hope it lasts as long as my Acer! I upgraded to this monitor so I could give my old Acer to mom. Still running great. Easy to put on the base and easy to adjust the monitor backwards/forwards.

review_title: This ASUS is a great monitor
review_body: This monitor performs even better than I had anticipated.  Detail is clear and the contrast is great.  I assume this performance is due in part to the LED lighting, rather than LCD lighting, that is used.  The viewing area is wider and less tall than other monitors I have or have had, so the buyer should give some thought to his/her preference for the aspect of a monitor when making a decision.  For example, if you have a TV tuner in your computer, you might prefer more height and less width.

review_title: Wow. Amazed at the high quality
review_body: A lot of others wrote lengthy reviews on more in depth tech specifications, so I won't go into detail too much. What I can say is this monitor is top notch, especially for the price.

This is a just-out-of-the-box review. what a beautiful monitor. perfect colors. great price. needed very little calibration. I'm an artist who makes animated films. my not so old Dell died and I grabbed this based on reviews. just a little bigger than my

review_title: These are the best monitors for the price
review_body: These are the best monitors for the price. Hand Down. They are IPS so they don't strain your eyes as much and they have all the mounting brackets you can need. I have order over 50 of these for my office and don't think I have had one fail on me yet. Amazon monitors for the price.
This screen is sleek ,beautiful and very good for this cheap a price. This is a must buy for starter gamers. A nice sleek shiny black finish is super elegant.
cute monitor!
Great monitor, thin bevels, matte screen. Love it!

review_title: still looks as good as when I intially purchased this product

review_body: I'm using it right now and the color is very good.  Well worth the money.

Even better picture quality than I expected. For the price, this is one of the best monitors out there. Video resolution is flawless and picture quality is extremely high. Not too big, yet large enough to comfortably enjoy movies on. Will order a second one soon.

Great monitor, the bezels are super slim and the IPS panel is amazing.  Only con is that the physical buttons are a bit mushy and there is no tactile feedback when you press them, but on a monitor thats not really a con.

After 1 year of use.

review_body: This is a great value purchase for this type of product.  The case isn't the most protective (just a neoprene sleeve) but the monitor has worked very well and the brightness and clarity far exceeded our expectations.
Tried it on six different computers, nothing.
Use this everyday for work. I'm on my second one!

for the price, you cannot beat it.  It has squiggly lines on it if you look hard enough, but as an additional monitor it gets the job done.  If you are looking for a monitor where you want to watch a video w/ a good image, this is not my recommendation.  But if you need a secondary for spreadsheeting or email or office features... definitely worth it.
