review_title: A great buy for regular users and experts alike
review_body: Love this baby.
Found out this has no speakers :/ which sucks but my own fault, I should have asked, but the picture quality is great.

review_title: Quality and price are great so far--I wish it had ability to adjust height, though.
review_body: No complaints about the quality, shipping time, or anything else. But being able to adjust the height even an inch or two would be helpful to me. I feel that since it's kind of big, I strain my neck up a little to look at it (the part of my desk where it sits is admittedly a little high, too). I guess I could have paid more to get an adjustable screen but I thought maybe this one would give me a little leeway.

review_title: Doesn't Color Balance Well, Doesn't Hold Color Balance.
review_body: It's really hard to keep this monitor color-balanced. It's kind of a mess in that regard. Everything is over-saturated, and runs red. When I calibrate it, it will kind of come back to a semblance of normal-ish color, but soon enough it will run wild again. Good enough for a second monitor, but I'm not exactly thrilled with it.

If you're like me, you're browsing around trying to find the perfect monitor. Maybe you want a 4k or 144hz and I don't blame you. But I bought this as a 2nd monitor and my only regret is not buying two.

review_title: Great price for losing my 27-in virginity!
review_body: Beautiful! First time I've moved to a monitor this size, but my oh my, it really is as great as they say!

Love this monitor, i use it with my xbox one, playing on this monitor really changes the game-play. I actually enjoy this screen more than playing it on my tv. If you're looking for a good monitor for a back room or to play games on I recommend this one.

review_title: Clear HD picture, low cost option
review_body: Beautiful picture!  This monitor is amazing for as cheap as I got it.  I had bought this exact model for my PC at home for full price (about $250) when it first came out.  When I needed to buy new monitors for work, I decided to look into this option since it fell within my budget.  I was amazed to find the cost at almost half of what I paid for mine!  The screen is lightweight, bright, multiple options for picture input, and an overall beautiful picture!  I would recommend this monitor for gamers and casual PC users alike.  It is easy on the eyes with no worry of burn in if left on.  Great option!

review_title: Excellent no glare monitor for Mac Mini (late 2012)
review_body: A great monitor for anyone who hates glossy monitors that create too much glare. I'm using 1 monitor for a Mac Mini (late 2012) running OS X Mavericks via HDMI, plug and play, no drivers needed. Beautiful display on Mac, no complaints. All Apple monitors are glossy by the way. Price point is good, especially with $20 mail-in rebate.

I just finished writing a review for the Asus Geforce GTX 750 graphics card which I also gave a high review for.  This is my second monitor (my first is a Samsung which is also nice).  This is my main monitor and is doing a great job.  It is very thin and easy to keep clean.  No dead pixels from what I can tell.  The only nocks I have for it are that it is a bit unstable if you try to move it around alot and that it has no built in speakers.  But, for the awesome price and Asus brand name (one of my favorite electronic brands), it is a bargain.  Get two if you can.

review_title: Fortunately, Amazon support has kindly arranged for a return
review_body: First product came defective, gray and white spots all over display (mainly around the center). Additionally, the base is quite large, so don't expect to fit this and a keyboard well on any narrow desk. Fortunately, Amazon support has kindly arranged for a return, hopefully this one will not have defects.
love it

I work from home occasionally and needed a second monitor. Since I was paying out of my own pocket, I didn't want to spend a bunch of money. This monitor works great and is so simple to use. It really increases my productivity while working from home.

review_body: Great for a second monitor on my laptops. I have used it with both my Macbook Pro and Windows devices and it installed easily on both. Picture is sharp and the unit is very light, making it easy to carry in my laptop bag.

review_body: I am enjoying this USB LCD monitor. It allows me to use it as a third monitor or a secondary monitor while on the go. It worked really well right out of the box.

Buggy since delivery (disconnecting, etc). After 90 days of minimal use, it has stopped communicating with any laptop (tried 3). Do not buy.

review_title: Plug and play, MacBook Pro 2017. Light, ...
review_body: Plug and play, MacBook Pro 2017.  Light, bright, clever stand/cover.  One cord (usb c).  Just what I was looking for.

I really liked the idea of this monitor.  Only having a single USB cord made this sound like the perfect unit for us.  But, we ran into quality issues.  The first monitor we received had strange patterns on the screen, it almost looked like someone had pushed too hard on the screen in a few places and damaged it. We asked for a replacement and it was promptly delivered.  This second unit looked so much better out of the box.  After using it for a month the monitor just stopped working.  We are now past the Amazon return date so we will have to try and fight for a warranty claim.
Awesome. Cheap solution to having 2 screens at home...

review_title: It's been almost two years and the thing is still working like the very first day
review_body: It's been almost two years and the thing is still working like the very first day. There are not that many monitors at this price that will give you more than decent quality.

I have 3 of these setup. I'm using a 3-port Display Port hub and Display Port to HDMI converter cables. Great product for the price but ot would have been nice to have Display Port on the monitors so that I wouldn't need the converter cables.

Bought two of these as a Christmas gift to my parents.. Their old 22" 1680x1050 screens were simply worn out, so I figured I'd get them something they needed but didn't realize they needed. They love them. Asus makes a good screen, and if you're looking for a new display, you'll get more than you expected out of this.

Really nice monitor. Great HD graphics. I love all the different options it has. Sound quality is kind of poor though. Also is worse about giving me eye strain than my other monitors. Aside from that, I love it.
NIce monitor.  Should have bought the next one up with the built in speakers but this one does the job.

review_title: Wont mount flush on a wall.
review_body: Plugs come straight out of the back so you can mount it flush on a wall.  Bummer, might have to return it.  Not as tall of a screen as my other 21". It is lightweight and the pic is clear.

review_title: Initially great... then VGA port died
review_body: I was initially pretty happy with this monitor but after about a year the VGA input completely stopped working.  I bought a DisplayPort to DVI cord for $12 on Amazon to solve the problem since my laptop docking station had both a VGA and a DisplayPort output but I would have preferred to have a monitor where all of the input ports work for more than just about a year.

review_title: Good size and clarity of images
review_body: Good size and clarity of images.  Does seem overly bright in default settings, even after calibrating.  Will take some fiddling to get right for your individual viewing setting.  Very wobbly with the stand...to the point that the monitor shimmies with just small movements of the mouse.  Not the best design when it comes to that.  Not using the internal speakers, so can't comment on sound quality.  For just over $200 with rebate, it's a very good deal.

review_title: Asus VS248H-P 24-Inch Full-HD LED Monitor V
review_body: This was a replacement for a 20" Dell monitor.  The hookup to the Tower was pretty simple

For the money, this is a fine monitor for general use and gaming... It's not going to cut it for professional work with photos or graphics... the main complaint I have is that when I rotate the monitor 90 degrees into portrait mode, the viewing angle is pretty bad left to right (up and down in normal orientation)... This can be very distracting when using it in portrait mode, but considering the price, the size, and how close I sit to it, it is still a good value.

review_title: super nice quality and came which instructions and all that

This was an excellent monitor, for four months. Then it developed a defective pixel. It's true I did not read the ASUS monitor warranty before buying the VS248H-P. And, having read other reviews on monitors, I knew that defective pixels happened. But I had owned about ten other monitors. These included LCDs by Samsung, two laptops, an LED-LCD by Samsung, and just before this ASUS, an LED-LCD by Dell.

This monitor is fantastic! Its also HUGE( said in Trump voice).  I absouly love it.  The color is just beautiful.  I will be using this for photo editing and I am super excited about it.  Also I don't need 2 screens anymore b.c this screen is big enough to see 2 things at once.

review_title: Love this monitor with our Chromebase from ASUS
review_body: Love this monitor with our Chromebase from ASUS. It looks great in the kitchen and is very sleek. Great picture. Good value too.

review_title: The look and weight of this product is awesome as expected
review_body: The look and weight of this product is awesome as expected. However, Im not sure if the glitches I get on occasion are due to my graphics card or the Windows 10 I recently installed. I have two of these side by side and on more than one occasion I get blue screen vertical lines. When trying to reset the monitor I get no change. I have to turn the monitor back off and on to get this to go away. I had this happen right out of the box and sent the monitor back thinking it was defective but the replacement did the same thing, so maybe graphics card. Otherwise, the price can't be beat for an LED.

review_title: Absolutely beautiful but has an attitude problem
review_body: Absolutely beautiful but has an attitude problem. Often, it simply won't display an image. This is a very common issue with this unit; Google it and see.

review_title: Monitors look great, but my pair don't match in brightness
review_body: Other than a slight brightness mismatch (I bought two of these monitors at the same time and use them in dual-screen configuration) these are great! Price per pixel with great color response, no weird side-to-side head movement changing the way photos look anymore!
Using this monitor to play Fortnite. Works great. Speakers are an added bonus.
Nothing to say about the display. But the way the monitor is connected to the pedestal makes it very shaky when I type.
Looks very good! may be more screen than I need but looks better than the screen on my laptop!

review_title: Great monitor considering the price; works well for office use; have not used it for videos or photos yet.

I use it with an Apple Mini and connect the two with an HDMI cable for professional work. I have not used this monitor for video or photo editing or viewing but it is HD and has many viewer-selected settings that are customizable depending on your need. Overall well made and nice resolution.

review_title: AOC shows it stuff to the crowd!
review_body: I like the monitor and it is performing as described.  I would have given it a 5 star rating if it would have had a storage place for the 3.0 USB cable.  This monitor is nice for small presentations in an individual office or in a small meeting of two to four people.  The travel case was a nice add on.  I would recommend this to a friend.

review_title: Good color, the brightness could be a tad higher

review_title: Really nice display, especially at the price point
review_body: Really nice display, especially at the price point. There are better but you will pay for it. Great display if orion isn't a priority

review_title: Good enough for me! (Not a gamer or media junkie)

review_title: Very nice monitor. I have several Acers and they are good quality.
review_body: Worth the money for Sure!
No problems so far. They look great and are easy to use. I bought two of them for a dual monitor set up and it's fantastic.

Fabulous monitor... I love it!  Normally I buy Samsung or HP.  My last HP fritzed out on me in less than 3 years.... I was not  happy to say the least.  The Samsung was considerably more than the ASUS.  After a ton of research and reviews, I bought this six months ago and it's been superb!  Great color, clear, perfect size for desktop work, I wouldn't trade it for anything.

review_title: I have to say these are the best 1080 monitors I've ever used
review_body: UPDATE: These monitors still rock! If you are looking for a great cheap monitor, this is it. The only thing I would get to replace these would be a 144Hz monitor.

I love the monitor so far. Good quality and good value. The picture is very crisp and clear. The only negative is it doesn't appear to me that it is balanced correctly. The monitor appears to lean slightly to the right.  If I didn't tell you, it would hardly be noticeable if at all. I look at it everyday so I can tell it's leaning ever so slightly....Having said that, it works great and it's not leaning enough to bother me or ruin functionality.

review_title: it has a 3 port video switcher built in!
review_body: It looks & works good.  It also has a 3-year warranty & was a good price.  And I connected it to 3 computers with its 3 different types of video cables.  Then i switched between them by just pressing its input button on the front of it.  So it has a 3 port video switcher built in!

review_title: it is perfect. Aside from a slightly unstable base and the ...
review_body: I have used this for about a year and a half now, it is perfect. Aside from a slightly unstable base and the 75hz cap , this is the perfect monitor. I liked it so much that I bought 3 more and have been using them for the computers around the house. It is well worth it. The screen is great and it runs a very crisp picture. I use it mostly for gaming, and it does a great job, just not running over 75 frames per second. Well worth it.

I ordered the ASUS monitor for my wife to use with her new full tower computer. She really likes the new, larger display. She had been using an ASUS 21.5 inch with DVI input. With the video card and HDMI input, the 3.6 inch is very good for watching Blu-ray movies and game playing. The controls are located on the lower left side of the monitor and are simple to use and the video card installed the correct driver in about 20 seconds.

review_title: From then until recently its been working perfectly fine. Recently however weird streaks of pixels have been ...
review_body: I've purchased this monitor in September of 2017. From then until recently its been working perfectly fine. Recently however weird streaks of pixels have been going across my screen. Think it's a sign of the end of my monitor. I would recommend this product for its price but be aware that since its only 100$ its to be expected that it's not a long-term or end game monitor.

Its beautiful, stylish, thin, light. I bought it with the intention to design, but instead ended up playing videogames more, It's hooked up to my playstation3 via HDMI and my tower via VGA (and its still pretty). I am a graphic designer and this monitor is good  for that stuff.  Text is Sharp & clear. HD is astonishing on it. I tested it out on you tube with the splendid button and HD quality. Its great. I think its a distraction to work though, because its so attractive overall.

review_title: 6 inch laptop but for my new Lenovo desktop I wanted a larger size monitor and after reading several reviews bought this model a
review_body: Previously had a 19 inch desktop monitor and a 15.6 inch laptop but for my new Lenovo desktop I wanted a larger size monitor and after reading several reviews bought this model and I'm glad I did.  Fits perfectly on my computer desk (couldn't have fit a larger size even if I wanted) and the picture is excellent for watching movies, looking at photos or reading digital comic books.

review_title: It works fine for what it is but i didn't really think ...
review_body: It works fine for what it is but i didn't really think about the resolution. My surface pro 4 has a much higher resolution and so it doesnt scale very well. Windows will look distorted and much larger than they should when moving them between screens because of the ratio.

review_title: Works great for travelling work applications
review_body: Works great for travelling work applications.  It's not really meant for gaming, but it is great for its intended purpose.
This is my second extra laptop monitor.  I use it for work and it truly makes using a laptop easier.

review_title: This did the job.  5 stars all around. great product
review_body: GREAT
These look great and work super.
USB cable started malfunctioning about two weeks after purchase.  It was completely unusable within 6 weeks of purchase.
This is perfect for on the go when you need that second screen
It works great.

review_title: Your daily partner if you need more space
review_body: I use this monitor for my daily work on my laptop (17") and since i have this monitor, i can work easier and better at my customers.

review_title: Good Portable Monitor, not very durable though.
review_body: Only wish it had brightness control...
Beautiful and sleek.

review_title: Very nice monitor for such a cheap price
review_body: Very nice monitor for such a cheap price. I would recommend this to any one. Very clear picture and the colors are bright. You'll be glad you bought this monitor.
Could not have done better. Perfect for the purpose.
This Was A Gift Very Good Price
Easy set up, decent picture, you must buy HDMI cord.
So far, so good
Thought I read it somewhere that it had built in speakers but not true, so I had to order a pair of speakers from Amazon
Gorgeous display. Comparable to other display at a much higher price. I’ve had multiple compliments on this display.
I bought this monitor for my wife's computer.  She loves it.

review_title: Awesome as long as you don't need a VESA mount
review_body: Awesome as long as you don't need a VESA mount. Unfortunately I do, but they are light enough that I can improvise ;)

review_title: ... this for a few years now - just really awesome and still in good shape even after moving it ...
review_body: I've had this for a few years now - just really awesome and still in good shape even after moving it around to work spaces several times.
I had a bit of trouble getting this to work with my PS4, but it works.  For the specs, I expected something much smoother, but it is not bad at all.

review_title: Very satisfied. These are TN panels and I am not ...
review_body: Very satisfied. These are TN panels and I am not sure whether I should have paid a little extra for IPS ones. Colors are good. No flicker. A little more sensitive to viewing angle than I thought.

I recently bought this because I wanted something smaller to play Halo 4 and other FPS games on and I must say, it's pretty amazing. It has a VGA, DVI, and HDMI port and though it doesn't come with an HDMI cable, it does come with a VGA and DVI. Piecing together the stand was fairly simple, just make sure that when you put it together that you twist the bottom very tight. After everything is put together, it does wobble around a bit, however, I can assure you that it is very stable. The only difficulties I had were adjusting the screen to get it just right. Also, it doesn't have speakers on the monitor, but there is a headphone jack on the back of the monitor where you can easily plug in your computer speakers. It's tightly packaged and very nice. I am definitely happy with this purchase. :)

Came home from vacation to find a dead monitor. Decided to upgrade to a 24" monitor and found the ASUS on Amazon with great reviews at a very fair price. Shipping was quick and set up was vey straight forward. Color and clarity/sharpness is great and if anything, it was too bright at the initial settings. Our old 19" Samsung was really nice in its day, but this ASUS just blows us away. Reading text is effortless and videos are amazing. Don't hesitate, this is a great monitor.

review_title: Bought this w/ a rebate which was great. A few shipping issues which Amazon handled perfectly
review_body: Bought this w/ a rebate which was great. A few shipping issues which Amazon handled perfectly, only disappointed that it wasn't clear that this model doesn't come with integrated speakers, so I bought external speakers which are likely better anyway. Otherwise, great monitor with great display!

review_title: Perfect monitor for almost any need.
review_body: After almost a year of ownership, I can easily say that this monitor has exceeded all expectations. At 23" it isn't too big for my desk, but the IPS really stands out versus other monitors. The only small complaint I have is that HDMI input does not wake the monitor from sleep while DVI and VGA does. Other than that, graphics are perfect. I will be buying another soon for a dual monitor set up. Would recommend to anyone willing to spend a little extra for true clarity, without getting ridiculous in size.
Works great.  Had it about three months now and it does what it's supposed to do.  No complaints.

review_title: Excellent monitor for picture and sound
review_body: Over the years my laptop screens have gotten smaller and smaller. I started out with a 17" Dell laptop. Now I have a Lenovo with a 14" screen. This has made it difficult to do larger projects, and to work with multiple applications. I found this monitor on Amazon, and absolutely love it. The picture is crystal clear, and the sound is superb.
Excellent monitor... rich vibrant color, nice bright screen with very clear picture. This thing makes for a great gaming monitor on a budget...

Very useful portable monitor. Easy to set up, just plug and play. Great quality picture. It comes with a nice sheath which keeps it safe from scratches or damage while transporting it. Over all I'm very satisfied with this monitor.

review_title: Looks like the device will fail soon
review_body: Have the item for a little over 6 months now. There are increasing number of bright spots appearing on the monitor with some distortion of the image at these spots. Looks like the device will fail soon. I am not happy with the warranty process at all.
I have two that I use them with my laptop when I travel and it work perfect
Couldn’t get it to work with my computer. Returned it.
Nice monitor

Power cord has very short life and constantly disconnects despite repeated attempts to change position and angle of connection.  Plug on back of monitor is way too sensitive.  Should have much more stable connection given its supposed to be portable in nature.  I'd avoid.
Great screen! Exactly what my wife wanted!
Works great as a 2nd monitor when working in another office or from home. Light and easy to carry.

review_title: i love it for a second monitor
review_body: i love it for a second monitor, but the colors are a bit off, and there is no way to adjust it.

review_title: glitchy, sometimes need to unplug and replug to get ...
review_body: glitchy, sometimes need to unplug and replug to get working, and from time to time need to reinstate the drives, why???????
This is a really good monitor for 1080p. Especially with border-less "border" and the near 24 inches (actually 23.8). I also find it to be better than the  ASUS VS239H-P I had.
Good monitor nice and thin bezel

review_title: This has been a pretty good monitor for the price
review_body: This has been a pretty good monitor for the price. I knew that a lot of people had bleeding issues with the backlight, but I have not had that problem. I'd recommend buying this monitor for the cost, size, and quality.
great
Within the first hours of use got a died pixel. The picture quality is great for the price.
Easy to use and very clear picture.
No HDMI cable was given despite it being one of the included items listed on the manual that came with the monitor.
GREAT COLOR

review_title: Great for waching video, but not so great for gaming
review_body: It is great because it is big, I use to use 21" monitor for games on my computer; however I think it puts lots of stress on my video card and it has froze up my computer and had to restart.  I think it is great for watching high quality videos, great to surf the internet and able to have multiple windows open.  However, not best for gaming; so it would really depend on what you would use the monitor for.  For me it was gaming so I gave it a 3 start, if it was for watching video, I would have given a 5 star.  It is not great but it is not poor enough for me to return it either.
Great

review_title: Nice colors Good resolution Sleek design Great price Cons
review_body: I've had this screen for about 5 months now.

review_title: Do not buy this, find another one
review_body: Giving this the worst rating ever, video input is manual so you have to change the input before disconnecting the current input if you want to change. Totally worthless.

I bought a pair of these for my two monitor setup at home. One is wired with HDMI, the other with DVI. I have an Ergotron monitor stand so this review doesn't include the base. They are so vibrant. There is no dead pixels either. I really love how the plugs go straight out, not down. This relieves a lot of stress in the cabling. The quality really is outstanding. Note that if you use HDMI with your PC you may have to adjust your graphics card settings for the picture to look right. If it looks bad, it's the PC, not the monitor. I may buy another pair in summer for my dorm room. At the listed price I would most certainly recommend.

review_title: Killer monitor at a fantastic price!
review_body: Fantastic monitor, very happy to have it.  People have complained about the base not being very stable but I have had no issues with it, even with kids bumping into my desk.  The picture is awesome and I have no issues whatsoever with this purchase.  For the price, I don't think that you can find a better monitor.

I bought this monitor to replace an old Dell monitor in a tri monitor display. When I received it, it was packaged very nicely and seemed of good external quality. However agree turning it on and connecting it via hdmi, I found the color to be cold, saturated, and extremely sharp. The text on this monitor versus my five year old Dell's was grainy and difficult to read. So I adjusted some settings and while the color seemed better, the text was still awful. So, my second course of action was to try DVI. On DVI this monitor works much better. My HDMI was a high quality cable and I'm powering my monitors using a dual GPU. I found the color and text to be much less harsh using the DVI cable.
Bought this in April of last year.

I have no regret to spend a little more money on this monitor.  It is big, good picture, bright, good for my eyes.  I can tell the different right away when you switch from one screen to this 27 inch screen.  I didn't care much about the speakers because I have better one attach to my PC.  All I can say that I think you would not be disappoint about this monitor.  Myself, I like ASUS products (mother board and graphic card).  I build my own PC, my son, my daughter, and my 77 years old mother in law who absolutely love her ASUS PC that I got her.

review_title: overall the picture and color qualiry is great, like expecting i love asus products
review_body: the stand for the monitor is weak and not as strong as most. overall the picture and color qualiry is great, like expecting i love asus products. the vesa mount on the back is great too. i would recommend getting a bigger size display if you are using high resolution graphics card as this monitor is not quite big enough to sit at the back of your desk, making it hard to read fine point text
Running old macbook HDMI cable 1920 X 1080 60Hz.
Happy with this product. Even for being 2 millisecond delay, its just as good as the 1 ms. No streaks , no ghosting. Bright vivid and clear. Lightweight easy to move around and adjust. Plug and play.
It was ok, I was hoping for a better screen clarity.  But for the price.. it's ok.
Product worked great for a few months. However, the USB connection is failing and the screen constantly turns on and off making it unusable.

Simple, functional, and serves the purpose of being able to work on two screens while traveling for work.  I like that it's powered by USB so there's no additional adapter to have to deal with.  Someday might want to upgrade to a monitor with higher definition, but for a rough $100, this is a great deal.
Bought this extra screen. It worked well until the cord connection gets loose on back of screen and it wont stay on.

The display works great, although windows 10 made it a little bit tricky to install, the AOC website does have a win 8/8.1 version that seems to work just fine in all usb ports on my win 10 laptop ... Most impressive, is the size of the display, it really is thin and lightweight and the resoloution is good enough for web surfing, and general office tasks that i use it for ...
Love this monitor.  Running on a Windows 7 HP ProBook as a second monitor.  Only needed to use one USB for power, but I recommend a USB extension.

I purchased this monitor to be able to carry a second monitor with me when traveling for work. It functions perfectly. I have been recommending this monitor to anyone I know who is looking for a small, easy, lightweight, and portable second (or third) monitor to extend their desktop. I have plugged three of these into my laptop at the same time and they worked great with no lag or slow down of the computer itself.

I am a big fan of multiple monitors and on my basement desktop I use 5 USB display devices so I purchased this knowing that USB display works. I was a little cautious since I hadn't ever bought a monitor with built in display adapter but I saw that it was from the maker of the display adapters I already use and that made me feel confident. The monitor works good enough and beware if you are on the go without a charger the extra monitor will add to your battery drain and unfortunately it uses up 2 USB ports so combined with my Bluetooth dongle this leaves me with extra ports.
Pleasantly surprised for the price tag. A beautiful basic yet bright and wonderfully practical screen.
Great, quality product. No power cords and very convenient.
After 1 1/2 years, the monitor no longer detects the hdmi and states no signal. After contacting Acer, I have to send back for repairs at my cost even with a warranty. Wouldn't purchase it again.
This was perfect for my 15yr old son. I was very pleased with my purchase.

review_title: Great Screen, No speaker, sub-par mount
review_body: I ordered this mainly to watch stock market graphs, without realizing that there are no speakers. It has a great picture resolution using HDMI, but with no speaker it is pretty pointless to try and watch a YouTube video...or anything requiring sound, which would be nice. Perhaps if I change from an HDMI connection to VGA I might can get the sound out of my connected laptop,(there's no soind at all using HDMI connection as this carries sound)... but my new Dell 5000 only has HDMI & USB outputs, so I don't know if I can convert it or not. Also the stand doesn't fit snugly; I bought a wall mount from HumanCentric for $30 but beware of getting it into this display - it's a super tight fit & it's only my dogged persistnt nature that enabled me to pound the bracket into it w/o breking the display - thankfully. as another reviewer wrote, ACER should make a wall mount that works availabke for this large a display at a reasonable price!
Beautiful screen and easy to put up
Great quality and killer bang for the buck!  Comes with all the cables you'll need
Good size, use it with my ASUS Win 10 laptop
Great!
Beautiful monitor. Great price and got hear quick.
No complaints here! If your on a budget gaming or productivity wise this is the best and cleanest looking monitor on the market!

review_title: No problem with any of my amazon orders. I’ve ordered about 30/35 items so far
review_body: Love the monitor. For people on a budget

Decent picture but the audio jack is terrible,played a song on YouTube on my laptop with computer speakers, sounds fine,then played the same song with the laptop hooked up through the monitor with the speakers plugged into the monitor and the sound is awful. Will return

review_title: Good monitor ... and a good deal
review_body: As the title says.  I have complete faith in Asus when it comes down to computer hardware but I was wondering why this monitor was so much cheaper than it's equal size competitors.
Good monitor with a great warranty, It is even better when you can get it on sale.
Beautiful picture and colors. The reason for 4 stars is because I don't like the positioning of the inputs in the back. You pretty much need a 90° adapter if you want to put it against a wall.
I have had this monitor less than 24 hours and I love the size and the clarity.  This monitor replaces a 3 year old 24inch HP

This unit arrived on time in perfect condition.  Works as advertised.  I use it as my primary computer monitor as well as playing videos, etc.  Color is great, picture is stable and clear.  I'm not pushing 3D or anything that intensive, but it works.  I would recommend this as a reliable mid-range HD video unit for an office or home.  I have not used it for gaming or any other high output like CAD and I don't think it would perform well in that environment.

review_title: A good product or a good price.
review_body: Liked the clarity  of the picture was everything that I needed and the price was right the size was great for me it was a great buy.

Very big! The .6 difference from a standard 23 inch desktop monitor makes it appear like a small television set rather than a computer monitor. As with any large screen, it looks terrible if you are playing video that is not high resolution, but that is not the screen's fault, blame your crappy video (netflicks). Controls are also kind of terrible, but they work and hopefully you don't mess with them a lot. Color and clarity are what you expect on a cheap monitor, which these days is quite good. Would be better if it had the ability to turn on it's side, but budget monitors having fixed stands is probably not something that is going away any time soon.

I bought this because I needed a bigger screen to work with.  The resolution is great and I was really impressed with the quality of this product.  The monitor was compatible and worked instantly with my macbook air with a minidisplay to hdmi cord for about $10 from amazon.  I remember reading some reviews about how the stand is wobbly, but it doesn't seem wobbly at all to me, and I have a pretty unstable desk.  In fact, I would go so far as to say the stand is stable, and a strong point for this product.  When assembling the stand, which was very easy, make sure you insert the plastic tab into the hole, then tighten the screw.  Anyway, I would highly recommend this product.  My only gripe is that I bought this a few days before the rebate was offered and can't get the money off.

I've had this monitor for almost a year now, so I figured it was time to turn in a review.  Hands down the best, sharpest, brightest, and fastest responding monitor I have ever had.  Zero problems with it, aside from it being so bright that sunglasses are needed sometimes.  The brightness, however, can be turned down.  For the price, I cannot fathom a better deal in monitors.  The negative incline is very nice for when I lean way back in the chair while gaming, and it's easy to see all corners of the monitor sharply from wide angles.  Just not enough nice things to say about this monitor.

review_title: When it works, it works well.
review_body: The monitor came exactly as described; nice screen resolution, perfect size for portability while being big enough to view or have as a second screen for my surface pro. The USB cable connection is flimsy and it does not always connect properly to the tablet. Now that I am out of the return window, it is not connecting at all. So I would highly recommend except for the reliability issue.

review_title: a good monitor for the cost
review_body: This monitor works just as expected and I encountered no problems with this order. I would recommend it to anyone who needs a small win-8 compatible USB monitor.

The display looks nice however it doesn't work with my ASUS N56V laptop running windows 7 64b. The device software is not compatible with the laptop USB 3 and Intel Graphics drivers. I called AOC and they confirmed that it will not work due to this issue.

review_title: Was really happy with it until it stopped working.  :(
review_body: Worked great at first, but it has stopped working after only a few months.  I was really disappointed because I liked the product and the convenience of it.

review_title: Spent an hour trying to get this to work on ...
review_body: Spent an hour trying to get this to work on a new (<1 year old) Dell laptop and kept receiving messages that it was incompatible.  Updated video drivers, verified install, etc. to no avail.  Returned it at that point.

review_title: very cool some times have to restart the computer when the ...
review_body: very cool some times have to restart the computer when the driver fails but light and works well when I need some extra desk space while on the road

Super monitor. Thin, easy reach controls, great resolution. Just what I wanted.
It works as a second screen, however it is not that bright but for the price it will do.
Great product! Easy to setup!
For the $$ and the resolution.. Great!
Great image for a really low price.
The only thing I didn't like about this is that it dosent swivel
good quality panel.
Great as a Christmas gift for my husband.

review_title: Great Monitor, it's working with my mac mini 2014 ...
review_body: Great Monitor, it's working with my mac mini 2014 perfectly and looks amazing, will definitely be buying a second one to get the double monitor action going!
nice clear picture for my son's computer
Sharp picture and very bright.
Worked good for 1 year, then started flickering. I should have sprung for the extended warranty.
my son bought it he likes it

review_title: ... extension of my Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro and am satisfied. Set up was plug and play into my ...
review_body: Purchased the monitor as part of an extension of my Lenovo Yoga 2 Pro and am satisfied. Set up was plug and play into my Startec hub, with Windows 8. The only issue was, as noted by others, color and resolution. I am still tweaking colors and resolution, just haven't found the right mix yet. Not enough of an issue to send back or give poor rating, just a bit of a challenge to get it just right for my liking. I may buy another one to complete my dual monitor set up.

Needed the cheapest hd monitor with hdmi input.  Put this in the bedroom, on a cable tv box along with inexpensive logitech computer speakers.  It works fine, and beats the heck out of the old 16" tv it replaced.  The speakers connect via the earphone jack, no adapter needed.  It has several video modes (warm, cool, etc.) and the tv controls the volume.  Perfect for the application, and great picture.  We love it.

review_title: Much better than what I expected
review_body: Much better than what I expected. Excellent quality. HDMI connection is good for my lap top. But you need buy HDMI cable. Other two type connection was included which I don't use.

review_title: If you love your eyes, don't buy this monitor!
review_body: If you love your eyes, don't buy this monitor!

review_title: Monitor looks great and works great.
review_body: The picture is clear and crisp and all the functions work perfectly.  Can connect through multiple types of wires, I have mine connected via HDMI.  My only issue with the monitor was that the base is a little tricky to get on, something about the angle that the screw goes in makes it difficult.  The monitor can be tilted to several different angles for improved viewing.  All things considered, no problems with this monitor.
Love these monitors.  Own two of them.  Nice, bright and clear.  Who could ever go back to just one monitor?

I gifted this monitor to a friend and wow was he amazed at what he's been missing.  He's been using an old 19" lcd as his basic everyday computer monitor so getting this was like a difference between night and day.  It has amazing contrast blacks look black and whites look white.  Gaming and watching movies on it are like a dream.  It is extremely slim and is aesthetically pleasing.  Friend and I highly recommend this monitor.
Okay dudes,

Great monitor, I have owned it for about a week and a half now. I AM IN LOVE with it. No visible signs of glare, it could be just my room but its perfect for my situation. I basically use it as my TV in my room. I turn on netflix and i watch it from my bed before I sleep. I would recommend this product to anyone is who uses the computer a lot. (I game pretty hard and its picture is amazing),
Bought as a second monitor for the household gaming rig.  Great color. No complaints.

review_title: Great second screen that I use for trading at hotel ...
review_body: Have been using for a substantial amount of time. Travel all the time. Great second screen that I use for trading at hotel rooms when I travel.  Highly recommend.

I found this easy to start up, just plug in and go.  I like the screen size and quality.  It has definitely extended the useable life of the dated old laptop i'm using. If you need a quick, convenient fix, replacement or extension, it's a go!

review_title: Initially received bad software but this issue was resolved by downloading software
review_body: Initially received bad software but this issue was resolved by downloading software. Excellent for fieldwork especially if you are accustomed to dual or triple displays in the office. It will definitely make your work experience more efficient.
Love this monitor, great for traveling or just having an extra monitor on your desk at work!
Used three times before screen cracked....VERY flimsy and delicate.

review_title: Overall functioned fine but did have to download a driver for the ...
review_body: Very dim back light.  I attach to my MacPro and wish there was a brightness adjustment on the monitor.  Overall functioned fine but did have to download a driver for the Mac.
Very handy while on the road!
Worked great when I got it then it broke 3 months after I got it.
This monitor is great especially for the money..

review_title: Anything pf too great complexity will render it incapable of more than 10 ...
review_body: Bought this a few months ago and it regularly freezes and performs at a much lower frame rate than is acceptable. Anything pf too great complexity will render it incapable of  more than 10 fps, and it often will stop displaying anything and need to be reconnected
very nice monitor.

review_title: The setup is easy and the picture quality is great
review_body: First 1080p monitor I had and don't regret a thing. The setup is easy and the picture quality is great! Another plus is that there's no reflections from light on the screen. Definitely a must buy.
Loved it so much got a second one. Great buy

review_title: Nice and bright and no light bleeding
review_body: Nice and bright and no light bleeding! Taking off one star as the colors are not quite as vivid as another matte monitor I have.
Very nice display.

review_title: Those work fine. I was just disappointed because I needed a ...
review_body: I didn't pay attention to these not being VESA compatible. For those who aren't tech savy, that means that they do not have the 4 holes in the back that allow you to mount these on wall brackets or dual monitor mounts or other similar setups. You can basically only use the desktop stands that come with the units. Those work fine. I was just disappointed because I needed a dual monitor setup. I will now have to order two more monitors. The picture is great on these and the thin bezel is nice. I just don't understand why anyone makes a monitor these days without the VESA mounts. Especially one with a thin bezel that is made for multi monitor setups....
The ips display is great. Looks good from anywhere in the room. I love the low profile boarders. I plan on getting another soon to get a complete dual monitor setup .
perfect for my roll around computer cart
Great monitor! Vivid colors, has all the inputs I need. Great Price. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good monitor.

review_title: but looks great when set up
review_body: Arrived on time and without a scratch. the monitor has to be assembled to the base, but looks great when set up. happy with the purchase.

I bought this to replace my Samsung SyncMaster that crapped out on me after less than a year of use. So far, I am very happy with this monitor. The screen is big and beautiful. It is thin, slightly thicker than the Samsung, but if it will last longer than a year I will take that trade-off. The screen is able to be tilted up, down, left, and right which is a nice feature that many monitors do not have. It powers on and off quickly and I have had no problems with it so far.
I bought this to replace an older monitor that seemed to be going bad. Maybe my expectations were low, but this was a spectacular replacement. Great contrasts and colors and very responsive.
I didn't realize how boring the colors were on my HP Pavilion g7 monitor until I installed this to my graphics card.
This screen is great for the money. I had to make some display adjustments on my computer first but once I did the monitor is very, very clean and great colors.

Just got 2 of these today.  Easy to set up as most monitors are.  Very nice for the price.  I am a little dissappointed in the view angle, it is not bad, but with two of these side by side I can see some slight color difference in the corners due to the poor view angle.  No dead pixels on either monitor, which is great!  I definintely do recommend this monitor at this price point.

Great product! Ordered 2! Arrived with no dead pixels. I did not adjusting the color because I did not see a need to maybe someone with a better tech background would disagree. I have both monitors hooked up to my PC as well as using one of the monitors as a second screen for my Macbook Pro. Picture is amazing!
Nice crisp looking monitor. I already had one. Got a second for a dual display. They are mated to a CAD/graphics computer.

I bought this monitor about a week ago after 2 months researched/compared to other monitors and pretty pleased with it. No dead pixels so far everything look crystal clear. Back-light is a little too bright for my taste at first; after adjusted it down to 60% everything perfect.

I was a skeptic when I was considering whether or not to buy this screen brand but so far after a couple of months using it, it really is a great screen. I don't really us the "Smart Contrast Ratio" options as it is a bit of a nuisance I leave it with my own personal settings and it works fine. No delay, barley and light blur from sun light and a good $20 rebate to make it even better.

review_title: Looks fantastic. Bright screen and easy to set up
review_body: Looks fantastic. Bright screen and easy to set up. I like that the stand is now skinnier and the way it hooks in is very intuitive.
Didn't last long before the USB connection to the back would not work anymore. Junk. I got about 6 months out of it before it stopped working. Pretty sure it's the connection port in the back.
Works great! I had no problem with install. It’s been several months and still works great
Great image quality, light, sturdy and has true plug-n-play accessibility. I own a Windows 10 laptop.

review_title: Monitor stopped working after 4 months. Out of return ...
review_body: Monitor stopped working after 4 months.  Out of return policy. I wish I would have bought the warranty.  This was only used about 5 times over 5 months.
Stopped working after 5 months

review_title: This monitor was a great investment. I work with excel a lot and ...
review_body: This monitor was a great investment.  I work with excel a lot and using two screens helps work get done more efficiently.  There are no power issues, it comes with a protective cover.  Its great for work and play if you want to watch Netflix or something like that.  It is small enough to fit in my computer bag, a big plus is that you don't have to charge it.  Great investment for me.

review_title: ... wears out so it won't stay attached rendering it useless. A portable monitor is meant to be taken ...
review_body: This is a really handy monitor but the power cord for it wears out so it won't stay attached rendering it useless. A portable monitor is meant to be taken places and used, and this process means that the power cord eventually wears out and won't stay in- its a poorly designed, non standard power cord.
Perfect with my T570 laptop, same size, same resolution, same ratio.
Easy setup and use. Clear screen. Medium sharpness. Great buy.
Quality is only so so but works great as a secondary monitor.
Amazing budget monitor. Would recommend to anyone. Make sure to have your own HDMI cable or otherwise though. Only comes with VGA cables.

Absolutely love these monitors! We bought 2 because we use them side to side! We bought them a few months and are working great! If you're thinking about buying new monitors do not hesitate!! Buy these!!!!!!
Great monitor and a great value. Recomended

review_title: Really nice monitor, I have this monitor plugged into my ...
review_body: Really nice monitor, I have this monitor plugged into my Xbox one and PC, great image quality, the amount of setting that can be changed is great. It's very light and thin. It great for gaming, I've played halo 5, fallout 4, mine craft, and they all look great
nice
nice picture I like it
Clear image, no light bleed, great size.
Works great. Great price!
It Looks great and works great!

review_title: Great monitor. Doesn't come with an HDMI cable but ...

review_title: Got this monitor and it failed to turn on after ...
review_body: Got this monitor and it failed to turn on after one use. Which is odd, I'm guessing its a rare defect one.

review_title: Monitor Good, but dont factor in rebate asreason to get
review_body: I got the monitor on time and in good shape.  It works well, the color and resolution are good.  Seems like a good price.  The monitor does sit a little low so you will either need something for stand to sit on top of (though my wife says she is fine with where stand sits) or get a separate stand which looks like it can be attached without too much problem.  Worst thing about the purchase is the rebate of $20.  As expected they do not make it easy to get the rebate, not expected were two complications, first the $20 is in the form of an American Express gift card, 2nd, when you sign up for the rebate you are asked whether you want "expedited service" for a $2 fee, then you will get the rebate in 7-10 days, basic service with no fee is 8-10 weeks.  Rebate hassle is reason for 4 stars.
very fast shipping, i got monitor one day before the expect day they gave me! very fast and great quality on this monitor.
I had to return this one.  The color was way off, even after messing with all of the settings.  Never even came close.  The HP I ended up getting is way better.
+Picture quality is good, great colors.

These monitors (I bought 2) are incredible. The picture quality and response times are fantastic. I am not a hardcore gamer but i do play a couple of games and they work great for me. The full HD is great and a major improvement over my 16 year old Dell monitor. Being able to mount my Gigabyte Brix computer to the Vesa mounts on the back is a nice space savings feature as well. If i needed to I could also use these mounts to get the monitors off my desk and mounted to a rack or the wall. Another great ASUS product so far.
Well suited for my needs and satisfactory on all ways. Combined with a great price I'm pleased with the purchase.

I like it so far. I don't game or anything, I just have browsers and other software running and everything looks as it should. Every now and then I see a weird flicker on it but I'm not sure if its the monitor or my video card. It doesn't happen often and it's no big deal right now anyway. Just thought I'd mention it in case there are other reports of the same thing.

I recently bought a new computer, so needed a new monitor as well. This ASUS 1ms monitor does the job with whatever you throw at it. It was initially a little bright, but the menu to adjust the settings of the monitor is more than sufficient to set it up to the liking of the user. Playing games with this monitor is an absolute joy as well! 5 stars!
First class. I use it as my main monitor instead of just a portable for traveling.

review_title: Piece of junk! Stopped working after nine months!
review_body: I purchased this in August 2016 and it no longer works.  Like other people have mentioned, mine has a bad connection where the USB cord plugs into the monitor.  I suggest you don't buy this piece of junk.

review_title: It does what it is supposed to do well.
review_body: Very portable, fits in my carry-on when traveling.  I use it for work and gaming, and there is no noticeable refresh/frame rate issues while plugged into a USB 3.0 port.  My only gripe with it is the viewing angle, which could definitely use some improvement.  I have to position it just right to see the screen as clear as it can get.  Also, the cord could be a bit longer, but that's pretty minor.  I am definitely looking into getting the bigger version of this screen.
Great little second screen for laptop just the right size for companion screen.  Clear and very readable.  I would recommend it for anyone who uses multiple screens

review_title: Its been a rocky road with this one so far... I'm holding out hope though.
review_body: Update 2:

Great resolution, portability, excelent connectivity (USB 2.0 on my laptop ), the first time I had to restart the os, from there on, it was perfect. The little black spot is the  inclined position by the support
Great monitor. Easy to setup when traveling.

review_title: Works well with my newer laptop. Can't get it ...
review_body: Works well with my newer laptop. Can't get it working with my work laptop which is the primary reason I purchased it.
product is fine, a little bit of a hassle to set up without a CD drive.  Case is completely insufficient to protect the monitor when traveling - buy the protection plan.
great product - but can't make it work with my MAC book - use with my PC
Good!
Great monitor, the slim profile is fantastic and stylish.
Cheapest of Amazon at this size, but sufficiently quality for developers, home users. Good especially for multiple monitor users since it has less than half centimeter thick frame.
I love the colors!

review_title: Perfect for any normal user but if you're a pixal ...
review_body: Perfect for any normal user but if you're a pixal freak this won't be for you but for a normal user this is beautiful with very skinny bezels so buying perhaps 2 or 3 of this would work perfect

review_title: Thinking about buying a second one.

Looks great! Works awesome!
The monitor was absolutely beautiful but unfortunately had to return it because it was not mountable to a wall/dual monitor/triple monitor mount. :(
Monitor broke already it’s been 7 days the led is broke already 10/10 don’t recommend

They have a nice glow to them.  Bright colors, good range.  With the right video card drivers you can tweak the display better.  The on-monitor settings are pretty plane and the weird color technology is pretty useless, it tends to darken or make everything look blue or yellow.  Just keeping the color mode to Standard and tweaking the colors in the video card software is probably your best bet.

review_title: The monitor itself is not bad. Only complaint is that after it goes to ...
review_body: The monitor itself is not bad. Only complaint is that after it goes to sleep when connected to my Mac, I have to restart it to bring it back (hitting the key on the laptop brings Mac back but not the monitor). The reason I give two star is that the rebate does not work. I follow the instructions and it got stuck at the rebate offer search page after I clicked on the "I accept and agree...". Tried many times and never worked.
Pros:

Great, cheap monitor. It took some time to adjust calibrate the screen and colors, but once I did, I was very impressed with the quality considering the price. Its very disappointing that there is no Display port, but oh well, dvi and hdmi is good enough.

I had dual Dell monitors (ST2310) but one started flaking out on me recently and eventually died so I went searching for a new, inexpensive, 23" monitor I could use along side the remaining Dell.  I was afraid the quality of the ASUS wouldn't match the Dell but those worries were totally removed the second I booted up my PC with the ASUS and Dell running side-by-side.  The difference is night and day...The ASUS is sharper and brighter.  I assumed that I just had the brightness too low on the Dell but adjustments and calibration didn't make a difference and simply increasing the brightness just washed everything out.  At this price I'm seriously considering purchasing another one and using the working Dell as a spare.

Terrific monitor.  I have it set up as a dual monitor alongside an AOC monitor and the difference is striking.  Color, clarity, and viewing angles are significantly better with this monitor.  I connect it to my work laptop via an HDMI-to-micro-displayport adapter and it works flawlessly.
Building out a new work/gaming rig, and after spending hours reading reviews on TN monitors I decided to pull the trigger with the ASUS VS248H-P.

review_title: A perfect monitor for digital artists.
review_body: Response time is a facet that is commonly overlooked when it comes to display peripherals.  However, if you use high precision input peripherals such as wacom tablets or a 3d mouse (3d connexion) as I do, a good response time is EXTREMELY important.  After buying this 1ms monitor, I don't think I'll ever be able to use anything less.  And Asus always delivers when it comes to picture quality and durability.  All that, paired with an unbeatable price, you simply can't do better than this.  I highly recommend this monitor for anyone that does any type of digital art with a wacom tablet or any high-reflex based gaming like mobas or 3d shooters.

This monitor Is a really good priced monitor. I really enjoyed playing my Xbox One S on it and the graphics and reaction time to it is amazing. For you young or old gamers out there, I would recommend you getting this monitor for such a cheap priced gaming monitor. The only down side was that the package came in late and was a waste of money for one day shipping. But most importantly, the package still came later that day.

Not much to stay other than it's a good monitor at an excellent. My only minor complaint is that the stand could have been a bit more sturdy to prevent wiggle movement from desk bumping and shifting of items of the desk.
Worst purchase I have made. Connector simply doesn't work; monitor goes in and out and makes doing work very frustrating. Install was a frustrating process as well. The resolution is not good either.
AOC monitor literally stopped working out of the blue! Did not drop it, did not spill anything on it, but all of a sudden the monitor just stopped working. Would not buy this!!!
Easy to set up.  Color and resolution are great.  Makes my laptop a good CAD workstation.  Fits in my laptop briefcase.

Excellent monitor for my needs. It was easy to set up (I'm using Win7) and worked as expected immediately. The view is more clear than my laptop screen and is invaluable as an extended display monitor for travel. I recommend this to any "road-warrior".
Had trouble from the beginning with the connection and stopped working a few months after purchase
Very easy & convinent to use. Compact & fit in your laptop bag.

review_title: It is an ok screen at best but it will do in a pinch
review_body: Update:  4/22/15 It broke. Just stopped working one day.

review_title: Good luck getting it to work on your machine.
review_body: The size and weight were the "pros" on it, but that's about all. The documentation was not very helpful, and translated rather poorly. Now this might be a problem inherit with all USB monitors, but the lag time was horrible. And the monitor itself would not turn on until I entered Display settings and clicked the Identify button. And Chrome browser didn't work well. I did check the driver and there was no update for it, so I suppose it was the correct one.

review_title: Delivered on a Sunday, works great
review_body: Delivered on a Sunday, works great, only minor thing would be that my mouse speed and sensitivity changes slightly when going from one monitor to the next. Going to look for a solution but it's not a big deal if there isn't one. I imagine it might have to do with the refresh rate.

review_title: It was great until it stopped working
review_body: I purchased for work and i have only used it three times.  The connection on the monitor is now loose and will no longer stay in.  I have only owned for a little over 30 days and I don't carry it around.

Great color and I love it
Works like a monitor should

It was a gift for my son. He loves it!
BRIGHT COLORS, MODERN LOOK!
These monitors are awesome. Excellent quality for low price.
Very nice monitor
Pretty good monitor

review_title: An awesome monitor, at a great price!
review_body: This is a phenomenal monitor. The colors are very crisp and clean. The viewing angles are great! The preset display settings are great as is for watching movies in cinema mode, or switching to games for gaming.

I am a long time fan of ASUS motherboards, and wasn't sure if it was up to par on the monitor scene. Have to say, so far I have been satisfied. Setting up the colors will be a pain, but once set it works like a charm.

review_title: Great clarity, nice form factor, sleek design
review_body: Overall I like the ASUS monitor and it has great clarity for the price.  The one thing that would have made it better is to have an HDMI cable in the box.  It only had the DVI and the serial cable.  Other than that very good monitor shipped fast as usual with amazon prime. One improvement that could be made is a height adjustment so that you could look straight rather than down when you are sitting at the desk.

This is my first ASUS product and wasn't disappointed.  The extreme high contrast (50,000,000:1) and response time of 2ms made it an outstanding product. I am not a tech geek but a regular user that uses complex excel calculation and have no patience for any unclear or blurry display or slow response time.  The wide screen feature is similar to other brands and do allow more to be displayed on one screen. Overall, the ASUS monitor did demonstrate the capabilities especially when compared with my old Dell swivel monitor in the office.
I keep it at the lowest brightness and it's still too much. The colors never seem to be right either.

The ASUS Monitors are an excellent choice and the price is great! I purchased two of the 23" to run as a dual screen setup on my new PC. Very simple plug and play operation. As a matter of fact all I did was plug them in, install an HDMI cable to connect to my pc and turned them on. I have not needed to make any adjustments and the picture/resolution is great. No Speakers however I knew this prior to purchase. Outputs: 1x HDMI, 1x DVI, 1x VGA and 1x Headphone/speaker jack. Comes with a DVI and VGA cable.

Great laptop for the price. I had some troubles connecting HDMI through a Windows 7 PC. Scoured the internet for a long time before giving up. Also wish there was an adjustabled stand so I could rotate it on its side (I use excel a lot). Clarity is great, love the easy access ports in the back. Solid monitor for the price.
The BOMB !!! Highly recommended..... And the price is right

review_title: This is my go to monitor.
review_body: This is my go to monitor. I have purchased quite a few of these and so far, no issues. I have read some other reviews stating there are good models and bad models, but I guess I have received all good. I use three of these on my personal machine and I love them.

review_title: Good build quality and be at display!
review_body: Great monitor! I'm not using this for my gaming rig but I'm using it for my office and it is the perfect size and quality for what it is. It might not be the prettiest of the monitors out for the price but the build quality and the display is well worth the price. Very clear and bright display perfect for all different types of uses!

It is very useful. Very good quality for its price. Very easy to use.

DEAD PIXEL AFTER ONLY 1 MONTH!!! One month and four days, to be exact. Of course, I noticed it only four days after the return window closed for Amazon. Now, AOC did a lot of things right. The 75x75 mm VESA holes on the back were an excellent feature. It's nice and light, definitely portable. I can carry it around in my backpack with my laptop. However, the color isn't great, and the dead pixel is a huge issue for me because I'm a graphic artist. My recommendation: don't buy this model, spend the money on a higher end brand.
Males working on my laptop so much more efficient! Don't know how I got along before without it and not sure what room me so long to but one.

Awesome, I love it and its a good price!

I picked up this monitor to go with my macbook pro. I edit video and needed another display that wasn't as expensive as the Apple Cinema Display. Obviously this is significantly less, so I wasn't expecting anything mind blowing. Well, the color is great. The blacks are dark. The resolution is full HD. It works great with my 2011 macbook pro and is well worth the price! The only negative is the stand is a little wobbly, but I'll live with it for the price. Definitely consider it

Mine are good. No dead pixels. Colors are good straight out of the box, I didn't even configure or adjust them(and I'm a video/photo editor). The color on these monitors are closer to my MacBook Pro retina colors'

review_title: Great Monitor - make sure you have the right HDMI cable length.
review_body: The monitor was packaged well - no damage in shipping. Setup was easy, but I didn't have a short HDMI cable - I was using a 20 footer that I use when doing presentations to large screen TVs at other office sites. The monitor didn't work.
First monitor received had several dead pixels. The replacement has unfortunately one dead pixel but it is in the corner and less obvious.

review_title: WOW has made my computer experiences a whole new world.
review_body: My other monitors were a little bit old and blurry so I purchased two of these. I am pleasantly and unpleasantly surprised.
Not much not to like about the monitor- good picture,  nice size, easy setup, multiple input options, and great price. No dead pixels.

good quality overall. some problems: 1, display glitch during some games, I play pixie game Starbound and there is visible horizontal refreshing line in screen. 2, doesn't support vertical/portrait placement and display well. has different colors when looking it at different angles, anyway it's subtle problem.
This monitor works well. It allows for HDMI, VGA, and DVI. It has some calibration controls but I really haven't had to mess with them since I set it up.
Looks wonderful for the price point.

review_title: Bought two of these and they both broke within 3 ...
review_body: Bought two of these and they both broke within 3 months of use. Not very durable if you are going to haul this around in a backpack or laptop case.
Arrived the last day as promised.  Purchased for work, makes working remotely much easier for multitasking on line.

review_body: Great portable monitor runs of USB power from laptop. Just what I needed for working travel and just hanging out way from office.

Great Energy Star device, once the display link is installed the display is easy to set up and use on a daily basis. Provides a high quality image.

Works well

review_title: Pretty disappointed in Acer customer service on this one
review_body: At work, I buy hundreds of Acer monitors per year.  This one turned out to be a dud.  After a week of use, the screen started flashing on and off and wouldn't stay on for more than 10 seconds at a time.  I sent it off for repair which took weeks, and when I got it back, there was a repair sheet stating that there was nothing wrong AND the screen was cracked across one corner.  Pretty disappointed in Acer customer service on this one.  Luckily, Amazon was able to help me out with their fantastic customer service.
Monitor works great. My only problem with it is that the brightness adjustment isn't as effective as advertised, and it still is a bit too bright for use in very dark environments.
Bought as a gift for my dad, he loves it.

review_title: Awesome HD monitor for the price
review_body: I bought a new PC and kept my old 19 inch SD monitor. After about 2 weeks, I decided to take advantage of my video card and buy a new HD monitor. After about 4 straight hours of research I decided on this one. It arrived today and let me tell you, its awesome. I hooked it up HDMI and had no problems at all. I didn't have to mess with any settings, everything was already set great. Its super bright and very colorful. 720p & 1080p videos look amazing. And for $200, I highly recommend.

My friend has the same monitor and he recommended it to me. I have a fun little set up where this monitor is hooked up to my laptop, and it works perfectly. The picture it crisp and I have no problem with the colors being off. I love it, especially for the price.

review_title: t=1670817 The forum has a ton of useful monitor overclocking information as well as some pretty much ...
review_body: I've been using this monitor for a year and some change now and it hasn't skipped a beat. I've even overclocked it to 72Mhz, but do so at your own risk. If your interested try

review_title: I really enjoy the full slate of input options and the fact ...
review_body: This was a utilitarian purchase to fit lots of uses. I really enjoy the full slate of input options and the fact that internal speakers and a headphone jack are on board. The image quality is really good, acceptable for the price paid. If you're looking for the highest quality image display however, you get what you pay for so you need to invest significantly more money.

review_title: Awesome monitor for a great price
review_body: Awesome monitor for a great price. Has multiple different ways of connecting (VGA, DVI and HDMI) so it is very convenient. Thin, doesn't take up a lot of space. I definitely recommend this monitor.

I got this to replace the Samsung LCD TV that I used as a monitor for my PC. I had no idea what I was missing with that tired old thing; this monitor has excellent color reproduction, great contrast, and unbelievable blacks. I used to be able to walk around in dark Minecraft caves with only the bleed of the Samsung's backlight to guide me, but the Asus monitor put the kibosh on that. Definitely worth the price I paid for it.
Not much more to say than that...

Fairly light, bright, cool running (compared to some TFTs I've had that ran so warm your face glowed) and a nice picture. Not the most stable stand in the world, but it's OK. I mainly use it for PC gaming, and it shakes a little when I'm playing racing games with my wheel attached to the desk but I'm more pre-occupied with the racing itself to be that bothered by it. No dead or stuck pixels. I'm happy with it.

The perfect monitor for my needs - at a great price. Nothing fancy, nothing complicated. Just a good, solid, reliable monitor that was a snap to install and turn on. Picture quality is top notch. I couldn't be happier with my new monitor.

This monitor is great for ease of setup and view. Looks beautiful, and display is bright and sharp. If you put the monitor close to the wall this might not be the best one, the connections are flush with the back of the monitor and not facing down like most monitors.  This makes it easy to connect, but takes a little more space and is subject to accidental damage.

review_title: Took a little while to figure out which drivers to ...
review_body: Took a little while to figure out which drivers to install to get it to work, but since I've gotten it to work it's certainly worth the money.
So easy to set up and perfect size for travel.  I need two monitors for work when I am on the road.

Love this thing. I carry it everywhere and it keeps me productive when I'm on the go because I can create a dual screen workstation anywhere. It worked great on my old USB 2 notebook, but seems to work even better on my new USB 3 notebook.

review_title: Why didn't i get one of these sooner? Love it.
review_body: Love this monitor. Should have got one years ago. Comes with a functional case which was a plus. Easy to use on MAC and Windows. Co-workers were wow-ed and are planning on getting their own monitors.

This portable monitor works great. Expect some difficulties setting up software and compatibility with all USB3 chipsets is questionable. That being said it works just as well with USB2. The supplied case plenty good for toting it around. Only it doesn't have a separate space for the supplied USB cable. I would be nice if the display was a little brighter, but it has good color and clarity. Overall it is a great buy for a portable monitor.
Works as advertised.  Love it.
This is an incredibly useful extra screen, powered through its USB connection. Light and just the right size.

review_title: It's a great world traveler (with improvement suggestions)
review_body: This monitor has been with me through about a dozen countries around the world. It can take a surprising amount of abuse, however, I wouldn't recommend throwing it around. :-) It crashed to the floor off of a table in Melbourne and kept on ticking. The bezel came off and I snapped it right back on. Nary a scratch. I throw it in my soft sided bag and have stored it in hotels. Sometimes the porters stack other bags on top of mine, which causes me slight fits. But this AOC makes it through each time.

review_title: the quality of the monitor has been great and it travels well
review_body: So far, the quality of the monitor has been great and it travels well.

Works well as an auxiliary monitor on a laptop.  I had some installation problems but recevied quick email response from the technical staff and downloaded latest version of software and it installed as expected.  Good buy.
Great color and performance this far.
Best one at that price
Bought it to game on my new PSPro. I expected a decent monitor with decent graphics for the price and got mind blown instead! Absolutely in love with the monitor! Living!
Great Monitor for the price, I would definitely recommend
Awesome. Works great with my macbook pro.

Excellent monitor! I wanted something to fit on my desk, be large enough to use but not huge, and this fits the bill perfectly. I use it for graphic work as well as text based work and it's crystal clear, awesome picture, very pleased with it. It's also the perfect size.

I replaced my 20" monitor with unit.  Call me silly but I was expecting it to be bigger as it seemed like a very modest upgrade from my 20".  That being said this bad boy showed up in ready to go fashion and with a flawless picture.  Due to my miscalculation I upgraded to the AOC E2752VH.  That monitor took a bit of tweaking to get right and I still feel the ASUS had better color.  If I had to complain about anything it would be a stand with limited adjustability which is common with all monitors.  Two of these bad boys would be the ultimate dual monitor set up.

review_title: great monitor once I got it working
review_body: I almost returned this monitor as DOA. I plugged it in and no power. Tried different outlets - no power. Was about to give up when I monkeyed with the power cable to unit connection, jiggling it for about 10 minutes and finally - power!!

I had no idea how bad my previous monitor was until I plugged this little baby in.  NICE Graphics!!  I play Sims, Guild Wars and other games and this displays them in absolute clarity and at FULL resolution.  I can crank the game graphics up and it looks AMAZING.  (Helps that I also have a hand build PC...)  Good for reading web pages, word documents and emails too.  this monitor is a true widescreen and I love it.

review_title: but so far so good. Large monitors with good color and display
review_body: Only had these for a couple days, but so far so good. Large monitors with good color and display. Plug and play. I don't think you could find a better monitor for this price point right now.

It does not have a built in camera but that is not a big deal. Good product at a good price. Very happy with it and it arrived very well packed in a short amount of time. I love shopping on Amazon for these items. Better than driving all over and hoping for an attentive store person.

Their monitors are as good as their motherboards, crystal clear, 2ms fast and bright as can be with great contrast... What else can anyone want? I love them.

review_title: The thin bezel is fantastic, letting me focus on the images and words ...
review_body: I'm really enjoying viewing and working on this Acer monitor. The thin bezel is fantastic, letting me focus on the images and words on the screen instead of being distracted by thick-rimmed black plastic as in the case of my monitor at work.  There are only a couple of things I wish it could be better at.  First, I wish it had a higher resolution but for this price point, I can't complain.  However, I do have a more serious gripe with the hard to use monitor control buttons.  As they are now, they're too small and hidden underneath the bottom right corner of the screen. The onscreen menu isn't the easiest to navigate either.  All in all, however, I'm very happy with it.
